2022-10-16.Line 457: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-10-16.Line 484: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-10-16.Line 486: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-10-16.Line 487: Rachel Astudillo, Andrea Mosley, , Lindsey Aiken, Emily Knie, Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, Tori Patterson, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-10-16.Line 489: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-10-16.Line 491: Grant Pastor Williams Your comfort and peace after homegoing of his wife, Barbara this week.  Uphold and provide for him through this season of grief.
2022-10-16.Line 493: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-10-16.Line 495: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-10-16.Line 497: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-16.Line 499: Father we give You thanks for and ask Your help and guidance for our governmental authorities, civic and Church.  Especially asking that You would impart Your wisdom, grace, and love to the men who convene from the 17 churches and missions of our Athanasius Presbytery, meeting this week.  Bless us, bless our churches, and bless Your one, holy worldwide Church.
2022-10-16.Line 501: Especially uphold our Presiding Ministers: Brito & Thacker bless them and their churches for their labors empower also our 4 ordination candidates as they prepare for and engage in their final examinations through them bless Your Church and glorify Your name.
2022-10-16.Line 503: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-16.Line 505: And now, our Heavenly Father, As we approach Your Word and the table You have set before us, Give us the help of Your Spirit to do so with living and obedient faith.  Bless us mightily by them, for we ask in the name of Jesus our Lord.   Amen.
2022-10-16.Line 510: Christians, in Whom do you trust?
2022-10-16.Line 513: I believe in one God: the Father Almighty,  Maker of heaven and earth,
2022-10-16.Line 514: and of all things visible and invisible;
2022-10-16.Line 516: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,
2022-10-16.Line 517: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2022-10-16.Line 518: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God, begotten, not made,
2022-10-16.Line 519: being of one substance with the Father;
2022-10-16.Line 520: by Whom all things were made;
2022-10-16.Line 521: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2022-10-16.Line 523: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2022-10-16.Line 525: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2022-10-16.Line 526: He suffered, and was buried,  and the third day
2022-10-16.Line 527: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2022-10-16.Line 529: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2022-10-16.Line 530: and He shall come again with glory
2022-10-16.Line 531: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2022-10-16.Line 532: Whose kingdom shall have no end.
2022-10-16.Line 534: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,
2022-10-16.Line 535: Who proceedeth from the Father and the Son;
2022-10-16.Line 536: Who with the Father and the Son
2022-10-16.Line 540: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;
2022-10-16.Line 541: I acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins;
2022-10-16.Line 542: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,
2022-10-16.Line 543: and the life of the world to come.
2022-10-16.Line 597: in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.  Amen.  Let us pray:
2022-10-16.Line 599: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #13 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-10-16.Line 600: Be pleased now, O most merciful Father, to graciously receive at our hands this memorial of the blessed sacrifice of Your Son.  In union with Christ and His one sacrifice, we offer to You, O Lord, the reasonable sacrifices of ourselves, consecrating ourselves on the altar of the gospel, in soul and body, property and life, to Your most blessed service and praise. We thank You for Christ, the Bread of Life, and we thank You for this bread that is now before us.  In partaking of this bread, may we truly partake of Christ.  In His name.  Amen.
2022-10-16.Line 606: Holy Scripture teaches: that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2022-10-16.Line 610: Bread                   Come All Who Love the Slaughtered Lamb
2022-10-16.Line 636: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2022-10-16.Line 638: The body of Christ given for you!
2022-10-16.Line 644: Look upon us through the mediation of our great High Priest, Heavenly Father, and make us accepted in the Beloved.  Let His name be as pure and holy incense, through which all our worship may come up before You, as the odor of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, well pleasing to God.  We thank You now for this table which You have set before us.  We thank You that the ears of sinners such as we would ever, even once hear the words:  the blood of Jesus Christ shed for the remission of your sins; that lips such as ours would ever partake of His cup.  In partaking of it, may we truly partake of Christ and His sacrifice for us.
2022-10-16.Line 646: In the same manner He also took the cup also after supper
2022-10-16.Line 677: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, in remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you proclaim the Lord's death till He comes.
2022-10-16.Line 679: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2022-10-16.Line 683: Versicle                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               O give thanks to the Lord, for He is good.         For everlasting is His lovingkindness!
2022-10-16.Line 686: Praise God from whom all blessing flow,                                                                                                         Praise Him all creatures here below                                                                                Praise Him above ye heavenly host,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen!
2022-10-16.Line 691: "Thus it is written, and thus it was necessary for the Christ to suffer and to rise from the dead the third day,   and that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in His name to all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.  And you are witnesses of these things.
2022-10-16.Line 695: Now God, who gives life to all things,
2022-10-16.Line 696: and Christ Jesus who witnessed the good confession before Pontius Pilate,
2022-10-16.Line 697: keep you without spot, blameless until His appearing,
2022-10-16.Line 698: which He will manifest in His own time.
2022-10-16.Line 700: He who is the blessed and only Potentate,
2022-10-16.Line 701: the King of kings and Lord of lords,
2022-10-16.Line 702: who alone has immortality, dwelling in unapproachable light,
2022-10-16.Line 703: whom no man has seen nor can see,
2022-10-16.Line 704: to Him be honor and everlasting power.     Amen.
2022-10-16.Line 708: Hymn of Response                    Jesus Shall Reign Where'ere the Sun
2022-10-16.Line 715: God bless you!  Go in peace, and the God of peace be with you.

2022-10-23.Line 4: Ecclesiastes 5 - Guard your steps when you go to the house of God. To draw near to listen is better than to offer the sacrifice of fools, for they do not know that they are doing evil. 2  Be not rash with your mouth, nor let your heart be hasty to utter a word before God, for God is in heaven and you are on earth. Therefore let your words be few. 3 For a dream comes with much busyness, and a fool's voice with many words.
2022-10-23.Line 7: Rise and let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.
2022-10-23.Line 9: O magnify the Lord with me!             Let us exalt God's name together!  I will praise you, O Lord, with my whole heart;        I will tell of all your marvelous works. I will be glad and rejoice in you;           I will sing praise to your name, O Most High!
2022-10-23.Line 14: Give ear to my words, O Lord,
2022-10-23.Line 17: Give heed to the voice of my cry, My King and my God,
2022-10-23.Line 18: FOR TO YOU I WILL PRAY.
2022-10-23.Line 20: My voice You shall hear in the morning, O Lord;
2022-10-23.Line 21: IN THE MORNING I WILL DIRECT IT TO YOU,
2022-10-23.Line 24: For You are not a God who takes pleasure in wickedness,
2022-10-23.Line 25: NOR SHALL EVIL DWELL WITH YOU.
2022-10-23.Line 27: The boastful shall not stand in Your sight;
2022-10-23.Line 28: YOU HATE ALL WORKERS OF INIQUITY.
2022-10-23.Line 30: You shall destroy those who speak falsehood;
2022-10-23.Line 34: But as for me, I will come into Your house
2022-10-23.Line 35: in the multitude of Your mercy;
2022-10-23.Line 36: IN FEAR OF YOU I WILL WORSHIP
2022-10-23.Line 39: Lead me, O LORD, in Your righteousness because of my enemies;
2022-10-23.Line 40: MAKE YOUR WAY STRAIGHT BEFORE MY FACE.
2022-10-23.Line 42: Entrance Hymn                                             Psalm 68 Let God Arise
2022-10-23.Line 46: Lord, You have been our dwelling place in all generations.  Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever You had formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, You are God.  You turn man back to the dust, and say,  Turn back, O Children of men!  For a thousand years in Your sight are but as yesterday when it is past, or as a watch in the night .So teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom And let the favor of the Lord our God be upon us, and establish the work of our hands for us;  yes, we look to You to establish the work of our hands.  Hear us now as we sing together the prayer Your Son, our Lord has given us.
2022-10-23.Line 50: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2022-10-23.Line 53: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2022-10-23.Line 54: Give us this day our daily bread,
2022-10-23.Line 55: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2022-10-23.Line 56: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2022-10-23.Line 57: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2022-10-23.Line 61: Let us humbly kneel, and make confession to God, imploring his forgiveness, through Jesus Christ our Lord.  First silently, and then together
2022-10-23.Line 66: Most merciful God, I confess to you that I am from birth sinful and unclean, and that I have sinned against You in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that I am not able to fully understand, but which are all known to You.   For this reason, I flee for refuge to Your infinite mercy, continually seeking and imploring Your grace, through my Lord Jesus Christ.  Amen.
2022-10-23.Line 68: * Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness! Joel 2:12-13
2022-10-23.Line 70: " Now, therefore," says the Lord, "Turn to Me with all your heart, With fasting, with weeping, and with mourning." So rend your heart, and not your garments; Return to the Lord your God, For He is gracious and merciful, Slow to anger, and of great kindness .
2022-10-23.Line 72: [Your heavenly Father, in His great mercy, has given His only Son to die for our redemption.  To you who have confessed your sin to God from your hearts, who turn and return to the Lord, Once more, He assures you that He is gracious and merciful to you, slow to anger and of great kindness.  Beloved in the Lord, for Christ's sake, all your sins are forgiven!]
2022-10-23.Line 74: Therefore, Lift up your hearts!    We lift them up to the Lord!
2022-10-23.Line 90: How Shall We Then Live?  Let us hear from God's Word.
2022-10-23.Line 94: 18 And he [Moses] said,  Please, show me Your glory.
2022-10-23.Line 95: 19 Then He said,  I will make all My goodness pass before you, and I will proclaim the name of the Lord before you. I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion. 20 But He said,  You cannot see My face; for no man shall see Me, and live. 21 And the Lord said,  Here is a place by Me, and you shall stand on the rock. 22 So it shall be, while My glory passes by, that I will put you in the cleft of the rock, and will cover you with My hand while I pass by. 23 Then I will take away My hand, and you shall see My back; but My face shall not be seen.
2022-10-23.Line 106: 6 For I am already being poured out as a drink offering, and the time of my departure is at hand. 7 I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith. 8 Finally, there is laid up for me the crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous Judge, will give to me on that Day, and not to me only but also to all who have loved His appearing.
2022-10-23.Line 108: 16 At my first defense no one stood with me, but all forsook me. May it not be charged against them.
2022-10-23.Line 109: 17 But the Lord stood with me and strengthened me, so that the message might be preached fully through me, and that all the Gentiles might hear. Also I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion. 18 And the Lord will deliver me from every evil work and preserve me for His heavenly kingdom. To Him be glory forever and ever. Amen!
2022-10-23.Line 140: Praise be to the Lord Jesus Christ!
2022-10-23.Line 144: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2022-10-23.Line 145: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.
2022-10-23.Line 151: Gracious Father in Heaven, Yours are the words of life.  Help us by the grace of Your Spirit to hear them now, in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-10-23.Line 156: Preaching of the Word                     Pastor Ben Rossell
2022-10-23.Line 257: James 5:1-5 -- Come now, you rich, weep and howl for your miseries that are coming upon you!  Your riches are corrupted, and your garments are moth-eaten.  Your gold and silver are corroded, and their corrosion will be a witness against you and will eat your flesh like fire. You have heaped up treasure in the last days.  Indeed the wages of the laborers who mowed your fields, which you kept back by fraud, cry out; and the cries of the reapers have reached the ears of the Lord of Sabaoth.  You have lived on the earth in pleasure and luxury; you have fattened your hearts as in a day of slaughter.
2022-10-23.Line 260: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, You have blessed us materially with great abundance so that luxuries of all kinds surround us every day and make our living pleasant and easy.  Keep us from being rich fools, and laying up treasure for ourselves, while not being rich toward God (Luke 6:19-20).  Grant us the grace and wisdom of Your Holy Spirit to think Your Own thoughts about money and material possessions.  Deliver us from making idols of personal peace and affluence while ignoring the needs of those You have sent to us.  Receive these gifts we present to You now.  Give the elders and deacons of Your church wisdom as we seek to use this money to spread the gospel and meet physical needs.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-10-23.Line 268: Now rise! And let us pray for the Church and the world!
2022-10-23.Line 272: We thank You for Your tender kindness to us not only for delivering us from the fear of death, but for Your lavish gifts and comforts in our daily lives.  Grant us Your grace to be strengthened and bettered by these, rather than spoiled and led by a desire for comforts and riches.  Establish us in Godly contentment, that we never be guilty of idolatry before You.
2022-10-23.Line 275: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2022-10-23.Line 277: In our own community, we lift up to You Forest Lake Bible Church and elders Tidwell and Aldridge and Pastor Thomas as he preaches there today.    We ask that You would fill them with all wisdom and grace and use that congregation in this community and in its ministry throughout the world. And give us a true and Biblical unity with this church and the other churches of the community.
2022-10-23.Line 279: We lift up to You the work of Your gospel ministers all over the world especially the ministry of Thomas and Julie and their ministry in southeast Asia especially as Thomas prepares to teach in their church this month in November,  and as their care groups divide and branch out.   Travel into nearby Malaysia to meet with other ministry partners.  Also bless and uphold each member of their family and their health as well.
2022-10-23.Line 281: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in NEPAL
2022-10-23.Line 283: For Pastor Keshab and all those like him jailed for their Christian witness and Gospel outreach.   Bless and uphold him and those who advocate for him through the legal process.  Return him from jail to Gospel ministry.  And  bless Your Church there that She might flourish with peace in all devotion and reverence.    Grant them Your peace, even in the midst of their distress.  Rise up, O Father, and deliver Your children from their oppressors, from the plans and actions of wicked men who have set themselves against You and Your children.  Grant wisdom, justice, and effectiveness to every leader and authority involved.
2022-10-23.Line 285: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2022-10-23.Line 289: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-23.Line 291: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-10-23.Line 293: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.

2022-10-23.Line 323: Andrea Mosley, Lindsey Aiken, Emily Knie, Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, Tori Patterson, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-10-23.Line 325: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-10-23.Line 327: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-10-23.Line 329: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-10-23.Line 331: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-23.Line 333: You are our Creator as well as Savior, and we thank You for the wonder of our being,
2022-10-23.Line 335: You have told us plainly in Your Word that 22 Wives are to submit to their own husbands, as to the Lord in all things and that husbands, are to love their wives, just as Christ also loved the Church and gave Himself for Her,
2022-10-23.Line 337: But we have turned from goodness to our own twisted ways.  Wives refuse the beauty of loving submission and husbands shrink back from laying down their lives in loving sacrifice.  Femininity is mocked and masculinity has given way to perpetual adolescence and self-service.  You have made us male and female, in Your holy image, but we reject the wisdom of Your calling upon us as men or women and our confusion is our shame and harm.  For Your ways are the ways of life and apart from them is darkness and death.  So deliver us and our children after us from temptation and folly.  Grant us joy in our calling to be men and women, and as we are faithful to live it out, especially in Christian marriages - empower us by the might of Your Holy Spirit to shine with glory as lights to the world in this way.
2022-10-23.Line 339: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-23.Line 341: Now our Father as we come to this Your table, we thank You that You have not withheld these from us indeed You've not withheld even Your Own and only begotten Son but delivered Him up as a sacrifice whose holy body was broken to feed us and give life to the world.  Give us Your blessings now, for we ask all these things in the strong and holy name of Your Son, Jesus Christ our Lord.  Amen.

2022-10-23.Line 403: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #12 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-10-23.Line 405: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we pray that You will send down the powerful benediction of Your Holy Spirit upon these elements of bread and wine, that they may become to us the sign and seal of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; so that in this use of them we may be made, through the power of the Holy Spirit, to partake really and truly of His blessed life, by which alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give you heartfelt thanks for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ.  In His blessed name.  Amen.
2022-10-23.Line 410: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2022-10-23.Line 427: BREAD:      My Soul, Now Bless Thy Maker

2022-10-23.Line 461: The body of Christ given for you!

2022-10-23.Line 467: ,  Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God  of hosts; heaven and earth are full of the majesty of Your glory.  Hosanna in the highest!  Blessed is He Who comes in the name of the Lord. "You are worthy to take the scroll, And to open its seals, O Christ; For You were slain, And have redeemed us to God by Your blood Out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation, And have made us kings and priests to our God; And we shall reign on the earth." (Revelation 5:9-10). We thank you now for this cup through which we receive the benefits of Your atonement.  Amen.

2022-10-30.Line 3: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised; He is to be feared above all gods.  For all the gods of the peoples are idols; but the Lord made the heavens.
2022-10-30.Line 4: Worship the Lord in holy array; tremble before Him, all the earth!
2022-10-30.Line 5: Say among the nations, "The Lord reigns!
2022-10-30.Line 8: Rise!  Let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.
2022-10-30.Line 10: I rejoiced when they said to me,  Let us go into the house of the Lord!                                                                                                OUR FEET ARE STANDING WITHIN YOUR GATES, O JERUSALEM!
2022-10-30.Line 11: Our help is in the name of the Lord                                                                                                                   MAKER OF HEAVEN AND EARTH.
2022-10-30.Line 17: God is our refuge and strength,      A VERY PRESENT HELP IN TROUBLE.
2022-10-30.Line 18: Therefore, we will not fear, though the earth be removed,
2022-10-30.Line 19: AND THOUGH THE MOUNTAINS BE CARRIED INTO THE MIDST OF THE SEA;
2022-10-30.Line 20: Though it waters roar and be troubled,
2022-10-30.Line 21: THOUGH THE MOUNTAINS SHAKE WITH ITS SWELLING.
2022-10-30.Line 22: There is a river whose streams shall make glad the city of God,
2022-10-30.Line 23: THE HOLY PLACE OF THE TABERNACLE OF THE MOST-HIGH.
2022-10-30.Line 24: God is in the midst of her, she shall not be moved;
2022-10-30.Line 25: GOD SHALL HELP HER, JUST AT THE BREAK OF DAWN.
2022-10-30.Line 26: The nations raged, the kingdoms were moved;     HE UTTERED HIS VOICE, THE EARTH MELTED.
2022-10-30.Line 27: The Lord of hosts is with us;            THE GOD OF JACOB IS OUR REFUGE.
2022-10-30.Line 28: Come, behold the works of the Lord,
2022-10-30.Line 29: WHO HAS MADE DESOLATIONS IN THE EARTH.
2022-10-30.Line 30: He makes wars cease to the ends of the earth;
2022-10-30.Line 31: HE BREAKS THE BOW AND CUTS THE SPEAR IN TWO;
2022-10-30.Line 32: He burns the chariot in the fire.
2022-10-30.Line 33: BE STILL, AND KNOW THAT I AM GOD;
2022-10-30.Line 34: I will be exalted among the nations,

2022-10-30.Line 41: Entrance Hymn                                              Beneath the Blood-stained Lintel
2022-10-30.Line 43: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one! You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your strength. And these words which I command you today shall be in your heart. You shall teach them diligently to your children, and shall talk of them when you sit in your house, when you walk by the way, when you lie down, and when you rise up  For the promise is to you and to your children, and to all who are afar off, as many as the Lord our God will call.
2022-10-30.Line 46: DEARLY BELOVED, the sacrament of baptism is for little children because God our Father, Who has redeemed us by the sacrifice of Christ, is also the God and Father of our children.  They belong, with us who believe, to the membership of the Church through the covenant made with Christ. Our own Westminster Confession of Faith says that baptism is a sign and seal of the covenant of grace, of our ingrafting into Christ, of regeneration, of remission of sins, and of our giving up unto God, through Jesus Christ, to walk in the newness of life.
2022-10-30.Line 48: Our Lord Jesus said,  Allow the little children to come unto Me, and do not forbid them, for of such is the kingdom of God.
2022-10-30.Line 74: Steve and Amy, is Jesus Christ your only Lord and Savior?
2022-10-30.Line 76: You know that, in presenting your son, that God requires things of you
2022-10-30.Line 78: 1.        In presenting your daughter for baptism, you are acknowledging your need and hers of the cleansing blood of Jesus Christ and the renewing grace of the Holy Spirit.
2022-10-30.Line 80: 2.    You are claiming God's covenant promise in her behalf, God's promise to be a God to you and to your descendants after you, and you are looking in faith to the Lord Jesus Christ for her salvation, as you do for your own.
2022-10-30.Line 82: 3.    You are now unreservedly committing her to God, and promising, in humble reliance upon divine grace, that you will endeavor to set before her a Godly example, that you will pray with and for her, that you will teach her the doctrines of the Christian faith, and that you will strive, by all the means of God's appointment, to bring her up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
2022-10-30.Line 83: These are the baptismal duties God requires of you do you vow to obey Him by His grace and help?  [response: We do]
2022-10-30.Line 85: QUESTION TO THE CONGREGATION: God calls you as the Body of Christ to assist these parents in the Christian nurture of this child? Will you respond with a hearty  Amen and commit to undertake this responsibility by God's grace and help?
2022-10-30.Line 93: OLIVIA,  I BAPTIZE YOU IN THE NAME OF THE FATHER AND THE SON AND THE HOLY SPIRIT.
2022-10-30.Line 95: THE BLESSINGS OF THE TRIUNE GOD BE WITH YOU ALWAYS.
2022-10-30.Line 98: Little child, for you Jesus Christ came into the world, suffered and did battle.  For you He faced the blackness of Gethsemane and the terrors of Calvary.
2022-10-30.Line 99: For you He cried out  It is finished!
2022-10-30.Line 100: For you He overcame death by death, was buried, and ascended into Heaven, where for you, He is right now, interceding.
2022-10-30.Line 101: All these things while you are too young to even know what they mean. And so the word of the Apostle is confirmed: We love Him because first, He loved us.
2022-10-30.Line 105: This child, being thus baptized, is a member of the household of faith; committed to the care and instruction of these parents and this congregation, to the end that she may mature and grow strong as a disciple of the Lord Jesus Christ, and serve in the royal priesthood of God's elect from every tribe and tongue and nation. Jesus said,  Whoever receives one such little child in My name, receives Me.
2022-10-30.Line 107: Please rise for our prayer of blessing which we will close together by singing of the Lord's Prayer:
2022-10-30.Line 110: You righteously judged the unfaithful world through flood waters, but in Your great mercy, saved faithful Noah with his household.
2022-10-30.Line 112: You drowned hard-hearted Pharaoh with all his army in the Sea, but led Your people Israel through on dry ground, prefiguring the washing of Your holy baptism.
2022-10-30.Line 114: By the baptism of Your dear Son, You sanctified and set apart the Jordan River and all water for a saving flood, and an ample washing away of sins.
2022-10-30.Line 116: Through Your same infinite mercy, graciously look down now upon Henry, and bless her with a right faith in the Spirit, so that through this saving flood all that was born in him from Adam and all that has been added to it might be drowned and cleansed.
2022-10-30.Line 118: Separate him now from the unfaithful, and preserve him in the holy ark of Christendom dry and safe, ever fervent in spirit and joyful in hope to serve Your holy name,
2022-10-30.Line 120: so that he, together with us and all Your Faithful, may be worthy to inherit Your promise of eternal life, through Christ Jesus our Lord.

2022-10-30.Line 126: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2022-10-30.Line 129: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.

2022-10-30.Line 131: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2022-10-30.Line 132: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2022-10-30.Line 133: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2022-10-30.Line 139: Saints of God, today we remember the work of God to reform His Church a work of reforming that God works always first and foremost in and from our own hearts   we are in need of cleansing and renewal. Let us call upon the mercy of our heavenly Father.  Let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently, then together.
2022-10-30.Line 141: Let us pray together  Most merciful God, I confess to You that I am by nature sinful and unclean, and that I have sinned against You in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that I am not able to understand, but which are all known to You. For this reason, I flee for refuge to Your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your grace, through my Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
2022-10-30.Line 145: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!                Romans 3:19-22
2022-10-30.Line 147: Now we know that whatever the law says, it says to those who are under the law, that every mouth may be stopped, and all the world may become guilty before God.  Therefore by the deeds of the law no flesh will be justified in His sight, for by the law is the knowledge of sin.  But now the righteousness of God apart from the law is revealed, being witnessed by the Law and the Prophets, even the righteousness of God which is through faith in Jesus Christ to all and on all who believe.
2022-10-30.Line 151: [ To you who confess your sin to God and seek His forgiveness through Jesus,  to you who have stopped your mouth from excuse-making and self justification, and have confessed that with all the world you stand guilty before God    God declares that you are righteous in His sight together with all who believe in Jesus.  Beloved in the Lord, for Christ's sake, all your sins are forgiven. Therefore   ]

2022-10-30.Line 336: October 31st -MATTHEW 5:23-24 Therefore if you bring your gift to the altar, and there remember that your brother has something against you, leave your gift there before the altar, and go your way.  First be reconciled to your brother, and then come and offer your gift.
2022-10-30.Line 338: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, You are the Creator and Sustainer of all.  You have no need of our money or gifts as if we could bribe the almighty with full hands and empty hearts.  When we are at odds with our brethren, our offerings are vain and meaningless.  As we present our tithes and offerings to You today, we do so from hearts longing for peace with You and all Your people.  Bless and use them to that end and bless our meal together now for the same purpose, for we offer You our gifts only in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-10-30.Line 344: Now rise! And let us pray for the Church and the world!
2022-10-30.Line 348: We ask Lord, that You would teach us the many lessons of our Lord that we may become Your mature people.
2022-10-30.Line 349: Fill us with all Grace and peace.  Make us fruitful in works of faith and labors of love and steadfastness of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ. Grant us to live as Your faithful people in this nation and at this time in the power of Your Spirit and with full conviction. For we ask in the name of our resurrected Lord Jesus by Whom we are delivered from the wrath to come.
2022-10-30.Line 351: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2022-10-30.Line 353: In our own community, we lift up to You St Paul Lutheran Church, Pastor David Charlton, Good Shepherd Lutheran in Crestview and Shalimar pastor Angerman and others.  Guide them into faithfulness; Many are in a larger denomination pressured socially in many directions that would compromise faithfulness to Your standard of righteousness. Fill them with all wisdom and grace and fidelity to You.  Empower them both as stewards of a past rich Reformational heritage and also called to walk faithfully today and into Your future.
2022-10-30.Line 355: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world,
2022-10-30.Line 357: Remembering HOPE RUSSIA Especially the Russia Mission Partnership, as it is formed and convenes for the first time this coming Spring bless all the planning that is taking place for that Bless and provide for the church growth and building search for Riga Latvia and Nahkodka finally, guard, uphold, and sustain the churches where men are relocating in order to avoid military service.  Give wisdom and faithfulness to those who remain and in Your mercy bring all these to a close.
2022-10-30.Line 359: We also lift up to You Your persecuted people, all over the world - especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in
2022-10-30.Line 360: Aghanistan  especially those left in areas now under Taliban control and the threat of great persecution.    Give them Wisdom, grace, and help from on high; deliver them from their abductors and return them to their families; Provide for, guard and preserve their families and all Your people in their hour of need.
2022-10-30.Line 361: Raise up just leaders there who would protect the innocent and establish righteousness so that Your Church there might flourish with peace in all devotion and reverence.
2022-10-30.Line 364: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-30.Line 366: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-10-30.Line 368: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-10-30.Line 395: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-10-30.Line 397: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-10-30.Line 398: Andrea Mosley, Lindsey Aiken, Emily Knie, Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, Tori Patterson, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-10-30.Line 400: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-10-30.Line 402: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-10-30.Line 404: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-10-30.Line 406: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-30.Line 408: Gracious Father, we ask Your blessing over the Gospel as it goes forward, especially in the efforts of Churchplants and ongoing local ministry.  To that end, bless the churches of our community and especially of our regional Athanasius Presbytery.  And on this day, as we anticipate the installation of Phillip Bozarth as pastor of our sister congregation Christ Church, Pace bless Your people and their Church officers there.  Grant them many years of faithfulness to You, to one another, and to their neighbors there in Pace, Milton, and Pensacola.
2022-10-30.Line 411: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-10-30.Line 413: Now our Father as we come to Your table, we thank You for these palpable expressions of Your grace Your gifts to Your children.  Help us now in and by them, for we ask it and give You thanks in the strong and holy name of Your Son, Jesus Christ our Lord.  Amen.
2022-10-30.Line 417: Christians, in Whom do you trust?
2022-10-30.Line 420: I believe in one God: the Father Almighty,
2022-10-30.Line 422: and of all things visible and invisible;
2022-10-30.Line 424: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,
2022-10-30.Line 425: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2022-10-30.Line 426: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2022-10-30.Line 428: being of one substance with the Father;
2022-10-30.Line 429: by Whom all things were made;
2022-10-30.Line 430: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2022-10-30.Line 432: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2022-10-30.Line 434: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2022-10-30.Line 437: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2022-10-30.Line 439: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2022-10-30.Line 440: and He shall come again with glory
2022-10-30.Line 441: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2022-10-30.Line 442: Whose kingdom shall have no end.
2022-10-30.Line 444: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,
2022-10-30.Line 445: Who proceedeth from the Father and the Son;
2022-10-30.Line 446: Who with the Father and the Son
2022-10-30.Line 450: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;
2022-10-30.Line 451: I acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins;
2022-10-30.Line 452: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,
2022-10-30.Line 453: and the life of the world to come.
2022-10-30.Line 515: in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.  Amen.  Let us pray:
2022-10-30.Line 518: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #8 (Adapted from Calvin's prayer at Geneva)
2022-10-30.Line 519: Most gracious God!  As Your Son once offered up His body and blood on the cross for the remission of our sins, and has given his body and blood to us as our food and drink unto life eternal: So give us grace, with sincere hearts and fervent desires, to receive this great blessing from His hands.  May we by lively faith partake of his body and blood, yes of Himself, true God and man, the only bread from heaven, Who gives life to our souls.  Allow us no longer to live for ourselves, according to a corrupt and sinful nature; but may Christ live in us, and lead us to the life that is holy, blessed, and unchangeable for ever.  Amen.
2022-10-30.Line 525: Holy Scripture says: that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2022-10-30.Line 537: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2022-10-30.Line 539: The body of Christ given for you!
2022-10-30.Line 545: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #8: (Adapted from Calvin's prayer at Geneva):
2022-10-30.Line 547: O Lord, make us true partakers of the new and everlasting covenant, the covenant of grace.  And thus assure us of Your willingness to always be our gracious Father; not imputing to us our sins, but that we may magnify Your name by our words and works, providing us as Your beloved children and heirs, with all things necessary for our good.  Fit us, O heavenly Father! so to celebrate at this time the blessed remembrance of Your Son.  Enable us to profitably contemplate His love, and show forth the benefits of His death; that receiving fresh increase of strength in Your faith and in all good works, we may with greater confidence call You our Father, and evermore rejoice in You; Through Jesus Christ, our Redeemer, Who shed His blood that we might live.  Amen.
2022-10-30.Line 550: In the same manner He also took the cup also after supper
2022-10-30.Line 553: Cup             Built on the Rock the Church Doth Stand
2022-10-30.Line 597: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, as the remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you do show forth Your Lord's death until His return.
2022-10-30.Line 599: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2022-10-30.Line 606: O Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good!
2022-10-30.Line 610: Praise God from whom all blessing flow,                                                                                                       Praise Him all creatures here below

Amen!

2022-10-30.Line 618: and you shall be witnesses to Me in Jerusalem,

2022-11-06.Line 7: Walk about Zion, go around her, number her towers,  consider well her ramparts, go through her citadels, that you may tell the next generation that this is God, our God forever and ever.   He will guide us even beyond death.

2022-11-06.Line 36: You have sent us Your Spirit and so confirmed our adoption as Your own children to join the family of God.
2022-11-06.Line 37: You have loved us as a perfect Father.  You have brought us to Your table and welcome us into Your home.
2022-11-06.Line 38: You have surrounded us with so great a cloud of witnesses.  And in every age You have called men and women to give up their lives for You as martyrs of Christ.
2022-11-06.Line 39: Grant that we, encouraged by the examples of Your servants and mindful of Your faithfulness in and through them, may persevere in the course that is set before us.

For this reason, I flee for refuge to Your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your grace, through my Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
2022-11-06.Line 64: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!
2022-11-06.Line 68: [Jesus said]: "Whoever drinks of the water that I shall give him will never thirst  and it will become in him a fountain of water springing up into everlasting life." "If anyone thirsts, let him come to Me and drink. He who believes in Me, as the Scripture has said, out of his heart will flow rivers of living water."
2022-11-06.Line 70: Anyone who turns in thirst to any other source or spring than Christ is doomed to fail and fall under the just judgment of God   apart from Jesus Christ, all other promises are broken cisterns and polluted wells
2022-11-06.Line 72: But to you who have acknowledged that your thirst can be quenched ONLY by the living water of the Holy Spirit whom Jesus gives, the water that flows mingled with blood from His very heart - you have confessed your sin to God and sought His forgiveness, your Father in Heaven has had mercy upon you, and for the sake of the sufferings, death, and resurrection of His dear Son forgives all your sins.  Therefore

2022-11-06.Line 156: 9 After these things I looked, and behold, a great multitude which no one could number, of all nations, tribes, peoples, and tongues, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, with palm branches in their hands, 10 and crying out with a loud voice, saying,  Salvation belongs to our God who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb! 11 All the angels stood around the throne and the elders and the four living creatures, and fell on their faces before the throne and worshiped God, 12 saying:
2022-11-06.Line 159: Blessing and glory and wisdom, Thanksgiving and honor and power and might, Be to our God forever and ever. Amen.
2022-11-06.Line 160: 13 Then one of the elders answered, saying to me,  Who are these arrayed in white robes, and where did they come from?
2022-11-06.Line 161: 14 And I said to him,   Sir, you know.
2022-11-06.Line 162: So he said to me,  These are the ones who come out of the great tribulation, and washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb. 15 Therefore they are before the throne of God, and serve Him day and night in His temple. And He who sits on the throne will dwell among them. 16 They shall neither hunger anymore nor thirst anymore; the sun shall not strike them, nor any heat; 17 for the Lamb who is in the midst of the throne will shepherd them and lead them to living fountains of waters. And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes.

2022-11-06.Line 344: November 7th -MATTHEW 6:2-4  When...you give alms, do not sound a trumpet before you, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may be honored by men.  Truly I say to you, they have their reward in full.  But when you give alms, do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing, that your alms may be in secret; and your Father who sees in secret will repay you.
2022-11-06.Line 346: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, As we offer our gifts to You, deliver us from forfeiting Your reward by displays of false piety or sinful attitudes of vainglory.  Instead, give us Your Spirit so that we may serve You with humility and sincerity; eager to work behind the scenes and perform the kinds of secret, charitable deeds which are known, recognized, and rewarded by no one except You. Teach us what it means, not to let our left hand know what our right hand is doing, and bless our offerings in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-11-06.Line 356: Rise now, as we pray together for THE CHURCH AND THE WORLD
2022-11-06.Line 361: Give us Your grace never to leave the light of the glory of Your gospel.  Guard and keep us from the temptations to stray that we would be vigilant against corruptions from within and without.  Thank you for the legacy of Your faithfulness to the world through Your people to purify and keep us- that You are the God Who was, and is, and will be at work among Your people.
2022-11-06.Line 363: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.
2022-11-06.Line 365: In our own community, we lift up to You  the Catholic churches in our community Holy Name of Jesus, Christ our Redeemer, and St Mary's and Fathers Voyt and Johnson, Seb, Halsema.  Despite the doctrinal differences that separate us, we thank You for the areas where their testimony has shown brightly in this corrupt and sinful world.  Bless them and continue the work of Your Spirit to Reform all of Your Church, as you mature and unite us.  That all who bear the name of Christ Jesus would do so faithfully and with a growing purity of devotion to Your Holy Word.
2022-11-06.Line 367: We also lift up to You Rocky Bayou Christian School and especially at this time when there are so many increased school staffing needs nation-wide.  Bless and provide gifted people to this precious ministry here.
2022-11-06.Line 369: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, giving You thanks for the great testimony of the Church's martyrs, but asking You to fulfill their witness with the fruit and blessing of peace and justice for the sake of Your people.
2022-11-06.Line 371: Especially today lifting up to You our brothers and sisters in  Pakistan -  where so many, like our brother, Anwar, face  persecution for their Christian faith and witness, neglect and and legal harassment and imprisonment. Grant them the power to love their enemies and return blessing for cursing as You have commanded us through Your Son By Your Holy Spirit, fill them with hope and courage to continue and grow in the Truth of Christ.  We pray for their persecutors - that You will turn them from their wickedness to the light of the Gospel.  Bless them with good rulers who will govern in wisdom and true justice in ways that protect Your people and allow them to live quiet peaceable lives there in all devotion and reverence!
2022-11-06.Line 373: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2022-11-06.Line 377: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-06.Line 379: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-11-06.Line 381: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-11-06.Line 407: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-11-06.Line 409: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-11-06.Line 410: Lindsey Aiken, Emily Knie, Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, Tori Patterson, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-11-06.Line 412: Andrea Mosley, - thanks for safe delivery!
2022-11-06.Line 414: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-11-06.Line 416: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-11-06.Line 418: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-11-06.Line 420: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-06.Line 423: We thank You for the authorities You have placed over us in the executive, legislative and judicial branches; especially praying today for our Federal Judges  Justices Roberts, Thomas, Alito, Sotomayor, Kagan, Gorsuch, Kavanaugh, Barrett and Jackson.
2022-11-06.Line 424: As well as our FL state justices Muniz, Canady, Polston, Labarga, Francis, Couriel, and Grosshans -
2022-11-06.Line 425: Bless each one with Your true wisdom and strength in all the responsibilities and in the demands of their office that righteousness would dwell in this land.  Be kind to us in this coming election, especially on the state level, in Your mercy grant us good leaders who will govern and judge righteously.
2022-11-06.Line 428: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-06.Line 430: And now, our Heavenly Father, As we approach the table You have set before us,  Give us the help of Your Spirit to do so with living and obedient faith.  Bless us mightily by them, for we ask in the name of Jesus our Lord.   Amen.
2022-11-06.Line 434: Christians, in Whom do you trust?
2022-11-06.Line 438: I believe in one God: the Father Almighty,
2022-11-06.Line 440: and of all things visible and invisible;
2022-11-06.Line 442: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,
2022-11-06.Line 443: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2022-11-06.Line 444: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2022-11-06.Line 446: being of one substance with the Father;
2022-11-06.Line 447: by Whom all things were made;
2022-11-06.Line 448: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2022-11-06.Line 450: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2022-11-06.Line 452: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2022-11-06.Line 455: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2022-11-06.Line 457: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2022-11-06.Line 458: and He shall come again with glory
2022-11-06.Line 459: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2022-11-06.Line 460: Whose kingdom shall have no end.
2022-11-06.Line 462: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,
2022-11-06.Line 463: Who proceedeth from the Father and the Son;
2022-11-06.Line 464: Who with the Father and the Son
2022-11-06.Line 468: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;
2022-11-06.Line 469: I acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins;
2022-11-06.Line 470: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,
2022-11-06.Line 471: and the life of the world to come.
2022-11-06.Line 513: in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.  Amen.  Let us pray:
2022-11-06.Line 516: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #1: (BCW) Gracious God, pour out Your Holy Spirit upon us and upon these Your gifts of bread and wine, that the bread we break and the cup we bless may be the communion of the body and blood of Christ.  By Your Spirit unite us with the living Christ and with all who are baptized in His name, that we may be one in ministry in every place. As this bread is Christ's body for us, send us out to be the body of Christ in the world.
2022-11-06.Line 522: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus, on the same night in which He was betrayed, took bread
2022-11-06.Line 558: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this as the remembrance of Me."
2022-11-06.Line 560: The body of Christ given for you!
2022-11-06.Line 565: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #1 -- Remembering Your gracious acts in Christ, we take from Your creation this bread and wine and joyfully celebrate His dying and rising, as we wait the day of His coming.  With thanksgiving, we offer our very selves to You to be a living and holy sacrifice, dedicated to Your service.  We give You thanks and praise for the blood of Christ, shed for our salvation.
2022-11-06.Line 568: In the same manner He also took the cup also after supper
2022-11-06.Line 571: Cup                    From All Thy Saints in Warfare
2022-11-06.Line 608: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, in remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you show forth Your Lord's death until His return.
2022-11-06.Line 610: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2022-11-06.Line 617: O Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good!
2022-11-06.Line 654: Praise God from whom all blessing flow,
2022-11-06.Line 655: Praise Him all creatures here below
2022-11-06.Line 656: Praise Him above ye heavenly host,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen!
2022-11-06.Line 662: "Thus it is written, and thus it was necessary for the Christ to suffer and to rise from the dead the third day, and that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in His name to all nations, beginning at Jerusalem. And you are witnesses of these things.
2022-11-06.Line 666: Now may the God of peace,
2022-11-06.Line 667: who brought again from the dead, our Lord Jesus,
2022-11-06.Line 668: that great Shepherd of the sheep,
2022-11-06.Line 669: through the blood of the everlasting covenant,
2022-11-06.Line 670: make you perfect to do His will,
2022-11-06.Line 671: working in you that which is well pleasing in His sight,
2022-11-06.Line 673: to whom be glory forever and ever.
2022-11-06.Line 710: God bless you!  Go in peace, and the God of peace be with you.

2022-11-13.Line 4: HEB 10 - Brethren, having boldness, let us enter the Holy place by the blood of Jesus, by the new and living way He consecrated for us, through the veil, that is, His flesh, and having a High Priest over the house of God, draw near with sincere hearts and the full assurance of faith.
2022-11-13.Line 7: Rise and let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit.           AMEN!
2022-11-13.Line 8: We praise You, Oh LORD, God Almighty, Who is and Who was,
2022-11-13.Line 9: For You have taken Your great power and begun to reign!
2022-11-13.Line 10: ALL YOUR WORKS SHALL PRAISE YOU, O LORD,
2022-11-13.Line 11: AND ALL YOUR SAINTS SHALL BLESS YOU!
2022-11-13.Line 16: Oh, sing to the Lord a new song!
2022-11-13.Line 17: FOR HE HAS DONE MARVELOUS THINGS;
2022-11-13.Line 19: His right hand and His holy arm
2022-11-13.Line 22: The Lord has made known His salvation;
2022-11-13.Line 23: HIS RIGHTEOUSNESS HE HAS REVEALED IN THE SIGHT OF THE NATIONS.
2022-11-13.Line 25: He has remembered His mercy and His faithfulness to the house of Israel;
2022-11-13.Line 26: ALL THE ENDS OF THE EARTH HAVE SEEN THE SALVATION OF OUR GOD.
2022-11-13.Line 28: Shout joyfully to the Lord, all the earth;
2022-11-13.Line 29: BREAK FORTH IN SONG, REJOICE, AND SING PRAISES.
2022-11-13.Line 31: Sing to the Lord with the harp,
2022-11-13.Line 32: WITH THE HARP AND THE SOUND OF A PSALM,
2022-11-13.Line 34: With trumpets and the sound of a horn;
2022-11-13.Line 35: SHOUT JOYFULLY BEFORE THE LORD, THE KING.
2022-11-13.Line 37: Let the sea roar, and all its fullness,
2022-11-13.Line 38: THE WORLD AND THOSE WHO DWELL IN IT;
2022-11-13.Line 40: Let the rivers clap their hands;
2022-11-13.Line 41: LET THE HILLS BE JOYFUL TOGETHER BEFORE THE LORD,
2022-11-13.Line 43: For He is coming to judge the earth
2022-11-13.Line 44: WITH RIGHTEOUSNESS HE SHALL JUDGE THE WORLD,
2022-11-13.Line 51: We praise You, O God, and we acknowledge You to be the Lord.
2022-11-13.Line 52: All creation worships You the Father everlasting.  To You the angels cry aloud, the heavens and all the powers therein.  To You cherubim and seraphim continually cry, Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God of the Angelic Armies.  Heaven and earth are full of the majesty of Your Glory.
2022-11-13.Line 53: We worship You Father, of an infinite majesty, together with Your true and only Son Whom we adore; together also with the Holy Ghost, Who is our Comforter.
2022-11-13.Line 54: Now hear us as we sing together the prayer our Lord has given us
2022-11-13.Line 57: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2022-11-13.Line 60: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2022-11-13.Line 61: Give us this day our daily bread,
2022-11-13.Line 62: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2022-11-13.Line 63: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2022-11-13.Line 64: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2022-11-13.Line 69: Saints of God, we are in need of cleansing and renewal. Let us call upon the mercy of our heavenly Father.  Let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently, then together.
2022-11-13.Line 74: O God our heavenly Father, we confess to you that we have grievously sinned against you in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that we are unable to fully understand, but which are all known to you. We are in need of deliverance from your enemies and our infirmities. For this reason, we flee for refuge to your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through Jesus Christ our Lord, Amen.
2022-11-13.Line 77: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!
2022-11-13.Line 79: Hear now the comforting assurance of the grace of God, promised in the Gospel to all who believe.  Holy Scripture says:  For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in Him might not perish, but have everlasting life.
2022-11-13.Line 82: All who continue to love their sin and shame, and persist in them, even against the conviction of their own conscience, I must declare to you, by God's command, that His wrath and judgment abides upon you, and that your sins are retained in heaven, and you will not be delivered from eternal judgment, unless you repent.
2022-11-13.Line 85: But, to every one of you beloved brothers and sisters, who hate your sins, and seek pardon through the merits of Jesus Christ alone, and who resolve each day to turn from your sins and to the Lord, to serve Him in true holiness and righteousness:
2022-11-13.Line 87: I declare, according to God's command, that from heaven you are released from all your sins (as Christ has promised in His Gospel), through the perfect satisfaction of the most holy passion and death of our Lord Jesus Christ.
2022-11-13.Line 89: And since we do not doubt that our prayers and worship are sanctified by the sufferings of Jesus Christ, and therefore acceptable and well-pleasing to God, I call upon you now, to
2022-11-13.Line 92: We lift them up to the Lord!
2022-11-13.Line 109: How Shall We Then Live?  Let us hear from God's Word.
2022-11-13.Line 118: For behold, the day is coming, Burning like an oven, And all the proud, yes, all who do wickedly will be stubble. And the day which is coming shall burn them up, Says the Lord of hosts,  That will leave them neither root nor branch. 2 But to you who fear My name The Sun of Righteousness shall arise With healing in His wings; And you shall go out And grow fat like stall-fed calves. 3 You shall trample the wicked, For they shall be ashes under the soles of your feet On the day that I do this, Says the Lord of hosts.
2022-11-13.Line 119: 4  Remember the Law of Moses, My servant, Which I commanded him in Horeb for all Israel, With the statutes and judgments. 5 Behold, I will send you Elijah the prophet Before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the Lord. 6 And he will turn The hearts of the fathers to the children, And the hearts of the children to their fathers, Lest I come and strike the earth with a curse.
2022-11-13.Line 128: Do not rebuke an older man, but exhort him as a father, younger men as brothers, 2 older women as mothers, younger women as sisters, with all purity.
2022-11-13.Line 129: 3 Honor widows who are really widows. 4 But if any widow has children or grandchildren, let them first learn to show piety at home and to repay their parents; for this is good and acceptable before God. 5 Now she who is really a widow, and left alone, trusts in God and continues in supplications and prayers night and day. 6 But she who lives in pleasure is dead while she lives. 7 And these things command, that they may be blameless. 8 But if anyone does not provide for his own, and especially for those of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
2022-11-13.Line 130: 9 Do not let a widow under sixty years old be taken into the number, and not unless she has been the wife of one man, 10 well reported for good works: if she has brought up children, if she has lodged strangers, if she has washed the saints' feet, if she has relieved the afflicted, if she has diligently followed every good work.
2022-11-13.Line 131: 11 But refuse the younger widows; for when they have begun to grow wanton against Christ, they desire to marry, 12 having condemnation because they have cast off their first faith. 13 And besides they learn to be idle, wandering about from house to house, and not only idle but also gossips and busybodies, saying things which they ought not. 14 Therefore I desire that the younger widows marry, bear children, manage the house, give no opportunity to the adversary to speak reproachfully. 15 For some have already turned aside after Satan. 16 If any believing man or woman has widows, let them relieve them, and do not let the church be burdened, that it may relieve those who are really widows.

2022-11-13.Line 139: God, My King, Thy Might Confessing, Psalm 145
2022-11-13.Line 149: (RISE for our Gospel Lesson and song)
2022-11-13.Line 156: Praise be to the Lord Jesus Christ!
2022-11-13.Line 160: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2022-11-13.Line 161: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.

2022-11-13.Line 241: November 14th - MATTHEW 6:19-20  Do not lay up for yourselves treasures on earth, where moth and rust destroy and where thieves break in and steal; but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust destroys and where thieves do not break in and steal.  For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
2022-11-13.Line 243: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, Guard us from living for the kinds of things that must be lost or destroyed.  Instead, grant us to live so as to gain great treasures in Heaven which can never be lost or destroyed.  Teach us, by Your Spirit, to seek first Your kingdom and Your righteousness.   Bless these, our gifts, through Jesus Christ our Lord we pray.  AMEN.
2022-11-13.Line 247: Rise now, as we pray together for THE CHURCH AND THE WORLD
2022-11-13.Line 251: As we have been gathered into one body by Your love,
2022-11-13.Line 252: Teach us to fear and love You, the living God,
2022-11-13.Line 253: And to put away our evil impulses and sinful strife,
2022-11-13.Line 254: That we might, from sincere hearts, love one another
2022-11-13.Line 255: As Christ our God dwells in our midst.
2022-11-13.Line 256: Grant us, our God, true charity and love, for where these are, You are.
2022-11-13.Line 257: And Grant us in the end to see the face of Christ our God in glory together with all Your Saints, which is the joy that is immense and good and never-ending.
2022-11-13.Line 260: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.
2022-11-13.Line 262: In our own community, we lift up to You  Full Gospel Hope Korean Church and pastor Om.  We thank You for our neighbors and friends and ask You to Bless them richly by Your Holy Spirit in their worship and church life and ministry together.
2022-11-13.Line 264: Outside our community, we lift up to You the work of Your Gospel as it is carried out all over the world.  Especially Peru Mission The Baker and Remirez families.  Bless especially their University Ministry and Christ Kids' ministry send them laborers for these and bless them in their labors that Your gospel may be proclaimed, known, and believed.
2022-11-13.Line 266: We also lift up to You Father, Your persecuted people all over the world, Especially today our brothers and sisters in  CHINA where so many still face  persecution for their Christian faith,   . Bless Wong and Shu, and all those like them, Who suffer homelessness and harassment for the sake of Christ.  Grant them wisdom and grace and Oh Father, overthrow the plans and work of all who seek to Harm Your Church and bless Your People in Your mercy and for the sake of Your own glory.
2022-11-13.Line 268: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2022-11-13.Line 271: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-13.Line 273: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-11-13.Line 275: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.

2022-11-13.Line 308: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-11-13.Line 310: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-11-13.Line 312: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-11-13.Line 314: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-13.Line 316: O God, we remember Your Word which assures us of Your special care and attention to the widows and so we thank You for those widows and single mothers in our congregation and ask You to both bless, comfort, provide for the many practical daily needs and protect each one under the shield of Your care, and make us more faithful servants and protectors of them after Your own example.
2022-11-13.Line 318: We especially lift up to You: Wanda Sadler, Gilda Winn, Heidi Mallory, Shirley Filar, Cori Sprenger and Hildegaard Inman Anne Redwine Lisa Simmons.
2022-11-13.Line 320: We ask that You would make us faithful ministers and servants of these and more aware of the needs we might serve for where You have placed us in our neighborhoods and this community.
2022-11-13.Line 322: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-13.Line 324: All these things and whatever else You know that we need, grant us, Gracious Father for the sake of our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ.  Amen.

2022-11-13.Line 441: Prayer giving thanks for the bread: (Didache):  we give you thanks, Father, for the life and the knowledge which You have revealed to us through Jesus Your servant. To You be glory for ever. Bless our meal now.  And as this broken bread scattered on the mountains was gathered and became one loaf, so too, may Your Church be gathered together from the ends of the earth into Your kingdom. Remember, Lord, your Church and deliver her from all evil. Perfect her in Your love; and, once she has been sanctified, gather her together from the four winds into the kingdom which You have prepared for her. For power and glory are Yours for ever through Jesus Christ.  Amen.
2022-11-13.Line 444: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus, on the same night in which He was betrayed, took bread
2022-11-13.Line 466: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this as the remembrance of Me."
2022-11-13.Line 468: The body of Christ given for you!
2022-11-13.Line 473: Prayer giving thanks for the cup  : (Didache)
2022-11-13.Line 475: Almighty Ruler, You created all things for the sake of Your name; You gave men food and drink for us so that we might enjoy it and give You thanks.  And now You have favored us through Jesus, Your servant, with spiritual food and drink as well as with eternal life. We thank You, holy Father, for Your Holy name which You have enshrined in our hearts. We thank You for the knowledge and faith and immortality which You revealed to us through Your servant Jesus, the Holy Vine of David. Above all we thank You because You are mighty. To You be glory for ever. May grace come and this world pass away! Hosanna to the God of David. If anyone is holy, let him come. If anyone is not, let him repent. Maranatha. Amen.

2022-11-20.Line 1: 47th LORD'S DAY-November 21, 2021  Christ the King Sunday
2022-11-20.Line 2: PSALM 24 - Lift up your heads, O gates! and be lifted up, O ancient doors! that the King of glory may come in.  Who is this King of glory? The LORD of hosts, he is the King of glory!
2022-11-20.Line 5: Rise and Let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.
2022-11-20.Line 7: Come all the ends of the earth.  Remember and turn to the LORD!
2022-11-20.Line 8: LET ALL THE FAMILIES OF THE EARTH WORSHIP THE LORD!
2022-11-20.Line 13: O come, let us sing to the LORD;
2022-11-20.Line 14: LET US MAKE A JOYFUL NOISE TO THE ROCK OF OUR SALVATION!
2022-11-20.Line 16: Let us come into his presence with thanksgiving;
2022-11-20.Line 17: LET US MAKE A JOYFUL NOISE TO HIM WITH SONGS OF PRAISE!
2022-11-20.Line 19: For the Lord is a great God,
2022-11-20.Line 20: AND A GREAT KING ABOVE ALL GODS.
2022-11-20.Line 22: In his hand are the depths of the earth;
2022-11-20.Line 23: THE HEIGHTS OF THE MOUNTAINS ARE HIS ALSO.
2022-11-20.Line 25: The sea is his, for he made it;
2022-11-20.Line 26: FOR HIS HANDS FORMED THE DRY LAND.
2022-11-20.Line 28: O come, let us worship and bow down,
2022-11-20.Line 29: LET US KNEEL BEFORE THE LORD, OUR MAKER!
2022-11-20.Line 31: For he is our God, and we are the people of his pasture,
2022-11-20.Line 32: AND THE SHEEP OF HIS HAND.
2022-11-20.Line 34: O that today you would hearken to his voice!
2022-11-20.Line 35: HARDEN NOT YOUR HEARTS, AS AT MERIBAH,
2022-11-20.Line 37: As on the day at Massah in the wilderness,
2022-11-20.Line 40: And put me to the proof, though they had seen my work.
2022-11-20.Line 41: FOR FORTY YEARS I LOATHED THAT GENERATION
2022-11-20.Line 43: And said, "they are a people who err in heart,
2022-11-20.Line 44: AND THEY DO NOT REGARD MY WAYS."
2022-11-20.Line 46: Therefore I swore in my anger  THAT THEY SHOULD NOT ENTER MY REST.
2022-11-20.Line 48: Entrance Hymn    Why Do Heathen Nations Vainly Rage (Psalm 2)
2022-11-20.Line 51: * Prayer of Adoration and The Lord's Prayer    ....
2022-11-20.Line 53: O God, You are God and there is no other.  You are all-knowing; all powerful; and all-good.
2022-11-20.Line 54: You have prepared a final reward for Your children beyond any goodness our imaginations can even suspect.  And in this life itself, You shield us from lies and destructions.
2022-11-20.Line 55: You make known to us the path of life and light by the strength of Your Spirit and within the Kingdom of Your Son, our Lord Jesus Christ.  Stir us today, to work and will that which is well pleasing in Your sight.
2022-11-20.Line 56: Grant us Your Holy Spirit's power to live in light of the glorious truths we confess, that Christ is King above all other Kings.  He is seated on the Throne until You put every enemy beneath His scarred feet.  Help our unbelief, and hear us now as we worship and kiss the Son, singing the prayer He has given us:...
2022-11-20.Line 60: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2022-11-20.Line 63: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2022-11-20.Line 64: Give us this day our daily bread,
2022-11-20.Line 65: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2022-11-20.Line 66: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2022-11-20.Line 67: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2022-11-20.Line 73: Elder:  People of God, we are in need of cleansing and renewal.  Let us humbly kneel, and make confession to God, imploring his forgiveness, through Jesus Christ our Lord.
2022-11-20.Line 76: *CONFESSION OF SIN........... (Psalm 51:7-13)...... LET US PRAY TOGETHER
2022-11-20.Line 78: O God our heavenly Father, we confess to you that we have grievously sinned against you in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that we are unable to fully understand, but which are all known to you. We are in need of deliverance from your enemies and our infirmities. For this reason, we flee for refuge to your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through Jesus Christ our Lord, Amen.
2022-11-20.Line 80: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!
2022-11-20.Line 82: *STAND TO HEAR COMFORTING WORDS OF PARDON:  .. . Psalm 145:14-18
2022-11-20.Line 87: The Lord upholds all who fall, and raises up all those who are bowed down.
2022-11-20.Line 88: The eyes of all look expectantly to You, and You give them their food in due season.  You open Your hand and satisfy the desire of every living thing.
2022-11-20.Line 89: The Lord is righteous in all His ways, and kind in all His doings.
2022-11-20.Line 90: The Lord is near to all who call upon Him, to all who call upon Him in truth.
2022-11-20.Line 92: *DECLARATION OF FORGIVENESS  .Our heavenly Father, in His great mercy, has given His only Son to die for us, and for His sake forgives all our sins.  To all who confess their sin to God and seek His forgiveness, to all whose eyes look expectantly to God, to all who call upon Him in truth, God draws near to you and for Christ's sake, declares the forgiveness of all your sins.

In Jesus our Lord.  Amen.
