2022-11-20.Line 270: November 21st-MATTHEW 6:24  No one can serve two masters; for either he will hate the one and love the other, or else he will be loyal to the one and despise the other.  You cannot serve God and mammon.
2022-11-20.Line 272: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, Deliver us from serving the wrong master.  Deliver us from serving the things that are given rather than the One Who has given us all things richly to enjoy.  By Your Holy Spirit, grant us such loyalty and love for You that we may bear the testimony of despising Mammon.  For You are our only true and good Master, O God.  We give You ourselves, and we give You our gifts.  So bless them in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-11-20.Line 274: Now Rise and let us pray together for the CHURCH AND THE WORLD
2022-11-20.Line 278: You are holy, the God of majesty, and blessed is Jesus Christ, your Son, our Lord. Born as king in David's Line, but living a life of meekness to care for the lowly.  His power was revealed in weakness, His majesty in mercy. His captors knelt to mock him, giving him bruises instead of praise, and piercing thorns for a crown. Yet even in His death, He prayed for His tormentors. So You have made a throne of their cross and turned their scorn back upon them.
2022-11-20.Line 279: From the grave you raised Him to your right hand where He rules as King and Judge of all - Lord of all Lords and King of all kings.   So Illumine our lives by the mysterious fact of His Kingship Give us victory as His faithful crossbearers and give us ever growing strength and unity through the body of Him by Whom and for Whom all things were created.
2022-11-20.Line 281: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2022-11-20.Line 283: In our own community, we lift up to You Crosspoint Church and Pastors Ausley; Smith; Fuller; Macon, and the rest of their pastors, ministers, and officers.
2022-11-20.Line 284: Grant them faithfulness and the grace of Your Spirit and fidelity to You so that Your Word would be proclaimed, believed, and obeyed and this community blessed by their efforts.
2022-11-20.Line 286: We also lift up to you Rocky Bayou Christian School   [list needs]
2022-11-20.Line 290: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in INDIA. Pour out Your Spirit upon them Pastor Rajan, the house churches where he ministers, and all those like him who are attacked and persecuted for Christ's sake.  Protect and provide for them.  Empower them by Your Holy Spirit to be wise as serpents and innocent as doves. Turn that great Land to the truth and life in King Jesus bring them to bow before and kiss Your Son.
2022-11-20.Line 292: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-20.Line 294: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-11-20.Line 296: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-11-20.Line 322: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-11-20.Line 324: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-11-20.Line 325: Lindsey Aiken, Emily Knie, Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, Tori Patterson, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-11-20.Line 328: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-11-20.Line 330: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-11-20.Line 332: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-11-20.Line 334: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-20.Line 336: Heavenly Father, We ask You to guide the nations of the world into the way of justice and truth, and establish among them peace which is the fruit of righteousness making them the kingdom of our Lord and of His Christ. We pray also for our own country. Grant us repentance from our grievous national sins.  And grant wisdom to those You've set over us in authority as government, on the federal, state, and local levels.  Especially bless those newly-elected officials.
2022-11-20.Line 337: We thank You for Your blessing upon our military and ask that the strength of our military would only every be used in ways that conform to Your Will and righteous standard.
2022-11-20.Line 339: We entrust to Your care and protection our servicemen and women: Josh Stevenson; Caleb Akin; Trent Hamilton; Corban Pierce; Bobby Dixon; Jacoby Baker; Austin & Bekah Denigan; Kent Winn, Pablo DeJesus, Shawn Lowe, Noah Mosley, Murray Hemstreet, Matt Adelstein, Chris Stanton, Lexi Turner, and Braden Fitzsimmons.
2022-11-20.Line 341: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-20.Line 343: Now our Father as we come to this Your table,  further conform us to our Savior so that we can live and know the peace that passes all comprehension, for we thank You present our whole selves to You along with these requests in His strong and holy name and in Your Spirit.  Amen.
2022-11-20.Line 347: Christians, in Whom do you trust?
2022-11-20.Line 350: I believe in one God: the Father Almighty,
2022-11-20.Line 352: and of all things visible and invisible;
2022-11-20.Line 354: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,
2022-11-20.Line 355: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2022-11-20.Line 356: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2022-11-20.Line 358: being of one substance with the Father;
2022-11-20.Line 359: by Whom all things were made;
2022-11-20.Line 360: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2022-11-20.Line 362: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2022-11-20.Line 364: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2022-11-20.Line 367: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2022-11-20.Line 369: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2022-11-20.Line 370: and He shall come again with glory
2022-11-20.Line 371: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2022-11-20.Line 372: Whose kingdom shall have no end.
2022-11-20.Line 374: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,
2022-11-20.Line 375: Who proceedeth from the Father and the Son;
2022-11-20.Line 376: Who with the Father and the Son
2022-11-20.Line 380: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;

2022-11-20.Line 393: [At this point, Dr. Rasmussen, stand behind the communion table.  The elders will have come forward and be seated behind you.  Then read the following]:
2022-11-20.Line 397: In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him. In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
2022-11-20.Line 400: Most gracious God!  As Your Son once offered up His body and blood on the cross for the remission of our sins, and has given his body and blood to us as our food and drink unto life eternal: So give us grace, with sincere hearts and fervent desires, to receive this great blessing from His hands so that we would no longer to live for ourselves in sin; but may Christ live in us, and lead us to the life that is holy, blessed, and faithful forever.  Amen.
2022-11-20.Line 404: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2022-11-20.Line 407: [Dr. Rasmussen, after speaking these lines as the pianist begins to play, hand a serving/bread plate to each of the elders on your right and left.  They will begin to distribute row by row.  While they do, remain standing behind the table and sing [at the Name of Jesus].
2022-11-20.Line 408: When they are finished distributing, they will file forward from the back and hand you whatever is left.  Just replace them on the serving plates.  Take one of the remaining pieces in your hand and please make sure that each of the elders receives a piece of bread

2022-11-20.Line 414: Bread                                                                          At the Name of Jesus
2022-11-20.Line 446: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2022-11-20.Line 448: The body of Christ given for you!
2022-11-20.Line 452: [Then take a small piece for yourself and partake with everyone.  After you are done, begin reading below:]
2022-11-20.Line 458: Heavenly Father, make us true partakers of the new and everlasting covenant, and fit us to now celebrate the blessed memorial of Your Son.  Bless and grow us by the contemplation of His love, and show us the benefits of His death; that receiving fresh increase of strength in Your faith and in all good works, we may with greater confidence cry to You our Father, and evermore rejoice in You; We thank You, Through Jesus Christ, our Redeemer, Who shed His blood that we might live and ascended to Your side that we may always receive our Help from You.  Amen.

2022-11-27.Line 174: 2 Now it shall come to pass in the latter days That the mountain of the Lord's house Shall be established on the top of the mountains, And shall be exalted above the hills; And all nations shall flow to it. 3 Many people shall come and say,  Come, and let us go up to the mountain of the Lord, To the house of the God of Jacob; He will teach us His ways, And we shall walk in His paths. For out of Zion shall go forth the law, And the word of the Lord from Jerusalem. 4 He shall judge between the nations, And rebuke many people; They shall beat their swords into plowshares, And their spears into pruning hooks; Nation shall not lift up sword against nation, Neither shall they learn war anymore.

2022-11-27.Line 239: Preaching of the Word  Pastor Ben Rossell
2022-11-27.Line 300: MATTHEW  6:31-33 -- "...do not worry, saying, 'What shall we eat?' or 'What shall we drink?' or 'What shall we wear?'  For after all these things the Gentiles seek. For your heavenly Father knows that you need all these things.  But seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things shall be added to you.
2022-11-27.Line 302: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, You have told us not to be anxious about our lives worrying about what we are going to eat or drink or wear.  You lavishly provide for the birds and the flowers.  Yet it is so hard for us not to be troubled about the material things of this world. Our lives are often like rat-races, focused entirely on acquiring things for ourselves and our families.  Help us to rest in Your great love and Your wise provision.  By Your Spirit, cause us to see our lives as part of Your great kingdom, and to seek it first with Your righteousness.  As we offer these gifts to You today, we confess that all that we are and all that we have belong to You.  In Jesus' name we pray. AMEN.
2022-11-27.Line 305: And now, rise, and let us pray FOR THE CHURCH AND WORLD
2022-11-27.Line 307: We thank You for Your incredible kindness to us, through Jesus Christ, our King, Who made even the cross to become a throne and has poured out His blood for us and Your Spirit to us, and has become the King of all Creation, seated at Your Right Hand.  Give us grace to live in full allegiance to our King, and to show forth our allegiance in our lives by acts of service to Your people, as Your Son has commanded us.  Make us strong and make us faithful.  And hasten the day when every foe is made His footstool.  Hasten the day when the nations are under His Kind yoke!
2022-11-27.Line 309: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.
2022-11-27.Line 311: Here in our community: Jonathan and Natalie Memorial Christian Hospital in Bangledesh Son Remington infection required hospitalization recovered more quickly than expected traveling back to Bangledesh
2022-11-27.Line 314: In our own community, we lift up to You Sovereign Grace Church of Valparaiso and Pastor Bill Cain
2022-11-27.Line 315: Grant them faithfulness and the grace of Your Spirit and fidelity to Your Word nourished by the milk and meat of Your Word they would grow in the grace and knowledge of the Lord Jesus and abound in the righteous fruits of Your Spirit!
2022-11-27.Line 317: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today lifting up to You our brothers and sisters in   Iran for Sara Homayoun serving prison sentences for hosting a home church.  Sustain them by Your Spirit during this trial and deliver them from unjust laws and oppression.
2022-11-27.Line 318: Provide for and protect them a  watch over Your Church there, give Her wisdom  and strengthen her faith.  Bless them with fruit.  Prosper Your Gospel and Your Church there in Your mercy and for Your glory.
2022-11-27.Line 320: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2022-11-27.Line 322: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious
2022-11-27.Line 324: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-11-27.Line 326: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-11-27.Line 352: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-11-27.Line 354: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-11-27.Line 355: Lindsey Aiken, Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, Tori Patterson, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-11-27.Line 357: Thank you for safe birth of Cash to Emily & Trever bless both.
2022-11-27.Line 359: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-11-27.Line 361: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-11-27.Line 363: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-11-27.Line 365: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-27.Line 367: We thank You, Lord God of heaven and earth, that in Christ Jesus we have redemption, the forgiveness of sins. We give thanks that in Christ we have been blessed with every spiritual blessing. We give thanks for the countless ways this is evident in our nation and church and, especially for your abundant blessing to us in and through our families.
2022-11-27.Line 368: We ask that You would continue to bless our homes - both spiritually and materially.
2022-11-27.Line 369: And today especially we lift up to Your throne of mercy those of our loved ones who have strayed or wandered from the path of obedience which is the way of life.  We remember those who are under the discipline or censure of Your Church and pray for them now together with others who need Your grace and help in our silent prayers:
2022-11-27.Line 370: Lord in Your mercy bring back those who have erred and strayed like lost sheep.
2022-11-27.Line 372: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-11-27.Line 375: And now, our Heavenly Father, As we approach Your Table, we anticipation Your blessing, We come with much weakness, fatigue, discouragement, indecision, and many sins so give the help and light and enlivening grace of Your Spirit, for we come by faith in our Lord Jesus and make all our prayers in His strong and holy name.   Amen.

2022-11-27.Line 493: in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.  Amen.  Let us pray:
2022-11-27.Line 495: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #9
2022-11-27.Line 496: (Adapted from The Order of Worship of the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-11-27.Line 498: Almighty and everlasting God, Who by the blood of Your dear Son has consecrated for us a new and living way into the holiest of all; Cleanse the thoughts of our minds by the inspiration of Your Holy Spirit, that we, Your redeemed people, drawing near to You in these holy mysteries, with a true heart and undefiled conscience, in full assurance of faith, may offer unto You an acceptable sacrifice in righteousness, and worthily magnify Your great and glorious name.  We thank You now, Heavenly Father, for this bread, the body of Christ for us today.  Through Jesus Christ our Lord.  Amen.
2022-11-27.Line 502: I received from the Lord that which I also delivered to you: that the Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2022-11-27.Line 505: Bread                                               Of The Father's Love Begotten
2022-11-27.Line 534: 5. This is He whom seers in old time chanted of with one accord, Whom the Scriptures of the prophets promised in their faithful word; Now He shines, the long-expected; let creation praise its Lord, Evermore and evermore.
2022-11-27.Line 535: 6. Righteous judge of souls departed, righteous King of them that live, On the Father's throne exalted, none in might with Thee may strive; Who at last in vengeance coming sinners from Thy face shalt drive, Evermore and evermore!
2022-11-27.Line 536: 7. O ye heights of heaven adore Him; angel hosts, His praises sing; Powers, dominions, bow before Him, and extol our God and King! Let no tongue on earth be silent, every voice in concert ring, Evermore and evermore!
2022-11-27.Line 537: 8. Thee let age, and thee let manhood, infant lips their praises sing; Matrons, virgins, little maidens, with glad voices answering: Let their guileless songs re-echo, and the heart its music bring, Evermore and evermore!
2022-11-27.Line 538: 9. Christ, to Thee with God the Father, and, O Holy Ghost, to Thee, Hymn and chant with high thanksgiving, and unwearied praises be: Honor, glory, and dominion, and eternal victory, Evermore and evermore!
2022-11-27.Line 541: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2022-11-27.Line 543: The body of Christ given for you!
2022-11-27.Line 547: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #9:
2022-11-27.Line 548: (Adapted from The Order of Worship of the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-11-27.Line 549: For all Your mercies and favors, known to us and unknown, we give You thanks.  But most of all, we praise You, the Father everlasting, for the gift of Your beloved, true and only Son, our Savior Jesus Christ, Who by His appearing has abolished death and brought life and immortality to light through the Gospel.  We bless You for His incarnation, His life on earth; for His sufferings and death on the cross; for His resurrection from the dead; and for His ascension to Your right hand.  We bless You for the giving of the Holy Spirit; for the institution of the Church; for the means of grace; for the hope of everlasting life; and for the glory which shall be brought to us at the coming, and in the kingdom of Your dear Son.  We give You thanks now for His blood, shed for us and for the forgiveness of our sins.  In Jesus' name.  Amen.

2022-12-04.Line 3: Luke 21 Be vigilant and pray without ceasing, that you may worthily endure the things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.
2022-12-04.Line 5: Rise and worship the Triune God
2022-12-04.Line 6: Sing and Rejoice, for lo, I come;
2022-12-04.Line 7: And God will dwell in our midst, says the Lord.
2022-12-04.Line 8: It is high time to awake out of your sleep:
2022-12-04.Line 9: For now is the time of our salvation nearer than when we first believed.
2022-12-04.Line 10: The night is far spent, the day is at hand:
2022-12-04.Line 11: Let us therefore cast off the works of darkness and put on the armor of light.
2022-12-04.Line 17: Give the king Your judgments, O God,
2022-12-04.Line 18: AND YOUR RIGHTEOUSNESS TO THE KING'S SON.
2022-12-04.Line 20: He will judge Your people with righteousness,
2022-12-04.Line 23: The mountains will bring peace to the people,
2022-12-04.Line 24: AND THE LITTLE HILLS, BY RIGHTEOUSNESS.
2022-12-04.Line 27: TO THE POOR OF THE PEOPLE;
2022-12-04.Line 29: He will save the children of the needy,
2022-12-04.Line 30: AND WILL BREAK IN PIECES THE OPPRESSOR.
2022-12-04.Line 32: They shall fear You as long as the sun and moon endure,
2022-12-04.Line 35: He shall  come down like rain upon the mown grass,
2022-12-04.Line 36: LIKE SHOWERS THAT WATER THE EARTH.
2022-12-04.Line 38: In His days the righteous shall flourish,
2022-12-04.Line 39: AND ABUNDANCE OF PEACE, UNTIL THE MOON IS NO MORE.
2022-12-04.Line 41: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea,
2022-12-04.Line 42: AND FROM THE RIVER TO THE ENDS OF THE EARTH.
2022-12-04.Line 44: Those who dwell in the wilderness will bow before Him,
2022-12-04.Line 45: AND HIS ENEMIES WILL LICK THE DUST.
2022-12-04.Line 49: Entrance Hymn                Jesus Shall Reign,  Psalm 72
2022-12-04.Line 53: We praise You, Father, for being our strength and refuge.  You shelter us under the shadow of Your mighty wing.  And Your salvation is near to those who fear You, that glory may dwell in our land.  In Your Son, Mercy and truth have met together, righteousness and peace have kissed each other. Truth has sprung out of the earth, and righteousness has come down from heaven.
2022-12-04.Line 54: Stir up our hearts, O Lord, to prepare the way for Your Son.  By His coming, give us strength to shed His light abroad.  Make His footsteps our pathway.  For we ask it in the name of Your only begotten Son Jesus, singing the prayer He has given us
2022-12-04.Line 58: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2022-12-04.Line 61: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2022-12-04.Line 62: Give us this day our daily bread,
2022-12-04.Line 63: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2022-12-04.Line 64: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2022-12-04.Line 65: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2022-12-04.Line 70: People of God we are in need of cleansing and renewal.  Let us humbly kneel, and make confession to God, imploring his forgiveness, through Jesus Christ our  Lord.  (Let all who are able kneel)
2022-12-04.Line 72: CONFESSION OF SIN................................. LET US PRAY TOGETHER
2022-12-04.Line 74: Most merciful God, I confess to You that I am by nature sinful and unclean, and that I have sinned against You in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that I am not able to understand, but which are all known to You. For this reason, I flee for refuge to Your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your grace, through my Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
2022-12-04.Line 78: Arise and hear the good news of God's FORGIVENESS
2022-12-04.Line 80: ROMANS 8:32-34   He who did not spare His own Son, but delivered Him up for us all, how shall He not with Him also freely give us all things?  Who shall bring a charge against God's elect?  It is God who justifies.  Who is he who condemns? It is Christ Jesus who died, yes, who was raised from the dead, Who is at the right hand of God, who indeed intercedes for us.
2022-12-04.Line 82: Our heavenly father, in His great mercy, did not spare His own Son, but has delivered Him up for us all.  He does not condemn you, but for Christ's sake forgives all your sins.
2022-12-04.Line 86: We lift them up to the Lord!
2022-12-04.Line 105: How Shall We Then Live?  Let us hear from God's Word.
2022-12-04.Line 124: There shall come forth a Rod from the stem of Jesse, And a Branch shall grow out of his roots. 2 The Spirit of the Lord shall rest upon Him, The Spirit of wisdom and understanding, The Spirit of counsel and might, The Spirit of knowledge and of the fear of the Lord.
2022-12-04.Line 125: 3 His delight is in the fear of the Lord, And He shall not judge by the sight of His eyes, Nor decide by the hearing of His ears; 4 But with righteousness He shall judge the poor, And decide with equity for the meek of the earth; He shall strike the earth with the rod of His mouth, And with the breath of His lips He shall slay the wicked. 5 Righteousness shall be the belt of His loins, And faithfulness the belt of His waist.
2022-12-04.Line 126: 6  The wolf also shall dwell with the lamb, The leopard shall lie down with the young goat, The calf and the young lion and the fatling together; And a little child shall lead them. 7 The cow and the bear shall graze; Their young ones shall lie down together; And the lion shall eat straw like the ox. 8 The nursing child shall play by the cobra's hole, And the weaned child shall put his hand in the viper's den. 9 They shall not hurt nor destroy in all My holy mountain, For the earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Lord As the waters cover the sea.
2022-12-04.Line 127: 10  And in that day there shall be a Root of Jesse, Who shall stand as a banner to the people; For the Gentiles shall seek Him, And His resting place shall be glorious.
2022-12-04.Line 136: Let as many bondservants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honor, so that the name of God and His doctrine may not be blasphemed. 2 And those who have believing masters, let them not despise them because they are brethren, but rather serve them because those who are benefited are believers and beloved. Teach and exhort these things.
2022-12-04.Line 137: 3 If anyone teaches otherwise and does not consent to wholesome words, even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which accords with godliness, 4 he is proud, knowing nothing, but is obsessed with disputes and arguments over words, from which come envy, strife, reviling, evil suspicions, 5 useless wranglings of men of corrupt minds and destitute of the truth, who suppose that godliness is a means of gain. From such withdraw yourself.
2022-12-04.Line 138: 6 Now godliness with contentment is great gain. 7 For we brought nothing into this world, and it is certain we can carry nothing out. 8 And having food and clothing, with these we shall be content.
2022-12-04.Line 140: 9 But those who desire to be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and harmful lusts which drown men in destruction and perdition. 10 For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil, for which some have strayed from the faith in their greediness, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.

2022-12-04.Line 227: MATTHEW 7:12   whatever you want men to do to you, do also to them, for this is the law and the prophets.
2022-12-04.Line 229: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, purge us from the sins of selfishness and self-centeredness; from being quickly offended when others don't do what we expect.  By Your Spirit, turn our lives upside down and inside out, that we might obey You, by putting the good of others ahead of our own.  By our giving today, we seek to honor You and to  do unto others as we would have them do unto us.  Take these tithes and offerings along with our lives and let them be consecrated, Lord, to You.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-12-04.Line 243: And now, rise, and let us pray FOR THE CHURCH AND WORLD
2022-12-04.Line 245: You are the Most High and there is no other, nor is any good but You.
2022-12-04.Line 246: Visit us and shine the full light of Your blessing upon us this year, gracious Lord.
2022-12-04.Line 247: Stir up within our hearts a longing to see our Lord Jesus and to be with You.  Stir up within our hearts a visible love for our invisible God.   Grow us up into faithful members of His Body.  Teach us to come to Him Who came to us as the desire of the nations.  Purify our hearts as the Refiner does His silver until in it's purity You may see in us the undefiled reflection of Your Own Image, the perfection of our Lord Jesus, Who has come to take our poor flesh and blood upon Himself and claims us as blood-brothers.
2022-12-04.Line 249: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2022-12-04.Line 251: In our own community, we lift up to You Blue Water Bay Community Church and church planter Pastor Clint Akins and pastor Dean Allen.  Give Him and them the grace and wisdom of Your Spirit to walk faithfully with You and grow them in Your Word.  Stir up their hearts and ours to love You more fully and each other more warmly.
2022-12-04.Line 253: Outside our community, we lift up to You Ernest & Tiffany Clark
2022-12-04.Line 256: Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in COTE d' IVOIRE pray for two Christian children, Yacouba and Flora, whose parents have rejected them after they became Christians. They have had to flee to the local church and though living conditions are difficult, they remain committed to Christ.  Send them the strength of Your Holy Spirit to persevere with hope through unthinkable trials.  Use their testimony to turn many to Christ.  And give Your Church in those lands, power, grace and wisdom in Christ.  Turn aside the wicked men who harm Your children.  Send Your gospel forth in victory in our world.

2022-12-04.Line 418: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #10  (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-12-04.Line 419: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we pray that You will send down the powerful benediction of Your Holy Spirit upon these elements of bread and wine, that they may become to us the sign and seal to us of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; so that in this use of them we may be made, through the power of the Holy Spirit, to partake really and truly of His blessed life, by which alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give you heartfelt thanks for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ.  In His blessed name.  Amen.

From such withdraw yourself.
2022-12-11.Line 128: 6 Now godliness with contentment is great gain. 7 For we brought nothing into this world, and it is certain we can carry nothing out. 8 And having food and clothing, with these we shall be content. 9 But those who desire to be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and harmful lusts which drown men in destruction and perdition. 10 For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil, for which some have strayed from the faith in their greediness, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.

2022-12-11.Line 306: December 12th-MATTHEW 10:7-8 When Jesus sent out His twelve apostles, He said to them,  As you go, preach, saying, ‘The kingdom of heaven is at hand.'  Heal the sick, cleanse the leper, raise the dead, cast out demons.  Freely you have received, freely give.
2022-12-11.Line 308: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, We too have freely received, and by this Scripture, You call us to freely give.  You did not spare Your own Son, but delivered Him up for us all; and with Him You have freely given us all things (Rom.8:32).  Because of the immeasurable gifts of Your kingdom make us grateful proclaimers of the gospel wherever we go.  Bless these offerings that by them Your Kingdom purposes would be fulfilled for healing, cleansing, and raising men, and casting out Your enemies.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-12-11.Line 315: And now, rise, and let us pray FOR THE CHURCH AND WORLD
2022-12-11.Line 318: You are the God Who gives discipline and comfort both because of Your love and faithfulness.  And now You call us to humble vigilance, and keep ourselves unspotted, blameless, and in Your peace.
2022-12-11.Line 319: Forgive us for the ways we stray from You and leave off seeking Your Kingdom and Your righteousness.  Give us the power, grace, and comfort of Your Spirit to obey you in these things.    - that we might shake off our complacency and persevere as You have called us to with patience and hope.
2022-12-11.Line 320: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.
2022-12-11.Line 321: In our own community, we lift up to You Generations United Church and Pastor Daniels and the many others who worship and minister there
2022-12-11.Line 322: Grant them faithfulness and the grace of Your Spirit and fidelity to Your Word nourished by the milk and meat of Your Word they would grow in the grace and knowledge of the Lord Jesus and abound in the righteous fruits of Your Spirit!
2022-12-11.Line 323: Father, bless also the work of Good News Jail & Prison Ministries.  Bring the lost to Yourself through their labors.  Grant them also traveling mercies as they prepare to return to us shortly.
2022-12-11.Line 325: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today lifting up to You our brothers and sisters in Afghanistan, especially those imprisoned just last month for their Christian ministry.  Give them the comfort of Your Holy Spirit and send them help.  Fill them with wisdom and grace and grant justice in that land, overthrow the works of those who oppose You and Your Bride, the Church.
2022-12-11.Line 329: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious
2022-12-11.Line 331: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-12-11.Line 333: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-12-11.Line 358: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-12-11.Line 360: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-12-11.Line 361: Lindsey Aiken, Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-12-11.Line 363: Thank YOU for the safe delivery of babies to Jane Ellen DeJesus and Bonnie Rossell continue to grant health and recovery to mother and son.
2022-12-11.Line 365: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-12-11.Line 367: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-12-11.Line 369: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-12-11.Line 371: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-12-11.Line 372: We lift up to You today our young adults and those who have moved away for college or military training.
2022-12-11.Line 373: We ask that You would bless their lives with the mighty strength of Your Spirit

2022-12-11.Line 493: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #11 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-12-11.Line 494: Be pleased now, O most merciful Father, to graciously receive at our hands this memorial of the blessed sacrifice of Your Son.  In union with Christ and His one sacrifice, we offer to You, O Lord, the reasonable sacrifices of ourselves, consecrating ourselves on the altar of the gospel, in soul and body, property and life, to Your most blessed service and praise. We thank You for Christ, the Bread of Life, and we thank You for this bread that is now before us.  In partaking of this bread, may we truly partake of Christ.  In His name.  Amen.

2022-12-11.Line 567: Look upon us through the mediation of our great High Priest, Heavenly Father, and make us accepted in the Beloved. We thank You now for the blood of Jesus Christ, that blood that was shed for our sins, and we thank You for this cup before us.  In partaking of it, may we truly partake of Christ and His sacrifice for us.

2022-12-18.Line 109: 10 Moreover the Lord spoke again to Ahaz, saying, 11  Ask a sign for yourself from the Lord your God; ask it either in the depth or in the height above.
2022-12-18.Line 110: 12 But Ahaz said,  I will not ask, nor will I test the Lord!
2022-12-18.Line 111: 13 Then he said,  Hear now, O house of David! Is it a small thing for you to weary men, but will you weary my God also? 14 Therefore the Lord Himself will give you a sign: Behold, the virgin shall conceive and bear a Son, and shall call His name Immanuel. 15 Curds and honey He shall eat, that He may know to refuse the evil and choose the good. 16 For before the Child shall know to refuse the evil and choose the good, the land that you dread will be forsaken by both her kings. 17 The Lord will bring the king of Assyria upon you and your people and your father's house days that have not come since the day that Ephraim departed from Judah.
2022-12-18.Line 120: 9 But those who desire to be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and harmful lusts which drown men in destruction and perdition. 10 For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil, for which some have strayed from the faith in their greediness, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.
2022-12-18.Line 121: 11 But you, O man of God, flee these things and pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, gentleness. 12 Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, to which you were also called and have confessed the good confession in the presence of many witnesses. 13 I urge you in the sight of God who gives life to all things, and before Christ Jesus who witnessed the good confession before Pontius Pilate, 14 that you keep this commandment without spot, blameless until our Lord Jesus Christ's appearing, 15 which He will manifest in His own time, He who is the blessed and only [e]Potentate, the King of kings and Lord of lords, 16 who alone has immortality, dwelling in unapproachable light, whom no man has seen or can see, to whom be honor and everlasting power. Amen.
2022-12-18.Line 122: 17 Command those who are rich in this present age not to be haughty, nor to trust in uncertain riches but in the living God, who gives us richly all things to enjoy. 18 Let them do good, that they be rich in good works, ready to give, willing to share, 19 storing up for themselves a good foundation for the time to come, that they may lay hold on eternal life.

2022-12-18.Line 177: Prayer for Illumination Gracious Father You alone are wise.  And You alone are able to strengthen us   to bring about the obedience of faith so come and visit us with the blessed light of Your Spirit's illumination upon Your Word in our minds and hearts.  For we ask it in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2022-12-18.Line 180: Preaching of the Word  Pastor Ben Rossell
2022-12-18.Line 183: Offertory                                     Soul Adorn Thyself with Gladness
2022-12-18.Line 270: Now he in the parable who received seed among the thorns is he who hears the word, and the cares of this world and the deceitfulness of riches choke the word, and he becomes unfruitful.
2022-12-18.Line 272: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, We thank You for the seed of Your word sown in our hearts.  Deliver us from the cares of this world and the deception of riches that choke Your word and keep us from bearing You fruit.  Guard us from being absorbed by thoughts of wealth and accumulation and anything that would stand in the way of Your will as the first priority of our lives.  Give us Your grace to bear good hearers with fruitful understanding that may bear you fruit thirty, sixty, and a hundredfold.  By Your Spirit, make us true believers in Your Word which we professed and sung and prayed together today.  Bless our offerings and bless and use us for Your Kingdom this week.  For Jesus' sake.  AMEN.
2022-12-18.Line 283: And now, rise, and pray with me FOR THE CHURCH AND WORLD
2022-12-18.Line 289: Uphold us so that we not leave off our garments of praise or let the oil of our gladness run dry.  You have given us the garland of beauty in giving us the name of Christ to bear in the world.  Give us the might of Your Spirit to bear it faithfully, grant us renewed joy, constancy of prayer, and hearts of gratitude at all times.
2022-12-18.Line 291: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2022-12-18.Line 293: In our own community, we lift up to You  Westminster Presbyterian Church and pastors Chad Watkins and Knox White and retired pastor, now counselor Bill Tyson.  Would You continue to grant them Your blessing, protect them from harm and divisions keep them and guide them in Your truth by Your Spirit.  Empower them to be wise and faithful in ministry and bless them to know Your peace and joy and to see the fruit from their ministry labors.
2022-12-18.Line 295: Outside our community, we lift up to the work of Thomas and Julie.  Bless them with fruitful ministry as well as time to grow as a family and receive rest and refreshment.  Bless Thomas in his preaching next week, and continue to Provide abundantly for their needs through the SBC mission board and ongoing drive.  Finally, bless their partners who've recently adopted a daughter, establish them as a family in Your love and help them as they adjust to new life together there serving you on the mission field.
2022-12-18.Line 297: We also lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in IRAN, where protests and civil unrest have broken out.  Give them Your Holy Spirit and grace to be wise as serpents and innocent as doves.  Protect Your Church from dangers, and work even through these times to release them from persecutions.  Provide mightily for them and their families and churches that they may be faithful to You.  Raise up righteous judges and leaders in that land and spare Your children -  send Your light and bless it there.
2022-12-18.Line 299: Guard and provide for all your churches, ministers, refugees and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and the border regions.  In Your mercy bring hostilities to an end and grant Your people true unity in Your Holy Spirit across all lines of human division.
2022-12-18.Line 301: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious
2022-12-18.Line 303: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-12-18.Line 305: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-12-18.Line 329: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-12-18.Line 331: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-12-18.Line 332: Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, Jane Ellen DeJesus, and Bonnie Rossell - together with their unborn children.
2022-12-18.Line 334: Thank YOU for the safe delivery of John Calvin to Lindsey Akin continue to grant health and recovery to mother and son.
2022-12-18.Line 336: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-12-18.Line 338: Father, in Your mercy, comfort the Lawyer family after the death of Your servant and minister, Mike, this week.  Thank you for his testimony and ministry grant peace to all those who mourn his homegoing.
2022-12-18.Line 340: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-12-18.Line 342: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious
2022-12-18.Line 343: Gracious Father, we thank You for the good and beautiful order You have established in our world, and the place our lives and our congregation fit into that order.  We thank You for the orders of authority within which You have placed us and from which we receive so many often unacknowledged blessings.  Especially today, we give You thanks for our Communion of Reformed and Evangelical Churches, and for those who serve and lead us.  We pray for the Churches of our Athanasius Presbytery, those that are struggling and those that are stable, be gracious and Help each one as is fitting.  Bless and empower our Presiding Minister Uri Brito and Pro Tem Joe Thacker.  Bless all their labors in their own congregations and also for our Presbytery.  And we pray for our CREC Presiding Minister, Virgil Hurt, and Pro Tem Bryant.   Bless these men for their pains and labors on our behalf and for Your glory.  Empower our new leaders with might, wisdom, and grace of Your Spirit.  Give them discernment and a fruitful vision for their leadership.  And bless these two [very different] men with peace and unity, the bond of Your Spirit, that they would grow and synergistically gain from working with one another in Your service.
2022-12-18.Line 345: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-12-18.Line 347: Now our Father as we come to this Your word and Your table,  we present ourselves to You with the request that You would further conform us in our minds, hearts, and souls - to the Image of our Lord Jesus.  For we pray in His strong and holy name.   Amen.

2022-12-18.Line 407: in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.  Amen.  Let us pray:
2022-12-18.Line 409: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #12 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-12-18.Line 410: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we pray that You will send down the powerful benediction of Your Holy Spirit upon these elements of bread and wine, that they may become to us the sign and seal to us of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; so that in this use of them we may be made, through the power of the Holy Spirit, to partake really and truly of His blessed life, by which alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give you heartfelt thanks for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ.  In His blessed name.  Amen.
2022-12-18.Line 415: Holy Scripture says: that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2022-12-18.Line 420: Bread                                                                                        O Come, O Come Emmanuel
2022-12-18.Line 440: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2022-12-18.Line 442: The body of Christ given for you!

2022-12-25.Line 17: AND THE PEOPLE PLOT A VAIN THING?
2022-12-25.Line 19: The kings of the earth set themselves,
2022-12-25.Line 20: AND THE RULERS TAKE COUNSEL TOGETHER,
2022-12-25.Line 22: Against the Lord and against His anointed, saying,
2022-12-25.Line 23: "LET US BREAK THEIR BONDS IN PIECES
2022-12-25.Line 24: AND CAST AWAY THEIR CORDS FROM US."
2022-12-25.Line 26: He who sits in the heavens shall laugh;
2022-12-25.Line 27: THE LORD SHALL HOLD THEM IN DERISION.
2022-12-25.Line 29: Then He shall speak to them in His wrath,
2022-12-25.Line 30: AND DISTRESS THEM IN HIS DEEP DISPLEASURE:
2022-12-25.Line 32: "Yet I have set My King on My holy hill of Zion."
2022-12-25.Line 35: The Lord has said to Me,

2022-12-25.Line 42: YOU SHALL DASH THEM IN PIECES LIKE A POTTER'S VESSEL.'"

2022-12-25.Line 111: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one! You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your strength. And these words which I command you today shall be in your heart. You shall teach them diligently to your children, and shall talk of them when you sit in your house, when you walk by the way, when you lie down, and when you rise up  For the promise is to you and to your children, and to all who are afar off, as many as the Lord our God will call.
2022-12-25.Line 114: DEARLY BELOVED, the sacrament of baptism is for little children because God our Father, Who has redeemed us by the sacrifice of Christ, is also the God and Father of our children.  They belong, with us who believe, to the membership of the Church through the covenant made with Christ. Our own Westminster Confession of Faith says that baptism is a sign and seal of the covenant of grace, of our ingrafting into Christ, of regeneration, of remission of sins, and of our giving up unto God, through Jesus Christ, to walk in the newness of life.
2022-12-25.Line 116: Our Lord Jesus said,  Allow the little children to come unto Me, and do not forbid them, for of such is the kingdom of God.
2022-12-25.Line 118: Trever and Emily, is Jesus Christ your only Lord and Savior?
2022-12-25.Line 120: You know that, in presenting your son, that God requires things of you
2022-12-25.Line 122: 1.        In presenting your son for baptism, you are acknowledging your need and his of the cleansing blood of Jesus Christ and the renewing grace of the Holy Spirit.
2022-12-25.Line 124: 2.    You are claiming God's covenant promise in his behalf, God's promise to be a God to you and to your descendants after you, and you are looking in faith to the Lord Jesus Christ for his salvation, as you do for your own.
2022-12-25.Line 126: 3.    You are now unreservedly committing him to God, and promising, in humble reliance upon divine grace, that you will endeavor to set before him a Godly example, that you will pray with and for her, that you will teach him the doctrines of the Christian faith, and that you will strive, by all the means of God's appointment, to bring him up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
2022-12-25.Line 127: These are the baptismal duties God requires of you do you vow to obey Him by His grace and help?  [response: We do]
2022-12-25.Line 129: QUESTION TO THE CONGREGATION: God calls you as the Body of Christ to assist these parents in the Christian nurture of this child? Will you respond with a hearty  Amen and commit to undertake this responsibility by God's grace and help?
2022-12-25.Line 137: Cassius Quentin,  I BAPTIZE YOU IN THE NAME OF THE FATHER AND THE SON AND THE HOLY SPIRIT.
2022-12-25.Line 139: THE BLESSINGS OF THE TRIUNE GOD BE WITH YOU ALWAYS.
2022-12-25.Line 145: This child, being thus baptized, is a member of the household of faith; committed to the care and instruction of these parents and this congregation, to the end that she may mature and grow strong as a disciple of the Lord Jesus Christ, and serve in the royal priesthood of God's elect from every tribe and tongue and nation. Jesus said,  Whoever receives one such little child in My name, receives Me.
2022-12-25.Line 147: In the words of the Ministers of the Westminster Assembly, our forefathers in the faith,
2022-12-25.Line 148: I want to admonish every one of you present who just witnessed this baptism
2022-12-25.Line 150: to look back to your own baptism;
2022-12-25.Line 156: First looking back to your own baptism means repenting right now - of any sins against your covenant with God; If you are living in sin, remember your baptismal duties to God and repent, today!
2022-12-25.Line 158: And second, stir up your faith; the world around us in no help to a right faith a life of trusting obedience to God and hope in His promises to be fulfilled in us as we persevere to the end.  So stir up your faith; nurture it; feed it; exercise it; strengthen it keep on.
2022-12-25.Line 160: In these ways you will improve and make right use of your baptism, for there is a covenant sealed by your baptism betwixt God and your soul.  Never forget it.  It is a great honor and gift to belong to God in this way.
2022-12-25.Line 163: Please rise for our prayer of blessing which we will close together by singing of the Lord's Prayer:
2022-12-25.Line 166: You righteously judged the unfaithful world through flood waters, but in Your great mercy, saved faithful Noah with his household.
2022-12-25.Line 168: You drowned hard-hearted Pharaoh with all his army in the Sea, but led Your people Israel through on dry ground, prefiguring the washing of Your holy baptism.
2022-12-25.Line 170: By the baptism of Your dear Son, You sanctified and set apart the Jordan River and all water for a saving flood, and an ample washing away of sins.
2022-12-25.Line 172: Through Your same infinite mercy, graciously look down now upon Henry, and bless her with a right faith in the Spirit, so that through this saving flood all that was born in him from Adam and all that has been added to it might be drowned and cleansed.
2022-12-25.Line 174: Separate him now from the unfaithful, and preserve him in the holy ark of Christendom dry and safe, ever fervent in spirit and joyful in hope to serve Your holy name,
2022-12-25.Line 176: so that he, together with us and all Your Faithful, may worthily inherit Your promise of eternal life, through Christ Jesus our Lord.
2022-12-25.Line 178: Now hear us as we sing the prayer He taught us:
2022-12-25.Line 181: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2022-12-25.Line 184: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2022-12-25.Line 185: Give us this day our daily bread,
2022-12-25.Line 186: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2022-12-25.Line 187: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2022-12-25.Line 188: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2022-12-25.Line 195: People of God, we who are washed still need God's continual cleansing and renewal.  So as Scripture calls us to bow before God in worship, I invite all who are able to kneel for prayer now as we pray first silently, and then corporately, confessing our sins to God.
2022-12-25.Line 197: CONFESSION OF SIN...................... LET US PRAY TOGETHER
2022-12-25.Line 200: Let us pray together  Most merciful God, I confess to You that I am by nature sinful and unclean, and that I have sinned against You in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that I am not able to understand, but which are all known to You. For this reason, I flee for refuge to Your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your grace, through my Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
2022-12-25.Line 203: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!
2022-12-25.Line 205: I John 1:8-9; 4:10  -  If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.  If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
2022-12-25.Line 207: To you who have confessed the truth that you have sin asking God's forgiveness by faith in Christ the Father assures you that He has heard your prayer and that for the Son's sake all our sins are forgiven.

For the Lord has comforted His people, He has redeemed Jerusalem. 10 The Lord has made bare His holy arm In the eyes of all the nations; And all the ends of the earth shall see The salvation of our God.

2022-12-25.Line 361: -MATTHEW 13:44-46  The kingdom of heaven is like treasure hidden in a field, which a man found and hid; and for joy over it he goes and sells all that he has and buys that field.  Again, the kingdom of heaven is like a merchant seeking beautiful pearls, who, when he had found one pearl of great price, went and sold all that he had and bought it.
2022-12-25.Line 363: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, kindle in us a right sense of zeal for Your Kingdom.  Deliver us from watering down the cost of discipleship by faintly seeking to pay our dues with little tokens of our time and money and energies.  Give us hearts that sacrifice all to follow You by lives joyfully centered on Your word and will.   As we give our money, we give ourselves to You in the service of Your kingdom.  Bless our offerings, for we present them in the name of the One who loved us and gave Himself for us, even Jesus Christ, Your Son, our Lord.  AMEN.
2022-12-25.Line 370: We praise You our Gracious Heavenly Father for Your love and for the gift of Your only-begotten Son  born of the virgin Mary to take our nature upon Himself that we may be raised and glorified to share in His.  We praise You, Oh Christ, for the scandal of Your birth in the form of a bondservant in the likeness of our flesh and for the scandal of Your obedient death, even the accursed death of the cross.
2022-12-25.Line 371: We praise You, Spirit, for the unspeakable gift of our Savior Jesus, the Word made flesh, to Whom and in Whom You have united us that we may abound in good works and grow up into our Head.  So continue that good work and bring it to perfection in us.
2022-12-25.Line 373: We ask not only for ourselves but for all your people in all the world.
2022-12-25.Line 375: In our own community, we lift up to You: All God's Children and the Living Word and pastor Walter Williams.  We pray that they along with us would abound in love more and more with knowledge and all discernment, so that they might approve what is excellent, and so be pure and blameless before Christ.  Fill them with the fruit of righteousness that comes through Jesus to the glory and praise of God.
2022-12-25.Line 376: Outside our community, we lift up to the work of HOPE RUSSIA.  Bless Your ministers and churches across that great land.  Especially Ruslan and his family and the churchplant efforts at Nakhodka and Latvia, as well as the expanding youth ministry in Siberia.  Provide abundantly for the needs of these ministries and bless the word and work of Your ministers with lasting fruit!
2022-12-25.Line 378: We also lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, esp our brothers and sisters in India our brothers in the faith Durgawati and Guslan; expelled from their village and persecuted because of their Christian testimony.  Provide abundantly for their practical needs and bless the Christians who have taken them in and helped them.  Thank You for the holy power of their testimony to bless their enemies and overcome evil with good, as Your word commands us.  Hear and answer their prayers bring their families to peace with You through Your Son, Christ.
2022-12-25.Line 379: Guard and provide for all your churches, ministers, refugees and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and the border regions.  In Your mercy bring hostilities to an end and grant Your people true unity in Your Holy Spirit across all lines of human division.
2022-12-25.Line 382: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious
2022-12-25.Line 384: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2022-12-25.Line 386: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2022-12-25.Line 410: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2022-12-25.Line 412: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2022-12-25.Line 413: Ashton Beno, and Brittany Waldron, and Sarah Waldron - together with their unborn children.
2022-12-25.Line 416: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2022-12-25.Line 418: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2022-12-25.Line 420: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2022-12-25.Line 422: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious
2022-12-25.Line 423: Gracious Father, according to Your Word we thank You for law and order and for the authorities You have placed over us.  We lift up to You President Biden, his advisors, as well as our national law makers and federal judges.
2022-12-25.Line 424: Give them Your wisdom, a clear sense of good and righteous judgment, and the conviction to govern rightly so that Your People here may lead quiet, peaceable lives in all godliness and reverence.  Help us to learn to honor them as the authority You have placed over us, while also fearing and obeying You as our ultimate Authority.
2022-12-25.Line 426: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2022-12-25.Line 427: And now, our Heavenly Father, As we approach Your Table, once again, fill our hearts with joy and our tongues with praise for the great works which You have done in sending us Your Son so that we might be made Your Sons and heirs.  We thank You and ask all these things in the strong and holy name of Jesus.   Amen.

2022-12-25.Line 459: Who with the Father and the Son
2022-12-25.Line 463: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;

2022-12-25.Line 465: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,

2022-12-25.Line 505: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #13 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2022-12-25.Line 506: Be pleased now, O most merciful Father, to graciously receive at our hands this memorial of the blessed sacrifice of Your Son.  In union with Christ and His one sacrifice, we offer to You, O Lord, the reasonable sacrifices of ourselves, consecrating ourselves on the altar of the gospel, in soul and body, property and life, to Your most blessed service and praise. We thank You for Christ, the Bread of Life, and we thank You for this bread that is now before us.  In partaking of this bread, may we truly partake of Christ.  In His name.  Amen.
2022-12-25.Line 511: Holy Scripture says: that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2022-12-25.Line 513: Communion Exhortation                                                                                                                     Bread                          All My Heart This Night Rejoices
2022-12-25.Line 526: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2022-12-25.Line 528: The body of Christ given for you!
2022-12-25.Line 536: Look upon us through the mediation of our great High Priest, Heavenly Father, and make us accepted in the Beloved.  Let His name be as pure and holy incense, through which all our worship may come up before You, as the odor of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, well pleasing to God.  We thank You now for the blood of Jesus Christ, that blood that was shed for our sins, and we thank You for this cup before us.  In partaking of it, may we truly partake of Christ and His sacrifice for us.
2022-12-25.Line 538: In the same manner He also took the cup also after supper
2022-12-25.Line 540: Cup                                                            Hark! The Herald Angels Sing
2022-12-25.Line 568: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, in remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you show forth your Lord's death until His return.
2022-12-25.Line 570: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2022-12-25.Line 576: O give thanks to the Lord for He is good!
2022-12-25.Line 580: Praise God from whom all blessing flow,                                                                                                   Praise Him all creatures here below
2022-12-25.Line 581: Praise Him above ye heavenly host,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen!
2022-12-25.Line 589: .you shall receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you; and you shall  be witnesses to Me in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the end of the earth.
2022-12-25.Line 593: Now the God of peace Himself sanctify you wholly;
2022-12-25.Line 594: and may your spirit and soul and body be kept sound and blameless
2022-12-25.Line 595: at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
2022-12-25.Line 596: He who calls you is faithful, and He will do what He has said.

2023-01-01.Line 1: 1st  LORD'S DAY-JANUARY 1, 2023   Second Sunday after Christmas
2023-01-01.Line 4: HEB 4:15  We do not have a High Priest untouched by the feelings of our weaknesses; but was in every point tempted like we are, yet without sin.  Therefore, let us come boldly unto the throne of Grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in our time of need!
2023-01-01.Line 6: RISE and let us worship God!  We are gathered together this morning in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit,
2023-01-01.Line 8: For unto us a child is born;                                                                                                                 Unto us a Son is given
2023-01-01.Line 9: And the government shall be upon His shoulder: And His name shall be called:                                                                     Wonderful, Counselor, the mighty God, the everlasting Father, the Prince of Peace.
2023-01-01.Line 10: Glory to God in the Highest                                                                                                                   And on earth, peace and good will toward men.
2023-01-01.Line 16: I WILL PRAISE THE LORD WITH MY WHOLE HEART,
2023-01-01.Line 17: IN THE ASSEMBLY OF THE UPRIGHT AND IN THE CONGREGATION.
2023-01-01.Line 19: The works of the LORD are great,
2023-01-01.Line 20: STUDIED BY ALL WHO HAVE PLEASURE IN THEM.
2023-01-01.Line 22: His work is honorable and glorious,
2023-01-01.Line 25: He has made His wonderful works to be remembered;
2023-01-01.Line 26: THE LORD IS GRACIOUS AND FULL OF COMPASSION.
2023-01-01.Line 28: He has given food to those who fear Him;
2023-01-01.Line 29: HE WILL EVER BE MINDFUL OF HIS COVENANT.
2023-01-01.Line 31: He has declared to His people the power of His works,
2023-01-01.Line 32: IN GIVING THEM THE HERITAGE OF THE NATIONS.
2023-01-01.Line 34: The works of His hands are verity and justice; ALL HIS PRECEPTS ARE SURE.
2023-01-01.Line 36: They stand fast forever and ever, AND ARE DONE IN TRUTH AND UPRIGHTNESS.
2023-01-01.Line 38: He has sent redemption to His people;
2023-01-01.Line 39: HE HAS COMMANDED HIS COVENANT FOREVER:
2023-01-01.Line 41: Holy and awesome is His name.
2023-01-01.Line 42: THE FEAR OF THE LORD IS THE BEGINNING OF WISDOM;
2023-01-01.Line 44: A good understanding have all those who do His commandments.
2023-01-01.Line 46: Entrance Hymn                                O Come All Ye Faithful
2023-01-01.Line 94: Heavenly Father, We praise You for the noble and flawless Cornerstone which You laid to support and bear up Zion the Savior of Israel, Jesus our Lord, born to bring about the rising and falling of many.  He is the foundation of our life and the joy of man's desiring.  Teach us, Father, to despise the sins of the world, and lead us from sorrow to joy in Christ, our eternal Light.  Place our Feet and strengthen our steps upon the path of faith.  For we walk there following after our Lord Jesus.
2023-01-01.Line 96: Now hear us as we sing the prayer He taught us:
2023-01-01.Line 100: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-01-01.Line 103: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-01-01.Line 104: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-01-01.Line 105: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-01-01.Line 106: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-01-01.Line 107: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-01-01.Line 110: People of God there is no better way to begin a new [calendar] year than by opening ourselves up before our God confessing our sins to Him, Who is eager to forgive them and receiving in turn His cleansing and renewal.
2023-01-01.Line 111: So as He calls us to in His Word, come, let us worship and bow down; I invite all who are able to kneel as we begin our service in prayer and confession - praying silently at first, then in unison.
2023-01-01.Line 113: Let us pray together  Have mercy upon me, O God, According to Your loving-kindness; According to the multitude of Your tender mercies, Blot out my transgressions. Wash me thoroughly from my iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin. For I acknowledge my transgressions, and my sin is always before me. I have sinned against You, O God, and done evil in Your sight.  Therefore, You are just as both Witness and Judge.  Truly, I was brought forth in iniquity, and in sin my mother conceived me. Behold, You desire truth in the inward parts, and in the hidden part You will make me to know wisdom. So purge me with hyssop and I shall be clean.  Wash me and I shall be whiter than snow, for the sake of Your Son, my Lord, Jesus Christ.  Amen!
2023-01-01.Line 118: Arise and hear good news of God's forgiveness       Exodus 33:19-21
2023-01-01.Line 120: [The Lord said to Moses]:  "I will make all My goodness pass before you, and I will proclaim the name of the Lord before you. I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion  But You cannot see My face; for no man shall see Me, and live Here is a place by Me, and you shall stand on the rock. So it shall be, while My glory passes by, that I will put you in the cleft of the rock, and will cover you with My hand while I pass by.
2023-01-01.Line 123: [People of God, I proclaim to you in the name of the Lord, that God has placed You in the Rock cleft or split for you; as your shelter! God has covered You with His Own hand, and for the sake of Jesus Christ His Son forgives all your sins].
2023-01-01.Line 125: Leader: Lift up your hearts!  People: We lift them up to the Lord.
2023-01-01.Line 145: How Shall We Then Live?  Let us hear from God's Word
2023-01-01.Line 207: I will mention the lovingkindnesses of the Lord And the praises of the Lord, According to all that the Lord has bestowed on us, And the great goodness toward the house of Israel, Which He has bestowed on them according to His mercies, According to the multitude of His lovingkindnesses. 8 For He said,  Surely they are My people, Children who will not lie. So He became their Savior.
2023-01-01.Line 208: 9 In all their affliction He was afflicted,
2023-01-01.Line 209: And the Angel of His Presence saved them; In His love and in His pity He redeemed them; And He bore them and carried them All the days of old. 10 But they rebelled and grieved His Holy Spirit; So He turned Himself against them as an enemy, And He fought against them.

2023-01-01.Line 212: Where is He who put His Holy Spirit within them, 12 Who led them by the right hand of Moses, With His glorious arm, Dividing the water before them To make for Himself an everlasting name, 13 Who led them through the deep, As a horse in the wilderness, That they might not stumble?
2023-01-01.Line 213: 14 As a beast goes down into the valley, And the Spirit of the Lord causes him to rest, So You lead Your people, To make Yourself a glorious name.
2023-01-01.Line 215: The Word of the Lord! Thanks be to God!
2023-01-01.Line 223: 4 But when the fullness of the time had come, God sent forth His Son, born of a woman, born under the law, 5 to redeem those who were under the law, that we might receive the adoption as sons.
2023-01-01.Line 224: 6 And because you are sons, God has sent forth the Spirit of His Son into your hearts, crying out,  Abba, Father! 7 Therefore you are no longer a slave but a son, and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.
2023-01-01.Line 268: Praise be to the Lord Jesus Christ!
2023-01-01.Line 274: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2023-01-01.Line 275: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.
2023-01-01.Line 281: Gracious Father, He Who has You has everything.  He Who has all else beside You, has nothing at all.  Send us now the light of Your Spirit as a loving and faithful Father, so that we, Your children may hear, believe, honor, and love Your Word.  In Jesus' name.  Amen.
2023-01-01.Line 284: Preaching of the Word  Pastor Ben Rossell
2023-01-01.Line 291: Offertory                  Lo How A Rose E're Blooming
2023-01-01.Line 335: MATTHEW 23:23 --"Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin, and have neglected the weightier matters of the law: justice and mercy and faith. These you ought to have done, without leaving the others undone.
2023-01-01.Line 337: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, guard us from hypocrisy and deliver us from giving in a cold, legalistic, proud way, like the Pharisees did.  As we present our gifts to You now, keep us from hypocrisy, and teach us to give generously from the heart for Your glory and the good of others, obeying You with delight.  Bless our offerings, in the name of Jesus, who gave Himself for us.  AMEN.
2023-01-01.Line 340: Now Rise and pray with me for the CHURCH AND THE WORLD!
2023-01-01.Line 342: We thank You, Father in Heaven, for being a faithful Father for the birth of our Savior, Who was born to defy the Devil and conquer the gates of Hell and by Whom we have been reconciled to You, and in Whom we may know fullness of joy.  Comfort us in the face of danger at the remembrance of the Christ child.  Overcome the wicked enemy by Your strength and protection in Christ's body here as we follow Him Who was born to die to save sinners, of whom we are such.
2023-01-01.Line 343: Thank You for bringing Your chosen flock to this new year, make it one of true jubilation in Him Who saves us from our sins and delivers us from our sorrows.
2023-01-01.Line 345: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-01-01.Line 347: In our own community, we lift up to You  1st AG Valparaiso Pastor Doug Suvino.  Uphold and strengthen the Church of Our Savior that it may be led more and more into the way of truth and righteousness; that Your people might not only believe but do those things which are pleasing in Your sight and so show forth Your praises that men may see their good works and glorify You.
2023-01-01.Line 349: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in INDIA where Christian families are forced out of their villages, made refugees, even sometimes attacked by Hindu leaders.  Father deliver Your faithful people from the hands of their persecutors and from Your enemies who prey upon them.  Raise up righteous judges and leaders in that land and spare Your children -  send Your light and bless it there and turn back the hearts of men from every false religion by the Mighty power of Your Spirit to the grace of Christ's gospel of true peace.  Guard and bless the tremendous efforts of ICC as they minister to the needs of Your persecuted people, both body and soul, in India and each of their 25 countries of operation.
2023-01-01.Line 351: Oh Lord, Hear our Prayers! [for You are gracious].
2023-01-01.Line 353: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious
2023-01-01.Line 355: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2023-01-01.Line 357: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2023-01-01.Line 381: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2023-01-01.Line 383: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2023-01-01.Line 384: Brittany Waldron, and Sarah Waldron - together with their unborn children.
2023-01-01.Line 386: Thank You for the kind blessing of a son to Andrew andAshton Beno continue to grant healing and growth to mother and son.
2023-01-01.Line 388: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2023-01-01.Line 390: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2023-01-01.Line 392: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-01-01.Line 394: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS!  For You are gracious
2023-01-01.Line 395: Father, to these we add every unborn child in our land. Heavenly Father, we pray to you for them with confidence and firm trust knowing that it is your Holy Will to remove the scourge of abortion on demand from off the face of Your earth. Thank you for the many ways in which we have seen it diminished in recent years. Continue these victories by Your mercy. Change the minds and melt the hearts of all who promote this evil, or who seek abortion as a remedy for the troubles of their lives, which troubles are for many very great. Make us in our lives a testimony of sexual purity, cherishers of human life, lovers and helpers of our neighbors, guardians and adopters of the fatherless and unwanted, honorers of Your holy image wherever it is found in mankind, and willing sacrificers of ourselves, our comforts and possessions in service to Your Kingdom and Your righteousness.
2023-01-01.Line 397: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-01-01.Line 399: Now our Father as we come to Your table,  we offer ourselves to You and only ask that after breaking us, You would bind us and conform us in our minds, hearts, and souls - to the Image of our Lord Jesus.  Strengthen our shoulders and steady our feet so that we may continue onward faithfully bearing His cross.  For we pray in His strong and holy name.  Amen.

2023-01-01.Line 516: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #1: (BCW) Gracious God, pour out Your Holy Spirit upon us and upon these Your gifts of bread and wine, that the bread we break and the cup we bless may be the communion of the body and blood of Christ.  By Your Spirit unite us with the living Christ and with all who are baptized in His name, that we may be one in ministry in every place. As this bread is Christ's body for us, send us out to be the body of Christ in the world.

2023-01-08.Line 92: Blessed are You, O Lord the God of Jacob our Father, for ever and ever.  Yours, O Lord, is the greatness and the power and the glory; the victory and the majesty; all that is in the heavens and in the earth is Yours.  Yours is the kingdom, O Lord, and You are exalted as Head above all.  In Your hand are power and might; You make great; You give strength to all.  Thank You, our God, for calling us a people who walked in great darkness into Your marvelous light.  Hear us in our prayers and fill us and our world with even more of Your gospel light.    And hear us now as we sing the prayer our Lord Jesus has given us:

2023-01-08.Line 112: Let us pray together   Have mercy upon me, O God, According to Your loving-kindness; According to the multitude of Your tender mercies, Blot out my transgressions. Wash me thoroughly from my iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin. For I acknowledge my transgressions, and my sin is always before me. I have sinned against You, O God, and done evil in Your sight.  Therefore, You are just as both Witness and Judge.  Truly, I was brought forth in iniquity, and in sin my mother conceived me. Behold, You desire truth in the inward parts, and in the hidden part You will make me to know wisdom. So purge me with hyssop and I shall be clean.  Wash me and I shall be whiter than snow, for the sake of Your Son, my Lord, Jesus Christ.  Amen!

Now the blood shall be a sign for you on the houses where you are. And when I see the blood, I will pass over you; and the plague shall not be on you to destroy you when I strike the land of Egypt .
