2023-02-26.Line 1: 9th  LORD'S DAY- FIRST SUNDAY IN LENT
2023-02-26.Line 2: Ps99 - Exalt the Lord our God, and worship at His holy hill.
2023-02-26.Line 3: For the Lord our God is holy.
2023-02-26.Line 5: Rise and worship God!  We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.          Amen.
2023-02-26.Line 6: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near;
2023-02-26.Line 7: let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts;
2023-02-26.Line 8: let him return to the Lord, that he may have compassion on him, and to our God, for He will abundantly pardon.
2023-02-26.Line 12: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven,  WHOSE SIN IS COVERED.
2023-02-26.Line 14: Blessed is the man to whom the LORD does not impute iniquity
2023-02-26.Line 15: AND IN WHOSE SPIRIT THERE IS NO DECEIT.
2023-02-26.Line 17: When I kept silent, my bones grew old
2023-02-26.Line 18: THROUGH MY GROANING ALL THE DAY LONG.
2023-02-26.Line 20: For day and night Your hand was heavy upon me;
2023-02-26.Line 21: MY VITALITY WAS TURNED INTO THE DROUGHT OF SUMMER.
2023-02-26.Line 23: I acknowledge my sin to You.  AND MY INIQUITY I HAVE NOT HIDDEN.
2023-02-26.Line 25: I said,  I will confess my transgressions to the LORD,
2023-02-26.Line 26: AND YOU FORGAVE THE INIQUITY OF MY SIN.
2023-02-26.Line 28: For this cause everyone who is godly shall pray to You IN A TIME WHEN YOU MAY BE FOUND
2023-02-26.Line 30: Surely in a flood of great waters  THEY SHALL NOT COME NEAR HIM.
2023-02-26.Line 32: You are my hiding place; You shall preserve me from trouble;
2023-02-26.Line 33: YOU SHALL SURROUND ME WITH SONGS OF DELIVERANCE.
2023-02-26.Line 35: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go;
2023-02-26.Line 36: I WILL GUIDE YOU WITH MY EYE.
2023-02-26.Line 38: Do not be like the horse or like the mule,  WHICH HAVE NO UNDERSTANDING,
2023-02-26.Line 40: Which must be harnessed with bit and bridle, ELSE THEY WILL NOT COME NEAR YOU.
2023-02-26.Line 42: Many sorrows shall be to the wicked;
2023-02-26.Line 43: BUT HE WHO TRUSTS IN THE LORD, MERCY SHALL SURROUND HIM.
2023-02-26.Line 45: Be glad in the LORD and rejoice, you righteous;
2023-02-26.Line 46: AND SHOUT FOR JOY, ALL YOU UPRIGHT IN HEART!
2023-02-26.Line 56: Every good and perfect gift is from above, O Lord, and comes down from You, the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shadow of change.  Of Your own will You brought us forth by the word of truth, that we might be a kind of firstfruits of Your creatures.  O Father of Lights, take away the darkness of our hearts and minds, and illumine Your word for us, that we might receive instruction from Your truth and reflect Your glory as lights in this dark world, as cities set on a hill that cannot be hidden.  For we come to You only through our Lord Jesus Christ, the Light of the World. in Jesus' name, singing together the prayer He has given us
2023-02-26.Line 59: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-02-26.Line 62: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-02-26.Line 63: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-02-26.Line 64: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-02-26.Line 65: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-02-26.Line 66: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-02-26.Line 70: Leader:  People of Christ, we have begun the season of repentance.  So let us  humbly kneel, and sincerely make confession to God, imploring his forgiveness, through Jesus Christ our Lord.
2023-02-26.Line 74: O God, our heavenly Father, I confess to You that I have grievously sinned against You in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that I am unable fully to understand, but which are all known to You. I am in need of deliverance from Your enemies and mine infirmities. For this reason I flee for refuge to Your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through my Lord, Jesus Christ. Amen.
2023-02-26.Line 77: Arise and the hear good news of God's forgiveness
2023-02-26.Line 81: Out of the depths have I cried to You, O Lord; Lord hear my voice!  Let Your ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.  If You, Lord, should mark iniquities, O Lord, who could stand?  But there is forgiveness with You, that You may be feared.  I wait for the Lord, my soul waits, and in His word do I hope.  My soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning--more than watchmen for the morning.  O Israel, hope in the Lord; for with the Lord is steadfast love, and with Him is plenteous redemption.  And He shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
2023-02-26.Line 83: [To you who have confessed your sin to God, seeking His forgiveness, to all who cry to the Lord out of the depths, who wait for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning, God declares His steadfast love and plenteous redemption.  There is forgiveness with God, that He may be feared. People of God, for Christ's sake, Your merciful Father forgives all your sins].
2023-02-26.Line 85: Lift up your hearts! We lift them up to the Lord!
2023-02-26.Line 92: How Shall We Then Live?  Let us hear from God's Word.
2023-02-26.Line 158: 3 Now the serpent was more crafty than any other beast of the field that the Lord God had made.
2023-02-26.Line 159: He said to the woman,  Did God actually say, ‘You shall not eat of any tree in the garden'? 2 And the woman said to the serpent,  We may eat of the fruit of the trees in the garden, 3 but God said, ‘You shall not eat of the fruit of the tree that is in the midst of the garden, neither shall you touch it, lest you die.' 4 But the serpent said to the woman,  You will not surely die. 5 For God knows that when you eat of it your eyes will be opened, and you will be like God, knowing good and evil. 6 So when the woman saw that the tree was good for food, and that it was a delight to the eyes, and that the tree was to be desired to make one wise, she took of its fruit and ate, and she also gave some to her husband who was with her, and he ate. 7 Then the eyes of both were opened, and they knew that they were naked. And they sewed fig leaves together and made themselves loincloths.
2023-02-26.Line 160: 8 And they heard the sound of the Lord God walking in the garden in the cool of the day, and the man and his wife hid themselves from the presence of the Lord God among the trees of the garden. 9 But the Lord God called to the man and said to him,  Where are you? 10 And he said,  I heard the sound of you in the garden, and I was afraid, because I was naked, and I hid myself. 11 He said,  Who told you that you were naked? Have you eaten of the tree of which I commanded you not to eat? 12 The man said,  The woman whom you gave to be with me, she gave me fruit of the tree, and I ate. 13 Then the Lord God said to the woman,  What is this that you have done? The woman said,  The serpent deceived me, and I ate.
2023-02-26.Line 161: 14 The Lord God said to the serpent,
2023-02-26.Line 162: Because you have done this, cursed are you above all livestock     and above all beasts of the field; on your belly you shall go,     and dust you shall eat all the days of your life. 15 I will put enmity between you and the woman, and between your offspring and her offspring;  he shall bruise your head, and you shall bruise his heel.
2023-02-26.Line 164: I will surely multiply your pain in childbearing; in pain you shall bring forth children. Your desire shall be contrary to your husband, but he shall rule over you.
2023-02-26.Line 166: Because you have listened to the voice of your wife and have eaten of the tree of which I commanded you, ‘You shall not eat of it,' cursed is the ground because of you;  in pain you shall eat of it all the days of your life; 18 thorns and thistles it shall bring forth for you; and you shall eat the plants of the field. 19 By the sweat of your face you shall eat bread, till you return to the ground, for out of it you were taken; for you are dust, and to dust you shall return.
2023-02-26.Line 167: 20 The man called his wife's name Eve, because she was the mother of all living. 21 And the Lord God made for Adam and for his wife garments of skins and clothed them.
2023-02-26.Line 173: 12 Therefore, just as sin came into the world through one man, and death through sin, and so death spread to all men because all sinned  13 for sin indeed was in the world before the law was given, but sin is not counted where there is no law. 14 Yet death reigned from Adam to Moses, even over those whose sinning was not like the transgression of Adam, who was a type of the one who was to come.
2023-02-26.Line 174: 15 But the free gift is not like the trespass. For if many died through one man's trespass, much more have the grace of God and the free gift by the grace of that one man Jesus Christ abounded for many. 16 And the free gift is not like the result of that one man's sin. For the judgment following one trespass brought condemnation, but the free gift following many trespasses brought justification. 17 For if, because of one man's trespass, death reigned through that one man, much more will those who receive the abundance of grace and the free gift of righteousness reign in life through the one man Jesus Christ.
2023-02-26.Line 175: 18 Therefore, as one trespass led to condemnation for all men, so one act of righteousness leads to justification and life for all men. 19 For as by the one man's disobedience the many were made sinners, so by the one man's obedience the many will be made righteous.

2023-02-26.Line 245: Gracious Father, we do not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes forth from Your mouth.  So look with grace upon us and give the Light of Your Spirit to guide us.  In our Victorious Jesus we pray.  Amen.
2023-02-26.Line 249: Preaching of the Word    Pastor Ben Rossell
2023-02-26.Line 301: Offertory                   O Love How Deep, How Broad, How High
2023-02-26.Line 351: LUKE 12:15-- "Take heed and beware of covetousness, for one's life does not consist in the abundance of the things he possesses."
2023-02-26.Line 353: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, How easily we forget what true life is all about.  With the unfaithful world, we often go about our living as if life were a matter of gaining an abundance of possessions.  Thank You for the wise and gracious warnings in Your Word.  Thank You for granting us true life in Christ Jesus.  Give us grace to bear this witness to others by trusting You for our earthly provisions and loving You, no matter what  things are taken away from us. In presenting our tithes and offerings to You today, we renounce our covetousness, which is idolatry, and ask You to bless them, in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-02-26.Line 356: And now Rise and pray together with me for the Church and the world.
2023-02-26.Line 360: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-02-26.Line 362: In our own community, we lift up to You: New Hope Baptist Church of Valparaiso and Pastor David Wilson.  Would You continue to grant them Your blessing, empower them to be wise and faithful in ministry and righteousness; to delight in You and Your Word and to live by faith as You have called us to.
2023-02-26.Line 365: We also pray Your persecuted people all over the world, and the ministry of ICC on their behalf bless them in it, and especially today we lift up to You our brothers and sisters in Indonesia and Java professor Pella and others like him who are jailed for their witness.  Bless all Your missionaries and ministers and people there in persecution.  Bring just protection to them and release to professor Pella and all those wrongly imprisoned.  Bless Your Church in that vast island region and overcome the false religions that blind men from Your truth there.
2023-02-26.Line 367: Guard and provide for all your churches, ministers, refugees and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and the border regions.  In Your mercy bring hostilities to an end and grant Your people true unity in Your Holy Spirit across all lines of human division.
2023-02-26.Line 369: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-02-26.Line 371: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2023-02-26.Line 373: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2023-02-26.Line 396: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers

2023-02-26.Line 399: Sarah Waldron, Blake and Claire Williams, Britney Schaeffer, Olivia Waggy, and Anna Griffiths - together with their unborn children.
2023-02-26.Line 401: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2023-02-26.Line 403: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-02-26.Line 405: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-02-26.Line 408: once more we give You thanks for our land and community We ask Your blessing not as those who deserve special treatment, but as humble and repentant.
2023-02-26.Line 409: We remember our societal sins selfishness and greed, violence, sexual immorality, lawlessness. We are ashamed of our guilt of shedding innocent blood, and especially of the blood of the unborn. Forgive our collective indifference, our narcissism, our sinful tolerance of what is intolerable and grant sincere repentance to us as a people especially grant grace to Your people, the Church, that we may be purified of these root sins in our hearts.
2023-02-26.Line 411: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-02-26.Line 413: And now, our Heavenly Father, as we come to the word and sacraments, grant us a sense of the enormity of Your love and teach us to see the glory of the cross of Christ and our share in it.  So we Thank You and love You and bring each of these requests to You in the Spirit, and in the name of Your Son Jesus.  Amen

2023-02-26.Line 518: Prayer giving thanks for the bread
2023-02-26.Line 522: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #8 (Adapted from Calvin's prayer at Geneva)
2023-02-26.Line 523: Most gracious God!  As Your Son once offered up His body and blood on the cross for the remission of our sins, and has given his body and blood to us as our food and drink unto life eternal: So give us grace, with sincere hearts and fervent desires, to receive this great blessing from His hands.  May we by lively faith partake of his body and blood, yes of Himself, true God and man, the only bread from heaven, Who gives life to our souls.  Allow us no longer to live for ourselves, according to a corrupt and sinful nature; but may Christ live in us, and lead us to the life that is holy, blessed, and unchangeable for ever.  Amen.
2023-02-26.Line 527: Holy Scripture says: that the Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2023-02-26.Line 581: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-02-26.Line 583: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-02-26.Line 585: PRAYER GIVING THANKS FOR THE CUP:
2023-02-26.Line 589: O Lord, make us true partakers of the new and everlasting covenant.  And assure once more than You are our gracious Father; not judging us as our sins deserve, but rather, so that we might magnify Your name by our words and works, adopting us as Your Own beloved children and heirs, and providing us with everything necessary for our good.
2023-02-26.Line 590: Fit us, heavenly Father to celebrate this blessed remembrance of Your Son as we encounter His love here.  By the gift of His death give us the fresh increase of strength in faith and all good works, so that we may with greater confidence call You our Father, and evermore rejoice in You; Through Jesus Christ, our Redeemer, Who shed His blood that we might live and in Whose Holy name we raise our Thanksgiving to You today.  Amen.
2023-02-26.Line 593: In the same manner He also took the cup also after supper
2023-02-26.Line 604: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, in remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you do show forth the Lord's death until His return.
2023-02-26.Line 606: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2023-02-26.Line 611: O give thanks to the Lord, for He is good.  For everlasting is His lovingkindness!
2023-02-26.Line 626: All authority has been given to Me in heaven and on earth. Go therefore and make disciples of all the nations baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, teaching them to observe all things that I have commanded you; and lo, I am with you always, even to the end of the age." Amen

2023-03-05.Line 167: 12 Now the Lord said to Abram,  Go from your country and your kindred and your father's house to the land that I will show you. 2 And I will make of you a great nation, and I will bless you and make your name great, so that you will be a blessing. 3 I will bless those who bless you, and him who dishonors you I will curse, and in you all the families of the earth shall be blessed.
2023-03-05.Line 168: 4 So Abram went, as the Lord had told him, and Lot went with him. Abram was seventy-five years old when he departed from Haran. 5 And Abram took Sarai his wife, and Lot his brother's son, and all their possessions that they had gathered, and the people that they had acquired in Haran, and they set out to go to the land of Canaan. When they came to the land of Canaan, 6 Abram passed through the land to the place at Shechem, to the oak of Moreh. At that time the Canaanites were in the land. 7 Then the Lord appeared to Abram and said,  To your offspring I will give this land. So he built there an altar to the Lord, who had appeared to him. 8 From there he moved to the hill country on the east of Bethel and pitched his tent, with Bethel on the west and Ai on the east. And there he built an altar to the Lord and called upon the name of the Lord. 9 And Abram journeyed on, still going toward the Negeb.

Abraham believed God, and it was counted to him as righteousness. 4 Now to the one who works, his wages are not counted as a gift but as his due. 5 And to the one who does not work but believes in him who justifies the ungodly, his faith is counted as righteousness, 6 just as David also speaks of the blessing of the one to whom God counts righteousness apart from works:

2023-03-05.Line 307: LUKE 12:16-21 -- Then He spoke a parable to them, saying: "The ground of a certain rich man yielded plentifully. And he thought within himself, saying, 'What shall I do, since I have no room to store my crops?'  So he said, 'I will do this: I will pull down my barns and build greater, and there I will store all my crops and my goods.  And I will say to my soul, "Soul, you have many goods laid up for many years; take your ease; eat, drink, and be merry." '  But God said to him, 'Fool! This night your soul will be required of you; then whose will those things be which you have provided?'  So is he who lays up treasure for himself, and is not rich toward God."
2023-03-05.Line 309: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, Deliver us from the foolishness of laying up earthly treasure for ourselves while failing to be rich toward You.  As we present our tithes and offerings to You today, we do so as a confession that all we have belongs to You and even our lives belong to You and Your service.  Teach us by Your Spirit to save up treasures in Heaven and to grow rich in You.  Bless these, our gifts, today.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-03-05.Line 313: Now please rise as we pray together for  the Church and the World
2023-03-05.Line 315: Gracious Father and Almighty God, we praise You for the victory of Jesus over the Devil and the power of his temptations.  Give to us the same power of Your Spirit as You test us and prove our faith make us to share in His triumph.  Make us victors with our victorious Lord, that we might render to You that which You desire justice, mercy, repentance, obedience, the love and help of our neighbor as ourselves and the love of You with all our being.
2023-03-05.Line 317: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-03-05.Line 319: In our own community, we lift up to You:
2023-03-05.Line 321: Full Hope Gospel Korean Church and pastor Jay Om as he ministers nextdoor.  Bless Your people and bless Your Word bear fruit and glorify Yourself in Your Church there.
2023-03-05.Line 323: We lift up to You the work of Your gospel ministers all over the world especially the ministry of Peru Mission the start of their school year and seminary the fundraising and travel of Wes and Dale and finally for our team heading down this summer!
2023-03-05.Line 324: Outside of our community, we also pray Your persecuted people all over the world, especially lifting up to You those in SOMOLIA.  Where just this year, Christian villages have been attacked and Your precious people slaughtered.  Strengthen the health and faith of those who have been targeted and attacked because of their faith.  By Your might stop these wicked atrocities.  Bring to that land an outpouring of the blessing of Your light and gospel  and bless and shield Your people there!
2023-03-05.Line 326: Guard and provide for all your churches, ministers, refugees and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and the border regions.  In Your mercy bring hostilities to an end and grant Your people true unity in Your Holy Spirit across all lines of human division.

2023-03-05.Line 503: Prayer giving thanks for the bread
2023-03-05.Line 506: Prayer giving thanks for the bread
2023-03-05.Line 510: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #9  (Adapted from The Order of Worship of the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-03-05.Line 511: Almighty and everlasting God, who by the blood of Your dear Son has consecrated for us a new and living way into the holiest of all; we pray that You will cleanse our minds by the inspiration of Your Holy Spirit, that we, Your redeemed people, drawing near to You in these holy mysteries, with a true heart and undefiled conscience, in full assurance of faith, may offer unto You an acceptable sacrifice in righteousness, and worthily magnify Your great and glorious name.  We thank You now, Heavenly Father, for this bread, the body of Christ for us today.  Through Jesus Christ our Lord.  Amen.

2023-03-05.Line 567: PRAYER GIVING THANKS FOR THE CUP:
2023-03-05.Line 570: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #9: (Adapted from The Order of Worship of the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-03-05.Line 572: For all Your mercies and favors, known to us and unknown, we give You thanks.  But most of all, we praise You, the Father everlasting, for the gift of Your most adored true and only Son, our Savior Jesus Christ, Who by His appearing has abolished death and brought life and immortality to light through the Gospel.  We bless You for His incarnation, His life on earth; for His sufferings and death on the cross; for His resurrection from the dead; and for His ascension to Your right hand.  We bless You for the giving of the Holy Spirit; for the institution of the Church; for the means of grace; for the hope of everlasting life; and for the glory which shall be brought to us at the coming, and in the kingdom of Your dear Son.  In Whose name we pray and give thanks.  Amen.

2023-03-12.Line 198: to put away all bitter envy and self-seeking.
2023-03-12.Line 199: Grant us the light and powerful grace of Your Holy Spirit to truly receive with meekness Your Word plant it deep within the soil of our hearts; engraft it into our very being,  for it is able to save our souls.
2023-03-12.Line 209: Preaching of the Word    Pastor Ben Rossell
2023-03-12.Line 240: LUKE 16:10-13 -- "He who is faithful in what is least is faithful also in much; and he who is unjust in what is least is unjust also in much.  Therefore if you have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon, who will commit to your trust the true riches?  And if you have not been faithful in what is another man's, who will give you what is your own?  No servant can serve two masters; for either he will hate the one and love the other, or else he will be loyal to the one and despise the other. You cannot serve God and mammon."
2023-03-12.Line 242: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, Guard us from lives of functional service to Mammon, rather than lives given over in service to You.  You have taught us that if we come to love money, we will end up hating You and neglecting true service in Your Kingdom.   Grant us Your Holy Spirit's grace to be faithful stewards, even in that which is least and lowly.   Receive these offerings and bless them so that they might bring You glory on the earth and further Your Kingdom, in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-03-12.Line 246: Please rise now and let us pray for the Church and the World
2023-03-12.Line 249: Heavenly Father, make of us a holy and pure people.  You have promised that the pure in heart shall see You.  So help us to be such.  Cleanse and purify us so that in understanding we might be mature, but in sin and lust, we may be as innocent children.
2023-03-12.Line 250: Renew us, forgive our sins, and grant us all strength to stand with pure fidelity against the seductions of our Foe.
2023-03-12.Line 252: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-03-12.Line 254: In our own community, we lift up to You: Bethel Baptist Church in Valparaiso, pastor Alan Stewart and all who worship there.  Grant them faithfulness and the grace of Your Spirit and fidelity to Your Word nourished by the milk and meat of Your Word they would grow in the grace and knowledge of the Lord Jesus and abound in the righteous fruits of Your Spirit!
2023-03-12.Line 256: Rocky Bayou Christian School - Continue to pray for Christian unity between Russian and Ukrainian churches.
2023-03-12.Line 259: We also pray Your persecuted people all over the world, especially lifting up to You those in Democratic Republic of Congo and especially the recently-attacked Pentecostal church and all Your churches, in the areas where wicked men attack churches and Christians, protect them and provide for their needs.  Deliver each of Your precious people and turn the hearts of the wicked away from the wickedness of their persecutions and that those who harden their hearts against You would be overthrown.
2023-03-12.Line 261: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-12.Line 263: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2023-03-12.Line 265: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2023-03-12.Line 290: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2023-03-12.Line 292: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expecting mothers
2023-03-12.Line 293: Sarah Waldron, Blake and Claire Williams, Britney Schaeffer, Olivia Waggy, and Anna Griffiths - together with their unborn children.
2023-03-12.Line 295: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2023-03-12.Line 297: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-03-12.Line 299: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-12.Line 301: O God, we remember Your Word which assures us of Your special care and attention to the widows and so we thank You for those widows and single mothers in our congregation and ask You to both bless, comfort, provide for the many practical daily needs and protect each one under the shield of Your care, and make us more faithful servants and protectors of them after Your own example.
2023-03-12.Line 302: We especially lift up to You: Wanda Sadler, Gilda Winn, Heidi Mallory, Shirley Filar, Cori Sprenger, Hildegaard Inman, Anne Redwine, and Lisa Simmons.
2023-03-12.Line 303: We ask that You would make us faithful ministers and servants of these and more aware of the needs we might serve for where You have placed us in our neighborhoods and this community.
2023-03-12.Line 306: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-12.Line 308: Bless us now, Heavenly Father, as we come to Your Table.  And hear us in all these things, for the sake of Your dear Son answer our prayers for we bring them in His strong and holy name.
2023-03-12.Line 314: Nicene Creed                Christians, in Whom do you trust?

2023-03-12.Line 320: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,

2023-03-12.Line 322: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2023-03-12.Line 324: being of one substance with the Father;
2023-03-12.Line 325: by Whom all things were made;
2023-03-12.Line 326: who for us men, and for our salvation,
2023-03-12.Line 328: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin Mary,
2023-03-12.Line 330: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2023-03-12.Line 333: He rose again according to the scriptures,
2023-03-12.Line 335: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2023-03-12.Line 336: and He shall come again with glory
2023-03-12.Line 337: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2023-03-12.Line 338: Whose kingdom shall have no end;
2023-03-12.Line 340: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,

2023-03-12.Line 342: Who with the Father and the Son

2023-03-12.Line 347: I acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins;
2023-03-12.Line 348: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,
2023-03-12.Line 349: and the life of the world to come.  Amen.
2023-03-12.Line 389: [At this point, Phillip, stand behind the communion table.  The elders will have come forward and be seated behind you.  Then read the following]:
2023-03-12.Line 393: In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him. In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
2023-03-12.Line 397: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #11 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-03-12.Line 398: Be pleased now, O most merciful Father, to graciously receive at our hands this memorial of the blessed sacrifice of Your Son.  In union with Christ and His one sacrifice, we offer to You, O Lord, the reasonable sacrifices of ourselves, consecrating ourselves on the altar of the gospel, in soul and body, property and life, to Your most blessed service and praise. We thank You for Christ, the Bread of Life, and we thank You for this bread that is now before us.  In partaking of this bread, may we truly partake of Christ.  In His name.  Amen.
2023-03-12.Line 403: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus, on the same night in which He was betrayed, took bread
2023-03-12.Line 406: [Phillip, after speaking these lines as the pianist begins to play, hand a serving/bread plate to each of the elders on your right and left.  They will begin to distribute row by row.  While they do, remain standing behind the table and sing [Ps 42].
2023-03-12.Line 407: When they are finished distributing, they will file forward from the back and hand you whatever is left.  Just replace them on the serving plates.  Take one of the remaining pieces in your hand and please make sure that each of the elders receives a piece of bread
2023-03-12.Line 409: when the song ends and the elders are seated again, read the lines of institution highlighted below:]
2023-03-12.Line 412: Bread                                                       Psalm 42, As the Hart about to Falter
2023-03-12.Line 435: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-03-12.Line 437: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-03-12.Line 439: [Then take a small piece for yourself and partake with everyone.  After you are done, begin reading below:]
2023-03-12.Line 444: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #11
2023-03-12.Line 445: (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-03-12.Line 447: Look upon us through the mediation of our great High Priest, Heavenly Father, and make us accepted in the Beloved.  Let His name be as pure and holy incense, through which all our worship may come up before You, as the odor of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, well pleasing to God.  We thank You now for the blood of Jesus Christ, that blood that was shed for our sins, and we thank You for this cup before us.  In partaking of it, may we truly partake of Christ and His sacrifice for us.
2023-03-12.Line 450: In the same manner our Lord Jesus also took the cup also after supper
2023-03-12.Line 453: Phillip as the pianist begins to play, hand a tray of cups to each elder, who will be lined up waiting again to receive the elements from you.  They will begin to distribute row by row.  While they do, remain standing behind the table and sing  Only Begotten .
2023-03-12.Line 455: When they are finished distributing, they will file forward and hand you their trays.  Restack the trays.  Take one cup for yourself and when the song ends and the elders are seated again, read the lines below:]
2023-03-12.Line 458: Cup:  Only-Begotten Word of God Eternal
2023-03-12.Line 461: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, in remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you proclaim the Lord's death till He comes.
2023-03-12.Line 463: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2023-03-12.Line 467: [Phillip - At this point, drink your cup together with all.  When you are finished drinking, lift your hands and loudly proclaim:
2023-03-12.Line 469: O give thanks to the Lord, for He is good!
2023-03-12.Line 470: Congregational Response: For everlasting is His lovingkindness!
2023-03-12.Line 472: [Phillip - the pianist will begin to play for the doxology.  You may find your way back to your seat.
2023-03-12.Line 474: Mike Ruff - head to pulpit and with hands raised lead in singing the doxology.
2023-03-12.Line 478: Praise God from whom all blessing flow,
2023-03-12.Line 479: Praise Him all creatures here below,
2023-03-12.Line 480: Praise Him above ye heavenly host,
2023-03-12.Line 481: Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen!
2023-03-12.Line 483: * This is our Lord's COMMISSION for His Church Matthew 28:18-20
2023-03-12.Line 485: All authority has been given to Me in heaven and on earth. Go therefore and make disciples of all the nations baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, teaching them to observe all things that I have commanded you; and lo, I am with you always, even to the end of the age." Amen
2023-03-12.Line 487: * And now receive the BENEDICTION JUDE
2023-03-12.Line 489: Now He Who is able keep you from stumbling
2023-03-12.Line 490: And present you faultless before the presence of His glory with exceeding joy.
2023-03-12.Line 491: And to God our Savior, Who alone is wise,
2023-03-12.Line 492: Be Glory and Majesty, Dominion and Power,
2023-03-12.Line 497: * HYMN OF RESPONSE      O God of Earth and Altar
2023-03-12.Line 537: God bless you!  Go in peace, and the God of peace be with you.

2023-03-19.Line 1: Ps 51 - For the sacrifices of God are a broken spirit, A broken and a contrite heart  These, He will not despise.
2023-03-19.Line 2: So open your lips and proclaim His praise with your mouths!
2023-03-19.Line 4: Rise and let us worship God!  We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Rise and let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit.
2023-03-19.Line 6: Seek the Lord while He may be found; call upon Him while He is near;
2023-03-19.Line 7: LET THE WICKED FORSAKE HIS WAY, AND THE UNRIGHTEOUS MAN HIS THOUGHTS.
2023-03-19.Line 8: Let him return to the Lord, that He may have compassion on him,
2023-03-19.Line 9: AND TO OUR GOD FOR HE WILL ABUNDANTLY PARDON.
2023-03-19.Line 12: (A Contemplation of David. A Prayer when he was in the cave.)
2023-03-19.Line 14: I cry out to the Lord with my voice
2023-03-19.Line 15: WITH MY VOICE TO THE LORD I MAKE MY SUPPLICATION. I pour out my complaint before Him;
2023-03-19.Line 16: I DECLARE BEFORE HIM MY TROUBLE.
2023-03-19.Line 17: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me,
2023-03-19.Line 19: In the way which I walk    THEY HAVE SECRETLY SET A SNARE FOR ME.
2023-03-19.Line 20: Look on my right hand and see,
2023-03-19.Line 21: FOR THERE IS NO ONE WHO ACKNOWLEDGES ME;
2023-03-19.Line 23: NO ONE CARES FOR MY SOUL.
2023-03-19.Line 24: I cried out to You, O Lord:   I SAID, YOU ARE MY REFUGE, MY PORTION IN THE LAND OF THE LIVING
2023-03-19.Line 26: FOR I AM BROUGHT VERY LOW;
2023-03-19.Line 28: FOR THEY ARE STRONGER THAN I. Bring my soul out of prison,
2023-03-19.Line 29: THAT I MAY PRAISE YOUR NAME;
2023-03-19.Line 31: FOR YOU SHALL DEAL BOUNTIFULLY WITH ME.
2023-03-19.Line 36: Eternal and ever-blessed God, we lift up our hearts in praise and adoration for all that You are and give You thanks for all that You have done.  (This morning) we join our voices to those of the host of heaven and the countless multitude of the redeemed of all the ages, who, with loud voices, praise our worthy Lamb who was slain for our redemption.  Be with us, speak to us, and feed us, Gracious Father.  For we do so in the name of Your Son, our Lord Jesus.  Singing together the prayer He has given us
2023-03-19.Line 41: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-03-19.Line 44: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-03-19.Line 45: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-03-19.Line 46: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-03-19.Line 47: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-03-19.Line 48: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-03-19.Line 52: People of God we are in need of cleansing and renewal.  Let us humbly kneel, and make confession to God, imploring his forgiveness, through Jesus Christ our  Lord.  (Let all who are able kneel)
2023-03-19.Line 54: CONFESSION OF SIN................................. LET US PRAY TOGETHER
2023-03-19.Line 56: O God, our heavenly Father, I confess to You that I have grievously sinned against You in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that I am unable fully to understand, but which are all known to You. I am in need of deliverance from Your enemies and my infirmities. For this reason, I flee for refuge to Your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through my Lord, Jesus Christ. Amen.
2023-03-19.Line 60: Arise and hear good news   Ezekiel 36:24-28
2023-03-19.Line 62: Hear now the comforting assurance of the grace of God, promised in the Gospel to all who believe.  Our Lord Jesus Christ says:  For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in Him might not perish, but have everlasting life.
2023-03-19.Line 64: If we continue in the love sin and shame, despite the warnings of our consciences, we abide under the wrath and judgment of God, and our sins are retained in heaven, unless we repent.
2023-03-19.Line 65: But, I say to every one of you beloved brothers and sisters who believe in Jesus Christ, and hate your sins; who ask God to free you from them so that you may serve Him in true holiness and righteousness: Have no doubt that your prayers are sanctified by the sufferings of Jesus Christ, and therefore acceptable to God.
2023-03-19.Line 67: I declare, according to the command of God, that from heaven you are released from all your sins (as Christ has promised in His Gospel), through the perfect satisfaction of the most holy passion and death of our Lord Jesus Christ.  People of God, for Christ's sake, all your sins are forgiven.  Therefore
2023-03-19.Line 69: Lift up your hearts! We lift them up to the Lord.
2023-03-19.Line 100: I have held My peace a long time,
2023-03-19.Line 101: I have been still and restrained Myself. Now I will cry like a woman in [a]labor, I will pant and gasp at once. 15 I will lay waste the mountains and hills, And dry up all their vegetation; I will make the rivers coastlands, And I will dry up the pools. 16 I will bring the blind by a way they did not know; I will lead them in paths they have not known. I will make darkness light before them, And crooked places straight. These things I will do for them, And not forsake them. 17 They shall be turned back, They shall be greatly ashamed, Who trust in carved images, Who say to the molded images, ‘You are our gods.'
2023-03-19.Line 102: 18  Hear, you deaf; And look, you blind, that you may see. 19 Who is blind but My servant, Or deaf as My messenger whom I send? Who is blind as he who is perfect, And blind as the Lord's servant? 20 Seeing many things, but you do not observe;
2023-03-19.Line 103: Opening the ears, but he does not hear.
2023-03-19.Line 104: 21 The Lord is well pleased for His righteousness' sake;
2023-03-19.Line 105: He will exalt the law and make it honorable.
2023-03-19.Line 115: 8 For you were once darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of light 9 (for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness, righteousness, and truth), 10 finding out what is acceptable to the Lord. 11 And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather expose them. 12 For it is shameful even to speak of those things which are done by them in secret. 13 But all things that are exposed are made manifest by the light, for whatever makes manifest is light. 14 Therefore He says:
2023-03-19.Line 116: Awake, you who sleep, Arise from the dead, And Christ will give you light.
2023-03-19.Line 126: (Please rise for our Epistle Hymn, Arise, My Soul, Arise)
2023-03-19.Line 172: (Please remain standing for our Gospel Reading and song)
2023-03-19.Line 180: Praise be to the Lord Jesus Christ!
2023-03-19.Line 186: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2023-03-19.Line 187: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.
2023-03-19.Line 193: Gracious Father, by Your Spirit's help and blessing, place Your Word in our mouths and plant it in our hearts, that we may eagerly hear it and do it.  Save us always from being hardened to ignore Your voice of promise and command.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-03-19.Line 220: Offertory                                     I Heard the Voice of Jesus Say
2023-03-19.Line 242: LUKE 17:7-10 -- "And which of you, having a servant plowing or tending sheep, will say to him when he has come in from the field, 'Come at once and sit down to eat'?  But will he not rather say to him, 'Prepare something for my supper, and gird yourself and serve me till I have eaten and drunk, and afterward you will eat and drink'?  Does he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him? I think not.  So likewise you, when you have done all those things which you are commanded, say, 'We are unprofitable servants. We have done what was our duty to do.' "
2023-03-19.Line 245: In bringing our gifts to You, we present our whole selves to you anew.  We are living sacrifices for You.  And yet, in all these things, we are simply performing our duty as Your unprofitable servants.  Give us the grace of Your Holy Spirit not to think of ourselves more highly than we ought, but to pour out our lives in service, as our Lord Jesus has done for us.  In His name.  Amen.
2023-03-19.Line 253: Now rise and let us pray together for  the Church and the World
2023-03-19.Line 255: #22   PRAYER FOR THE CHURCH AND THE WORLD
2023-03-19.Line 258: For You, O Christ our God, are the illumination of our souls and bodies.  So make us a people who look like and live like You and who may dwell in Your presence and abide in You. That we may do Your will and see Your kingdom come and spread here on earth as it is in heaven.
2023-03-19.Line 259: We pray Your blessings not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-03-19.Line 261: In our own community, we pray for your blessing upon the work of Manna Church, pastors Shinnick, and Gonzalez,  and Hatcher and all those who serve and worship You there.  Bless them richly in this season in their walk with You and build them up by Your Spirit and Word.
2023-03-19.Line 263: We also pray Your persecuted people all over the world, especially lifting up to You Your people in Nepal be merciful to the Terra and her daughters and all those like them who have been beaten, disowned, and persecuted for Christ.  We pray with them for their husband and father to hear and believe the gospel.  Hear the cries of Your people there and deliver them from affliction for Your mercy's sake.  Work Your glory among the nations and defend Your Church.
2023-03-19.Line 265: Guard and provide for all your churches, ministers, refugees and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and the border regions.  In Your mercy bring hostilities to an end and grant Your people true unity in Your Holy Spirit across all lines of human division.
2023-03-19.Line 267: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-19.Line 269: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2023-03-19.Line 271: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2023-03-19.Line 296: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2023-03-19.Line 298: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expecting mothers
2023-03-19.Line 299: Sarah Waldron, Blake and Claire Williams, Britney Schaeffer, Olivia Waggy, and Anna Griffiths - together with their unborn children.
2023-03-19.Line 301: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2023-03-19.Line 303: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-03-19.Line 305: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-19.Line 307: We pray for our community, this city, and county, asking Your mercy, help, and strong deliverance for all whose lives are in the grip of drunkenness, alcoholism, and drug abuse.  Turn them from these destructions which are afflictions so heavy to bear and difficult to break free from.  Grant to us, Your Church, wisdom, to speak and act faithfully, in truth and grace.  Grant to our community leaders, law enforcement officers, judges, and counselors Your wisdom and add Your blessing to the work they do in this area.
2023-03-19.Line 309: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-19.Line 311: And now our Father as we come to the word and sacraments, be here and help us in our needs. For we ask all these things in the name of Jesus our Lord. Amen.

2023-03-19.Line 429: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #10  (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-03-19.Line 431: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we pray that You will send down the powerful benediction of Your Holy Spirit upon these elements of bread and wine, that they may become to us the sign and seal to us of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; so that in this use of them we may be made, through the power of the Holy Spirit, to partake really and truly of His blessed life, by which alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give you heartfelt thanks for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ, in Whose holy name we now ask Your blessing.  Amen.
2023-03-19.Line 435: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus, on the same night in which He was betrayed, took bread
2023-03-19.Line 440: BREAD:                                                       My Soul, Now Bless Thy Maker
2023-03-19.Line 497: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-03-19.Line 499: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-03-19.Line 501: PRAYER GIVING THANKS FOR THE CUP:
2023-03-19.Line 506: prayer giving thanks for the cup #10  (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-03-19.Line 508: Mighty God, heavenly King; we magnify and praise You; with patriarchs and prophets, apostles and martyrs; with the holy Church throughout all the world; with the heavenly Jerusalem, the joyful assembly and congregation of the first-born on high; with the innumerable company of angels round about Your throne, the heaven of heavens, and all the powers therein; we worship and adore Your glorious name,
2023-03-19.Line 509: For You are worthy, O Christ, to take the Heavenly scroll, and open its seals; For You were slain, And have redeemed us to God by Your blood Out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation, And have made us kings and priests to our God; And we shall reign on the earth." (Revelation 5:9-10). We thank you now for this cup through which we receive the benefits of Your atonement.  Amen.

2023-03-26.Line 4: Wake up! The night is long-since over!  It is now daytime! So then let us cast off the works of darkness and put on the armor of light.  Let us put on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make no provision for the flesh, to gratify its desires.

2023-03-26.Line 32: stir up our hearts to prepare the way for Your Son.  By His coming, give us strength to fight the good fight and shine as Your lights in the darkness of this world following in the steps of our Lord Jesus.  For we ask it in His name,
2023-03-26.Line 34: singing the prayer He has given us
2023-03-26.Line 38: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-03-26.Line 41: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.

2023-03-26.Line 44: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.

2023-03-26.Line 48: Saints of God, we are in need of cleansing and renewal. Let us call upon the mercy of our heavenly Father.  Let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently, then together.
2023-03-26.Line 54: O God our heavenly Father, we confess to you that we have grievously sinned against you in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that we are unable to fully understand, but which are all known to you. We are in need of deliverance from your enemies and our infirmities. For this reason, we flee for refuge to your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through Jesus Christ our Lord, Amen.
2023-03-26.Line 57: Arise and hear the good news of God's FORGIVENESS
2023-03-26.Line 59: ROMANS 8:32-34   He who did not spare His own Son, but delivered Him up for us all, how shall He not with Him also freely give us all things?  Who shall bring a charge against God's elect?  It is God who justifies.  Who is he who condemns? It is Christ Jesus who died, yes, who was raised from the dead, Who is at the right hand of God, who indeed intercedes for us.
2023-03-26.Line 61: Our heavenly father, in His great mercy, did not spare His own Son, but has delivered Him up for us all.  He does not condemn His people, but for Christ's sake forgives all our sins.
2023-03-26.Line 64: We lift them up to the Lord!
2023-03-26.Line 76: Thus says the Lord, who makes a way in the sea And a path through the mighty waters, 17 Who brings forth the chariot and horse, The army and the power (They shall lie down together, they shall not rise; They are extinguished, they are quenched like a wick): 18  Do not remember the former things, Nor consider the things of old. 19 Behold, I will do a new thing, Now it shall spring forth; Shall you not know it? I will even make a road in the wilderness And rivers in the desert. 20 The beast of the field will honor Me, The jackals and the ostriches, Because I give waters in the wilderness And rivers in the desert, To give drink to My people, My chosen. 21 This people I have formed for Myself; They shall declare My praise.
2023-03-26.Line 80: The Word of the Lord!     Thanks be to God!
2023-03-26.Line 88: 4 though I also might have confidence in the flesh. If anyone else thinks he may have confidence in the flesh, I more so: 5 circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of the Hebrews; concerning the law, a Pharisee; 6 concerning zeal, persecuting the church; concerning the righteousness which is in the law, blameless.
2023-03-26.Line 89: 7 But what things were gain to me, these I have counted loss for Christ.
2023-03-26.Line 90: 8 Yet indeed I also count all things loss for the excellence of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord, for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and count them as rubbish, that I may gain Christ 9 and be found in Him, not having my own righteousness, which is from the law, but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is from God by faith; 10 that I may know Him and the power of His resurrection, and the fellowship of His sufferings, being conformed to His death, 11 if, by any means, I may attain to the resurrection from the dead.
2023-03-26.Line 91: 12 Not that I have already attained, or am already perfected; but I press on, that I may lay hold of that for which Christ Jesus has also laid hold of me. 13 Brethren, I do not count myself to have apprehended; but one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind and reaching forward to those things which are ahead, 14 I press toward the goal for the prize of the upward call of God in Christ Jesus.

2023-03-26.Line 110: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2023-03-26.Line 111: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.
2023-03-26.Line 118: Gracious Father in Heaven, grant us now hearts freed from worldliness, that we may hear and receive Your holy Word with all diligence and faith, to understand, cherish, and obey; through our Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
2023-03-26.Line 192: April 3rd-LUKE 19:8-10 -- Then Zacchaeus stood and said to the Lord, "Look, Lord, I give half of my goods to the poor; and if I have taken anything from anyone by false accusation, I restore fourfold."  And Jesus said to him, "Today salvation has come to this house, because he also is a son of Abraham; for the Son of Man has come to seek and to save that which was lost."
2023-03-26.Line 194: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, grant us the mighty grace of Your Holy Spirit that we would work out our salvation the way Zacchaeus' did. Receive and bless our gifts and offerings now, presented to You with thanksgiving for Him Who came to seek and to save the lost, for we pray these things as we live and give in His holy name, even that of Jesus our Lord.  Amen.
2023-03-26.Line 197: Rise now and pray together with me for the Church and the World!
2023-03-26.Line 201: You are the Giver of all good things; we thank You for all Your mercies and for Your loving care over all Your creatures.  For life, protection, friendship and duty; the countless joys we've known, just this morning, and even for the trials that teach us to trust in You. Most of all we thank You for Your Son our Savior; for the presence of Your Spirit, our Comforter, and for the ministry of worship, Word and Sacrament in Your Church.
2023-03-26.Line 202: We ask Your blessing, not only for ourselves, but for all of Your Church throughout all the world.
2023-03-26.Line 204: In our own Presbytery, we lift up to You Providence Church of Pensacola and pastors Brito and Stout and Christ Church of Pace and their pastoral search.  Bless these congregations, guard and empower them to bear much fruit for Your good pleasure.
2023-03-26.Line 206: We also lift up to You the good work of Peru Mission and especially their Christian School Geneva Academy together with their kids' camp.  Bless their teaching in every class and bless Your Word in their hearts as they learn it and live it together.
2023-03-26.Line 207: Bless also the ministry of their medical clinic, especially as they serve the poor and needy in their community.
2023-03-26.Line 209: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in  ..RUSSIA
2023-03-26.Line 210: Where tensions are high and Christians are fined and imprisoned for speaking against this military campaign.
2023-03-26.Line 212: Grant them all Your own wisdom and grace, and bless the churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2023-03-26.Line 216: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-26.Line 218: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2023-03-26.Line 219: In particular today we pray for:
2023-03-26.Line 240: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2023-03-26.Line 242: And we give You thanks for and ask Your protection and provision for our expectant mothers and their unborn children:
2023-03-26.Line 10000000: Sarah Waldron, Blake and Claire Williams, Britney Schaeffer, Olivia Waggy, and Anna Griffiths - together with their unborn children.
2023-03-26.Line 244: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and
2023-03-26.Line 247: O Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2023-03-26.Line 249: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-03-26.Line 251: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-26.Line 253: We thank You, Lord God of heaven and earth, that in Christ Jesus we have redemption, the forgiveness of sins. We give thanks that in Christ we have been blessed with every spiritual blessing. We give thanks for the countless ways this is evident in our nation and church and, especially for your abundant blessing to us in and through our families.
2023-03-26.Line 254: We ask that You would continue to bless our homes - both spiritually and materially.
2023-03-26.Line 256: And today especially we lift up to Your throne of mercy those of our loved ones who have strayed or wandered from the path of obedience which is the way of life.  We remember those who are under the discipline or censure of Your Church and pray for them now together with others who need Your grace and help in our silent prayers:
2023-03-26.Line 258: Lord in Your mercy bring back those who have erred and strayed like lost sheep.
2023-03-26.Line 260: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-03-26.Line 262: All these things and whatever else You see that we need, grant us, O God, for the sake of Christ, who died and rose again, and now lives and reigns with You and the Holy Spirit, One God, age after age. Amen.
2023-03-26.Line 265: Christians, in Whom do you trust?
2023-03-26.Line 269: I believe in one God: the Father Almighty,
2023-03-26.Line 271: and of all things visible and invisible;
2023-03-26.Line 273: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,
2023-03-26.Line 274: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2023-03-26.Line 275: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2023-03-26.Line 277: being of one substance with the Father;
2023-03-26.Line 278: by Whom all things were made;
2023-03-26.Line 279: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2023-03-26.Line 281: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2023-03-26.Line 283: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2023-03-26.Line 286: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2023-03-26.Line 288: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2023-03-26.Line 289: and He shall come again with glory
2023-03-26.Line 290: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2023-03-26.Line 291: Whose kingdom shall have no end.
2023-03-26.Line 293: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,
2023-03-26.Line 294: Who proceedeth from the Father and the Son;
2023-03-26.Line 295: Who with the Father and the Son
2023-03-26.Line 299: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;
2023-03-26.Line 300: I acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins;
2023-03-26.Line 301: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,
2023-03-26.Line 302: and the life of the world to come.
2023-03-26.Line 311: We humbly beseech You, O merciful Father, to hear us; and because of Your almighty goodness bless and sanctify, with Your word and Spirit, these Your gifts and creations of bread and wine; that we, receiving them according to Your Son our Savior Jesus Christ's holy institution, in remembrance of His death and passion, may be partakers of His most blessed Body and Blood.  And we ask that in Your fatherly goodness, You will mercifully accept this our sacrifice of praise and thanksgiving; most humbly beseeching You to grant that, by the merits of death of your son Jesus Christ, and through faith in His blood, we and all Your whole Church, may obtain remission of our sins, and all other benefits of His passion.  And here we offer to You, O Lord, ourselves, our souls and bodies, to be a reasonable, holy , and living sacrifice to you.  Through Jesus Christ our Lord.  Amen.
2023-03-26.Line 313: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2023-03-26.Line 339: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-03-26.Line 341: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-03-26.Line 343: PRAYER GIVING THANKS FOR THE CUP:
2023-03-26.Line 348: prayer giving thanks for the cup #10  (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-03-26.Line 353: All glory be to You, Almighty God, our heavenly Father.  Because of Your tender mercy, You gave Your only Son Jesus Christ to suffer death on the cross for our redemption; and did institute, and in His holy gospel command us to continue, a perpetual memory of His precious death and sacrifice, until His coming again.  Therefore we Your humble servants, celebrate before Your Divine Majesty, with these Your holy gifts, which we now offer to You: the memorial Your Son has commanded us to make, remembering His blessed passion and precious death, His mighty resurrection and glorious ascension; giving to You most hearty thanks for the innumerable benefits procured to us by those sufferings, death, resurrection, and ascension, Who, together with You and the Holy Spirit, are worship and glorified as one God, now and forevermore.    Amen.

2023-04-02.Line 20: Entrance Hymn                                                All Glory, Laud and Honor
2023-04-02.Line 22: Prayer of Adoration and Lord's Prayer    .
2023-04-02.Line 24: Gracious Father and Almighty God, We praise and thank you for Your great acts of love
2023-04-02.Line 25: by which You have redeemed us through Your Son, Jesus Christ, our Lord.
2023-04-02.Line 26: The Blessed One Who entered Jerusalem in meekness and was acclaimed as David's promised Royal Son.
2023-04-02.Line 27: This morning, we join in His praise - we pave His way with our garments and wave our palm branches celebrating and honoring our Lord.
2023-04-02.Line 28: Bless now our worship, and grant that we may hail Him as our King and Savior all our days.     Now hear us as we sing the prayer He taught us:
2023-04-02.Line 32: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-04-02.Line 35: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-04-02.Line 36: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-04-02.Line 37: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-04-02.Line 38: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-04-02.Line 39: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-04-02.Line 42: We need many things, but none more than God's cleansing and renewal.  Therefore, let us humbly kneel, and make confession to God, imploring his forgiveness  through Jesus Christ our Lord.     Therefore I invite all who are able to kneel together with us for a moment of silent prayer and confession.
2023-04-02.Line 44: CONFESSION OF SINS .Let us pray together
2023-04-02.Line 46: O God, our heavenly Father, we confess to you that we have grievously sinned against You in many ways; not only by outward transgressions, but also by secret thoughts and desires, some of which we are not even aware, but  which are all known to you.  We earnestly repent, and are heartily sorry for these our offences,  and we beseech you, by your great goodness, to have mercy upon us, and for the sake of Your dear Son, Jesus Christ our Lord, to forgive our sins,  and graciously to help our infirmities. Amen.
2023-04-02.Line 57: [The prophet Micah asked]: Who is a God like You, Pardoning iniquity And passing over the transgression of the remnant of His heritage? He does not retain His anger forever, Because He delights in mercy. He will again have compassion on us, And will subdue our iniquities. You will cast all our sins Into the depths of the sea. You will give truth to Jacob And mercy to Abraham, Which You have sworn to our fathers From days of old.
2023-04-02.Line 59: Christians, you have confessed your sin to God and sought His forgiveness.  Therefore He promises you anew, to pass over your transgression and have compassion on you; to cast all your sins into the depths of the sea.  Beloved, our heavenly Father, in His great mercy, has given His only Son to die for us, and for His sake forgives all our sins.  Therefore -
2023-04-02.Line 61: Lift up your hearts!        We lift them up to the Lord
2023-04-02.Line 143: The Lord God has given Me The tongue of the learned, That I should know how to speak A word in season to him who is weary. He awakens Me morning by morning, He awakens My ear To hear as the learned. 5 The Lord God has opened My ear; And I was not rebellious, Nor did I turn away. 6 I gave My back to those who struck Me, And My cheeks to those who plucked out the beard; I did not hide My face from shame and spitting.
2023-04-02.Line 144: 7  For the Lord God will help Me; Therefore I will not be disgraced; Therefore I have set My face like a flint, And I know that I will not be ashamed. 8 He is near who justifies Me; Who will contend with Me? Let us stand together. Who is My adversary? Let him come near Me. 9 Surely the Lord God will help Me; Who is he who will condemn Me? Indeed they will all grow old like a garment; The moth will eat them up.
2023-04-02.Line 157: 5 Let this mind be in you which was also in Christ Jesus, 6 who, being in the form of God, did not consider it robbery to be equal with God, 7 but made Himself of no reputation, taking the form of a bondservant, and coming in the likeness of men. 8 And being found in appearance as a man, He humbled Himself and became obedient to the point of death, even the death of the cross. 9 Therefore God also has highly exalted Him and given Him the name which is above every name, 10 that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of those in heaven, and of those on earth, and of those under the earth, 11 and that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.

2023-04-02.Line 372: Luke 21:1-4 -- And He looked up and saw the rich putting their gifts into the treasury, and He saw also a certain poor widow putting in two mites.  So He said, "Truly I say to you that this poor widow has put in more than all; for all these out of their abundance have put in offerings for God, but she out of her poverty put in all the livelihood that she had."
2023-04-02.Line 375: Our Gracious Heavenly father, together with You, our hearts or moved by the example of this widow's sacrificial offering. Receive ours today, not simply as a superficial gesture from withheld abundance, but rather as sacrificial contributions that represent our very lives.  These we offer to You in thankful response for the sacrifice You made of Your Son, Who, for our sake's became poor. And His name,  AMEN.
2023-04-02.Line 391: Please rise now and let us pray for the Church and the World
2023-04-02.Line 393: PRAYER FOR THE CHURCH AND THE WORLD
2023-04-02.Line 395: O God our Lord of the Power, Maker of all creation, Who, in Your incomparable mercy, sent Your Only-Begotten Son, our Lord Jesus Christ to be the resurrection and the life, and by His holy Cross to tear asunder the record of our sins, and thereby conquer the rulers and powers of darkness;
2023-04-02.Line 396: Receive our thanksgiving and our prayers and deliver us from every destructive and dark sin, and from all visible and invisible enemies who seek our harm. Nail down our flesh with fear of You, and pierce our souls with Your love, that we may willingly give up comfort and safety in order to follow Christ with fullness of faith.
2023-04-02.Line 399: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-04-02.Line 401: In our own community, we lift up to You: Bluewater Bay community Church Pastor Dean Allen and [churchplanter] Clint Akins - Would You continue to grant them Your blessing, empower them to be wise and faithful in ministry and righteousness; to delight in You and Your Word and to live by faith as You have called us to.
2023-04-02.Line 403: And locally, we lift up to You the ministry of Ernest and Tiffany Clark
2023-04-02.Line 405: Thank You for blessing their training in Nepal, despite setbacks provide the funds they require to continue this training and remove the barriers they have encountered
2023-04-02.Line 406: Grant them wisdom, discernment, creativity, and courage required to faithfully minister in the far East where there is strong opposition and great need.
2023-04-02.Line 409: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in Turkey and Syria, who face desperate need after the earthquake, especially given the persecution many of them face because of their Christian testimony.  Protect Your people and thwart all plans to harm them.  Grant them the power of Your Holy Spirit, and continue to establish and grow Your Church gospel there.  And especially in this month when so many Pakistanis will be fasting and praying, guide that land and all Muslim lands into the gracious light and life You have give through Your Son, Jesus Christ.
2023-04-02.Line 410: Overturn the wicked persecutions against Your precious people.  And throughout the world as martyrs continue to be killed, do not close Your ears to the cries of vengeance that come up from the ground, but act, judge, and avenge both Your Saints and Yourself.  That the world may know there is a God Who judges in the earth.
2023-04-02.Line 412: Father, bless and protect the churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and the border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.

2023-04-02.Line 572: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #8 (Adapted from Calvin's prayer at Geneva)
2023-04-02.Line 574: Most gracious God!  As Your Son once offered up His body and blood on the cross for the remission of our sins, and has given his body and blood to us as our food and drink unto life eternal: So give us grace, with sincere hearts and fervent desires, to receive this great blessing from His hands.  May we by lively faith partake of his body and blood, yes of Himself, true God and man, the only bread from heaven, Who gives life to our souls.  Allow us no longer to live for ourselves, according to a corrupt and sinful nature; but may Christ live in us, and lead us to the life that is holy, blessed, and unchangeable for ever.  Amen.
2023-04-02.Line 577: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread

2023-04-02.Line 594: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #8: (Adapted from Calvin's prayer at Geneva):
2023-04-02.Line 596: O Lord, make us true partakers of the new and everlasting covenant, the covenant of grace.  And thus assure us of Your willingness to always be our gracious Father; not imputing to us our sins, but that we may magnify Your name by our words and works, providing us as Your beloved children and heirs, with all things necessary for our good.  Fit us, O heavenly Father! so to celebrate at this time the blessed remembrance of Your Son.  Enable us to profitably contemplate His love, and show forth the benefits of His death; that receiving fresh increase of strength in Your faith and in all good works, we may with greater confidence call You our Father, and evermore rejoice in You; Through Jesus Christ, our Redeemer, Who shed His blood that we might live.  Amen.

2023-04-09.Line 91: People of God, we need the cleansing and renewal that comes from God alone.  Therefore, I invite all who are able to kneel, for a time of silent prayer and confession.  We'll pray first silently, then unison.
2023-04-09.Line 95: Almighty God, You have raised Your Son, Jesus, from death to life, and crowned Him Lord of all. We confess every way in which we have not bowed before Him, or acknowledged His rule in our lives. We confess where we have gone along with the ways of the world, and failed to give Him glory. Forgive us and raise us from sin, that we may be Your faithful people, obeying the commands of our Lord Jesus Christ, who rules the world and is Head of the Church, His Body.  In His name we pray, Amen.
2023-04-09.Line 99: Leader: Arise and hear good news       .                 Romans 6
2023-04-09.Line 100: You have been buried with Jesus, by baptism into death, for this reason, so that just as Christ was raised from the dead by the glory of the Father, you also might walk in newness of life.
2023-04-09.Line 101: Someone who's died has been set free from sin.  We know that Christ, being raised from the dead, will never die again; death no longer has dominion over him.  So you also must understand yourselves as dead to sin and alive to God in Christ Jesus.
2023-04-09.Line 102: 12 Therefore do not let sin rule in your still-mortal body; Do not let it make you obey its passions. 13 Do not make your bodily members available to sin, so that they become tools used for unrighteousness; instead, offer yourselves to God as one who's been brought from death to life, and make your bodily members available to God so that they become tools for righteousness.

2023-04-09.Line 293: Through the death of Your Son, You destroyed sin and death, and by His rising to life again restored innocence and life everlasting delivering us from the power of the Devil to live under You in Your Kingdom.  Strengthen us by the comfort and the power of His resurrection now and all our days.  Make us brave in the shadow of death by the sweetness of Your promise that just as You raised Christ, we will by no means remain in our graves but will rise again also at the end of days.  Guide us in new life as we run the race You've set before us, and when we finish our course, give us the crown of life so that with all the holy angels and saints of every age we may praise and glorify You, without end.

2023-04-16.Line 12: Joshua the high priest standing before the Angel of the Lord, and Satan standing at his right hand to oppose him. And the Lord said to Satan, "The Lord rebuke you, Satan! The Lord who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you! Is this not a brand plucked from the fire?" Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and was standing before the Angel. Then He answered and spoke to those who stood before Him, saying, "Take away the filthy garments from him." And to him He said, "See, I have removed your iniquity from you, and I will clothe you with rich robes." And I said, "Let them put a clean turban on his head." So they put a clean turban on his head, and they put the clothes on him. And the Angel of the Lord stood by.
2023-04-16.Line 15: [To all who confess their sin to God and seek His forgiveness through our great High Priest Jesus Christ, God  rebukes the devil, the accuser, and plucks you as a brand from the burning, removes the filthy garments of your own righteousness, and clothes you with the rich robes of the righteousness of Christ.  Beloved in the Lord, all your sins are forgiven for Jesus' sake!].

2023-04-16.Line 86: 29 But Peter and the other apostles answered and said:  We ought to obey God rather than men. 30 The God of our fathers raised up Jesus whom you murdered by hanging on a tree. 31 Him God has exalted to His right hand to be Prince and Savior, to give repentance to Israel and forgiveness of sins. 32 And we are His witnesses to these things, and so also is the Holy Spirit whom God has given to those who obey Him.
2023-04-16.Line 88: 33 When they heard this, they were furious and plotted to kill them. 34 Then one in the council stood up, a Pharisee named Gamaliel, a teacher of the law held in respect by all the people, and commanded them to put the apostles outside for a little while. 35 And he said to them:  Men of Israel, take heed to yourselves what you intend to do regarding these men. 36 For some time ago Theudas rose up, claiming to be somebody. A number of men, about four hundred, joined him. He was slain, and all who obeyed him were scattered and came to nothing. 37 After this man, Judas of Galilee rose up in the days of the census, and drew away many people after him. He also perished, and all who obeyed him were dispersed.
2023-04-16.Line 90: 38 And now I say to you, keep away from these men and let them alone; for if this plan or this work is of men, it will come to nothing; 39 but if it is of God, you cannot overthrow it lest you even be found to fight against God.
2023-04-16.Line 92: 40 And they agreed with him, and when they had called for the apostles and beaten them, they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go. 41 So they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for His name. 42 And daily in the temple, and in every house, they did not cease teaching and preaching Jesus as the Christ.
2023-04-16.Line 94: The Word of the Lord!     Thanks be to God!
2023-04-16.Line 99: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who according to His abundant mercy has begotten us again to a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead, 4 to an inheritance incorruptible and undefiled and that does not fade away, reserved in heaven for you, 5 who are kept by the power of God through faith for salvation ready to be revealed in the last time.
2023-04-16.Line 100: 6 In this you greatly rejoice, though now for a little while, if need be, you have been grieved by various trials, 7 that the genuineness of your faith, being much more precious than gold that perishes, though it is tested by fire, may be found to praise, honor, and glory at the revelation of Jesus Christ, 8 whom having not seen you love. Though now you do not see Him, yet believing, you rejoice with joy inexpressible and full of glory, 9 receiving the end of your faith the salvation of your souls.
