2023-09-17.Line 333: September 25th-James 1:17-18 -- Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and comes down from the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shadow of turning.  Of His own will He brought us forth by the word of truth, that we might be a kind of first-fruits of His creatures.
2023-09-17.Line 335: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, We thank You for bringing us forth by the word of truth. We would not be Your people if it were not for Your initiative, Your love, Your calling, Your word and Spirit which have brought light to our darkness.  Every good and perfect gift does come down from above.  As we present our tithes and offerings to You at this point in our worship, we gratefully acknowledge how much we owe to You, and all You have done for us.  Give us responsive hearts that long to return gifts to You and glorify You by our giving.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-09-17.Line 359: Rise now and let us pray for the Church and the World!
2023-09-17.Line 363: God, Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, we give You praise and thanks for all Your goodness and tender mercies. We bless You for the love that created us, and that sustains us day by day. We praise You for the gift of Your Son, our Savior, through whom you have made known Your will and grace. We thank you for the Holy Spirit, our Comforter; for the Holy, catholic, and Apostolic Church, for the means of grace, for the lives of all faithful and godly people, and for the hope of the life to come. Help us to treasure in our hearts all that our Lord has done for us, and enable us to show our thankfulness by lives that are given wholly to Your service.
2023-09-17.Line 364: We ask these blessings for all of Your People.  In our own community we lift up to You Generations United Church of Niceville and Pastor Phil Daniels and everyone who ministers and worships there build them up in Your Holy Word to faithfulness and fruitfulness in our Lord Jesus
2023-09-17.Line 366: Mission Partner of the Week: we lift up to You RBCS
2023-09-17.Line 367: -  provide abundantly for all of the financial needs bless the construction, esp guard from delays or accidents and injuries also protect those who work in this ministry strengthen them for the task protect the school as a whole and bring good people to them Your people to fill the positions that are open.
2023-09-17.Line 369: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in CHINA where Christians are targeted and attacked and often persecuted.  Guard Your precious people.  Build up Your Church in that land and grant them relief from the evil men who do them harm.
2023-09-17.Line 371: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2023-09-17.Line 373: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-09-17.Line 375: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show your favor to those in the family of God.
2023-09-17.Line 376: Tend your sick ones, O Lord Christ.   Rest your weary ones.  Bless your dying ones. Soothe your suffering ones.  Pity your afflicted ones. Shield your joyous ones. All for Your love's sake.
2023-09-17.Line 401: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2023-09-17.Line 403: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expectant mothers
2023-09-17.Line 404: Britney Schaeffer, Julie Alldredge, Sarah Mosley, Lauren Russo, Laura Dalton and Erika Dahl - together with their unborn children.
2023-09-17.Line 406: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2023-09-17.Line 408: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-09-17.Line 410: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-09-17.Line 413: We thank You for the authorities You have placed over us in the executive, legislative and judicial branches; especially praying today for our Federal Judges  Justices Roberts, Thomas, Alito, Sotomayor, Kagan, Gorsuch, Kavanaugh, Barrett, and Jackson
2023-09-17.Line 414: As well as our FL state justices Muniz, Canady, Labarga, Couriel, Grosshans, Francis and Sasso -
2023-09-17.Line 415: Bless each one with Your true wisdom and strength in all their judgments that they would know with clarity how to administer justice, to rule honestly and weigh the grave matters before them accurately despite immense pressure from many directions.
2023-09-17.Line 416: Help them to fulfill their duties and vows, to fear You rightly, and rightly balancing the heritage of the past with the needs of the present.
2023-09-17.Line 418: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-09-17.Line 420: Now Father, as we approach Your Table, We rejoice with thanksgiving in remembrance of all those who have loved and served You in Your Church on earth, and who now rest with You from their labors. Keep us ever in fellowship with You and all Your people, and bring us to the joy of Your everlasting kingdom. All these things, and whatever You see that we need, grant us, O Father, for the sake of Jesus Christ Your Son, Who together with You and the Holy Ghost, are one God, blessed and worshipped forever, age after age.  Amen.
2023-09-17.Line 424: Christians, in Whom do you trust?

2023-09-17.Line 433: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2023-09-17.Line 434: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2023-09-17.Line 436: being of one substance with the Father;
2023-09-17.Line 437: by Whom all things were made;
2023-09-17.Line 438: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2023-09-17.Line 440: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2023-09-17.Line 442: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2023-09-17.Line 445: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2023-09-17.Line 447: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2023-09-17.Line 448: and He shall come again with glory

2023-09-17.Line 454: Who with the Father and the Son

2023-09-17.Line 461: and the life of the world to come.
2023-09-17.Line 525: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #10  (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-09-17.Line 526: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we pray that You will send down the powerful benediction of Your Holy Spirit upon these elements of bread and wine, that they may become to us the sign and seal to us of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; so that in this use of them we may be made, through the power of the Holy Spirit, to partake really and truly of His blessed life, by which alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give you heartfelt thanks for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ.  In His blessed name.  Amen.
2023-09-17.Line 528: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread.
2023-09-17.Line 545: Bread                                             Only Begotten Word of God Eternal
2023-09-17.Line 573: And when He had blessed the bread, Jesus broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-09-17.Line 577: And when He had blessed the bread, Jesus broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me.
2023-09-17.Line 580: The body of Christ given for you!

2023-09-17.Line 590: Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God  of hosts; heaven and earth are full of the majesty of Your glory.  Hosanna in the highest!  Blessed is He Who comes in the name of the
2023-09-17.Line 591: Lord. "You are worthy to take the scroll, And to open its seals, O Christ; For You were slain, And have redeemed us to God by Your blood Out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation, And have made us kings and priests to our God; And we shall reign on the earth." (Revelation 5:9-10). We thank you now for this cup through which we receive the benefits of Your atonement.  Amen.

2023-09-17.Line 623: The blood of Christ shed for you!

2023-09-24.Line 4: I will bless the Lord at all times; His praise shall continually be in my mouth.  My soul shall make its boast in the Lord; the humble shall hear of it and be glad.  Oh, magnify the Lord with me, And let us exalt His name together.
2023-09-24.Line 7: Rise and let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.
2023-09-24.Line 9: O magnify the Lord with me!                                                                                                                              LET US EXALT GOD'S NAME TOGETHER!
2023-09-24.Line 10: I will praise you, O Lord, with my whole heart.                                                                                                                    I WILL TELL OF ALL YOUR MARVELOUS WORKS.
2023-09-24.Line 11: I will be glad and rejoice in you;                                                                                                                                       I WILL SING PRAISE TO YOUR NAME, O MOST HIGH!
2023-09-24.Line 15: The days of our lives are seventy years; AND IF BY REASON OF STRENGTH THEY ARE EIGHTY YEARS,
2023-09-24.Line 16: Yet their boast is only labor and sorrow; FOR IT IS SOON CUT OFF, AND WE FLY AWAY.
2023-09-24.Line 18: Who knows the power of Your anger? FOR AS THE FEAR OF YOU, SO IS YOUR WRATH.
2023-09-24.Line 19: So teach us to number our days,   THAT WE MAY GAIN A HEART OF WISDOM.
2023-09-24.Line 21: Return, O Lord!  How long?  AND HAVE COMPASSION ON YOUR SERVANTS.
2023-09-24.Line 22: Oh, satisfy us early with Your mercy, THAT WE MAY REJOICE AND BE GLAD ALL OUR DAYS!
2023-09-24.Line 23: Make us glad according to the days in which You have afflicted us, THE YEARS IN WHICH WE HAVE SEEN EVIL.
2023-09-24.Line 25: Let Your work appear to Your servants, AND YOUR GLORY TO THEIR CHILDREN.
2023-09-24.Line 26: And let the beauty of the Lord our God be upon us,  AND ESTABLISH THE WORK OF OUR HANDS FOR US; YES, ESTABLISH THE WORK OF OUR HANDS.
2023-09-24.Line 28: Entrance Hymn                      Beneath the Blood-Stained Lintel
2023-09-24.Line 64: Centuries ago, the Christian ministers who wrote our Westminster statement of faith -  understood baptismal water to represent the blood of Christ that washes away our sins and the virtue of the Holy Spirit that strengthens us to live holy lives, battling sin and temptation.
2023-09-24.Line 65: Children are baptized because, in the Bible, God's covenant promises are made to believers and their households.  Jesus welcomed little children into His presence, embracing and blessing them, saying,  of such is the kingdom of God.
2023-09-24.Line 66: Children born within the church, have, by their birth, interest in the covenant, and a right to it.  So every baptized child is solemnly received into the bosom of the visible church, separated from the world, and all outsiders, and united with believers  to join with us in their common baptismal duty, for all of us who are baptized in the name of Christ, by our baptism are bound to fight against the devil, the world, and the flesh:
2023-09-24.Line 67: Caleb and Claire, is Jesus Christ your only Lord and Savior?
2023-09-24.Line 69: You know that, in presenting your son, that God requires things of you
2023-09-24.Line 71: 1.        In presenting your son for baptism, you are acknowledging your need and his of the cleansing blood of Jesus Christ and the renewing grace of the Holy Spirit.
2023-09-24.Line 73: 2.    You are claiming God's covenant promise in his behalf, God's promise to be a God to you and to your descendants after you, and you are looking in faith to the Lord Jesus Christ for his salvation, as you do for your own.
2023-09-24.Line 75: 3.    You are now unreservedly committing him to God, and promising, in humble reliance upon divine grace, that you will endeavor to set before him a Godly example, that you will pray with and for him, that you will teach him the doctrines of the Christian faith, and that you will strive, by all the means of God's appointment, to bring him up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
2023-09-24.Line 76: These are the baptismal duties God requires of you do you vow to obey Him by His grace and help?  [response: We do]
2023-09-24.Line 78: QUESTION TO THE CONGREGATION: God calls you as the Body of Christ to assist these parents in the Christian nurture of this child? Will you respond with a hearty  Amen and commit to undertake this responsibility by God's grace and help?
2023-09-24.Line 81: We thank you Father, that You have not left us as strangers without the covenant of promise, but called us to the privileges of adoption.  Join the inward blessing of Your Holy Spirit to this outward washing of water and seal to this boy all the promises of the covenant of grace so that, planted into the likeness of Christ's death and resurrection; the body of sin being destroyed in him, he may serve God in newness of life all his days.
2023-09-24.Line 86: Andrew,  I BAPTIZE YOU IN THE NAME OF THE FATHER AND THE SON AND THE HOLY SPIRIT.
2023-09-24.Line 87: THE BLESSINGS OF THE TRIUNE GOD BE WITH YOU ALWAYS.
2023-09-24.Line 89: Our forefathers in the faith were careful to teach that the virtue of baptism is not tied to the moment of time it is administered; but that its  fruit and power extend to the whole course of our lives.  So I call upon all of us here who have been baptized in the name of Christ -  turn around - look back to your own baptism; repent always of every sin against your covenant with God; always be stirring up your faith; and day by day remember and live out the covenant sealed betwixt God and your soul.
2023-09-24.Line 90: And to each of us who are Christian parents, Consider again the great mercy of our God to us, and to our beloved children   that they would be brought up grounded in Christian truth and nurtured and disciplined in Christ.  Let us be faithful in this urgent task remembering also the danger of God's wrath toward us and our children if we are negligent in our divine calling.
2023-09-24.Line 92: Please rise and pray with me!
2023-09-24.Line 93: Heavenly Father, we thank You for being true and faithful in keeping covenant and mercy:  And for Your grace not only numbering us among Your saints but also bestowing upon our children this singular token and badge of Your love in Christ, purchased with His own blood.
2023-09-24.Line 94: Daily confirm more and more Your unspeakable favour to this boy we have today received into the household of faith.
2023-09-24.Line 95: Provide for and defend him as his heavenly father, and as he grows, teach him by Your word and Spirit, and make his baptism effectual to him, so that in Your power, he may prevail against the devil, the world, and the flesh, till in the end he obtain a full and final victory, and so be kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation, through Jesus Christ our Lord.
2023-09-24.Line 96: Now Hear us as we sing together the prayer Your Son has taught us
2023-09-24.Line 98: We praise You, O God, we acknowledge You to be the LORD all the earth worships YOU, the Father everlasting To YOU all the angels cry aloud, the Heavens and all the Powers therein   to You the Cherubim and Seraphim continually cry out the holiness of the Lord of Hosts
2023-09-24.Line 99: Heaven and Earth are full of the Majesty of YOUR glory
2023-09-24.Line 100: The glorious company of the Apostle praise You
2023-09-24.Line 101: The goodly fellowship of the Prophets praise You
2023-09-24.Line 102: The noble army of martyrs praise You
2023-09-24.Line 103: And the Holy Church throughout all the world acknowledges You the Father, infinite in majesty; the honorable, true, and only Son, and the Holy Spirit, our Comforter.
2023-09-24.Line 104: Here us now as we add our voices to these singing together the prayer our Lord Jesus has given
2023-09-24.Line 107: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-09-24.Line 110: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-09-24.Line 111: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-09-24.Line 112: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-09-24.Line 113: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-09-24.Line 114: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-09-24.Line 117: People of God, we are in need of His cleansing and renewal.  Therefore, let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently then in unison.
2023-09-24.Line 119: LET US PRAY TOGETHER   Most merciful god, I confess to you that I am from birth sinful and unclean, and that I have sinned against you in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that I am not able to fully understand, but which are all known to you.   For this reason, I flee for refuge to your infinite mercy, continually seeking and imploring your grace, through my Lord Jesus Christ.  Amen.
2023-09-24.Line 122: * Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!
2023-09-24.Line 124: Isaiah 55 Seek the Lord while He may be found, Call upon Him while He is near.  7 Let the wicked forsake his way, And the unrighteous man his thoughts; Let him return to the Lord, And He will have mercy on him; Return to our God, For He will abundantly pardon.
2023-09-24.Line 126: To you who have sought the Lord's mercy by confessing your sins and turning from unrighteous thoughts to the way of His Son God assures you once more than He has heard your prayers and for Christ's sake forgives all your sins.  Therefore
2023-09-24.Line 128: Lift up your hearts! We lift them up to the Lord!
2023-09-24.Line 146: How Shall We Then Live?  Let us hear from God's Word.
2023-09-24.Line 170: 26 Then God said,  Let Us make man in Our image, according to Our likeness; let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, over the birds of the air, and over the cattle, over all the earth and over every creeping thing that creeps on the earth. 27 So God created man in His own image; in the image of God He created him; male and female He created them. 28 Then God blessed them, and God said to them,  Be fruitful and multiply; fill the earth and subdue it; have dominion over the fish of the sea, over the birds of the air, and over every living thing that moves on the earth.
2023-09-24.Line 171: 29 And God said,  See, I have given you every herb that yields seed which is on the face of all the earth, and every tree whose fruit yields seed; to you it shall be for food. 30 Also, to every beast of the earth, to every bird of the air, and to everything that creeps on the earth, in which there is life, I have given every green herb for food; and it was so. 31 Then God saw everything that He had made, and indeed it was very good. So the evening and the morning were the sixth day.
2023-09-24.Line 193: 3 Honor widows who are really widows. 4 But if any widow has children or grandchildren, let them first learn to show piety at home and to repay their parents; for this is good and acceptable before God. 5 Now she who is really a widow, and left alone, trusts in God and continues in supplications and prayers night and day. 6 But she who lives in pleasure is dead while she lives. 7 And these things command, that they may be blameless. 8 But if anyone does not provide for his own, and especially for those of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.

2023-09-24.Line 366: September 19th-Hebrews 13:1-3,16 -- Let brotherly love continue.  Do not forget to entertain strangers, for by so doing some have unwittingly entertained angels.  Remember the prisoners as if chained with them -- those who are mistreated -- since you yourselves are in the body also....But do not forget to do good and to share, for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.
2023-09-24.Line 368: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, You have told us that what we do for the least of Your brothers, we do for You the feeding of the hungry and thirsty, the welcoming of a stranger, the clothing of the naked, the visiting of the sick or persecuted (Matt.25:35).  Deliver us from selfish indifference, and hardness of heart.  Instead give us Your heart to share what we have, our wealth, our homes, our time, our abilities and our energies to minster faithfully to the needs of those around us. Bless our offerings now, for we ask it in the name of the One Who had nowhere to lay His head, even Jesus Christ our Lord.  AMEN.
2023-09-24.Line 378: Now rise! And let us pray for the Church and the world!
2023-09-24.Line 383: Thank You for knowing us perfectly and loving us anyway for knowing what is in our hearts, for extending grace and bearing with us and for the work of Your Spirit which renews our hearts and changes us from the inside out.
2023-09-24.Line 384: Grant us the joy of our own salvation and inspire us to partake in Your works of gospel service, to delight in mercy as You do.  And grow us up into Your wisdom and in faithfulness before You.
2023-09-24.Line 387: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.

2023-09-24.Line 389: Would You continue to grant them Your blessing, and the grace of Your Spirit to be righteous in this world and faithful in ministry.  Endow them with Your own vision and prudence and richly provide for them from Your Word in their life together.

Volunteers; strategic planning; growth.

2023-09-24.Line 431: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2023-09-24.Line 434: Father, bless also those in our congregation and community applying for exemptions to the vaccine mandate.  Provide for them in all their needs and grant them favor in the eyes of their supervisors and commanding officers.
2023-09-24.Line 436: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-09-24.Line 438: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-09-24.Line 440: Gracious Father, we thank You for the good and beautiful order You have established in our world, and the place our lives and our congregation fit into that order.  We thank You for the orders of authority within which You have placed us and from which we receive so many often unacknowledged blessings.  Especially today, we give You thanks for our Communion of Reformed and Evangelical Churches, and for those who serve and lead us.  We pray for the Churches of our Athanasius Presbytery, those that are struggling and those that are growing, You, Who know our needs before we do - be gracious and Help each one.  Bless and empower our Presiding Ministers Brito and Thacker  together with their congregations and fellow ministers.
2023-09-24.Line 441: And Communion-wide; for our Presiding Ministers, Virgil Hurt, and Stuart Bryan, bless and empower them with might, wisdom, and grace of Your Spirit.
2023-09-24.Line 442: As we convene this week in Council save us from all error, ignorance, pride, and prejudice in Your great mercy direct, sanctify, and govern us in our work,
2023-09-24.Line 443: So that the comfort of the gospel of Christ may be faithfully preached in all places to break down the kingdom of sin, Satan, and death; till finally all Your sheep are gathered into Your fold, and made partakers of everlasting life.
2023-09-24.Line 445: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-09-24.Line 447: And now, our Heavenly Father, As we approach Your table
2023-09-24.Line 448: Fulfill the desire of those who fear You; Hear our prayers and cries; conquer the wicked, but preserve and save those who love You.
2023-09-24.Line 450: For we pray by Your Spirit and in Jesus' name.  Amen.

2023-09-24.Line 562: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #12 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-09-24.Line 564: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we pray that You will send down the powerful benediction of Your Holy Spirit upon these elements of bread and wine, that they may become to us the sign and seal of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; so that in this use of them we may be made, through the power of the Holy Spirit, to partake really and truly of His blessed life, by which alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give you heartfelt thanks for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ.  In His blessed name.  Amen.

2023-09-24.Line 660: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #12  (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-09-24.Line 662: Mighty God, heavenly King; we magnify and praise You; with patriarchs and prophets, apostles and martyrs; with the holy Church throughout all the world; with the heavenly Jerusalem, the joyful assembly and congregation of the first-born on high; with the innumerable company of angels round about Your throne, the heaven of heavens, and all the powers therein; we worship and adore Your glorious name, For "You are worthy, O Christ, to take the scroll, And open its seals; For You were slain, And have redeemed us to God by Your blood Out of every tribe and tongue and people and nation, And have made us kings and priests to our God; And we shall reign on the earth." (Revelation 5:9-10). We thank you now for this cup through which we receive the benefits of Your atonement.  Amen.

2023-10-01.Line 3: Ps 136 - Give thanks to the God of gods,  Give thanks to the Lord of lords, Who has remembered us in our low estate and freed us from our enemies; Give thanks to the God of Heaven - for everlasting is His lovingkindness.;
2023-10-01.Line 6: Rise and let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.     AMEN.                                                                                                                                                                             I was glad when they said to me,  Let us go to the House of the LORD!                                                                                                                                  OUR FEET ARE STANDING WITHIN YOUR GATES, O JERUSALEM!
2023-10-01.Line 7: Our help is in the name of the LORD.                                                                                                                    MAKER OF HEAVEN AND EARTH.
2023-10-01.Line 11: To You, O Lord, I lift up my soul.   O MY GOD, I TRUST IN YOU;
2023-10-01.Line 13: Let me not be ashamed;   LET NOT MY ENEMIES TRIUMPH OVER ME.
2023-10-01.Line 15: Indeed, let no one who waits on You be ashamed;
2023-10-01.Line 16: LET THOSE BE ASHAMED WHO DEAL TREACHEROUSLY
2023-10-01.Line 19: Show me Your ways, O Lord; teach me Your paths.
2023-10-01.Line 20: LEAD ME IN YOUR TRUTH AND TEACH ME, FOR YOU ARE THE GOD OF MY SALVATION;
2023-10-01.Line 22: On you I wait all the day.
2023-10-01.Line 23: REMEMBER, O LORD, YOUR TENDER MERCIES AND YOUR LOVINGKINDNESSES, FOR THEY HAVE BEEN FROM OF OLD.
2023-10-01.Line 25: Do not remember the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions;
2023-10-01.Line 26: ACCORDING TO YOUR MERCY REMEMBER ME, FOR YOUR GOODNESS' SAKE, O LORD.
2023-10-01.Line 28: Good and upright is the Lord; THEREFORE HE TEACHES SINNERS IN THE WAY.
2023-10-01.Line 30: The humble He guides in justice, AND THE HUMBLE HE TEACHES HIS WAY.
2023-10-01.Line 32: All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth, TO SUCH AS KEEP HIS COVENANT AND HIS TESTIMONIES.
2023-10-01.Line 34: Entrance Hymn  Psalm 2, Why do the Heathen Nations Vainly Rage?
2023-10-01.Line 40: You've made us, and so we owe you the whole of our love; You've redeemed us, and so we owe you the whole of ourselves; You've promised so much, and so we owe you our whole future beings.  And these things we owe You in as much a greater proportion as You are greater than we, for whom You've given Yourself along with these promises. This is a debt whose magnitude we are unable to attain.  But all that we do have, and all that we are in our whole being which we confess truly are already Yours by right of creation anyway we offer up to You anew.  Draw us to You, Lord, and give us understanding and with that knowledge and with that the gift of the fullness of Your love.   And hear us now as we sing the prayer our Lord has given us:
2023-10-01.Line 44: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-10-01.Line 47: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-10-01.Line 48: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-10-01.Line 49: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-10-01.Line 50: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-10-01.Line 51: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-10-01.Line 54: People of God, we are in need of His cleansing and renewal.  Therefore, let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently then in unison.
2023-10-01.Line 58: Let us pray together     O God our heavenly Father, we confess to you that we have grievously sinned against you in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that we are unable to fully understand, but which are all known to you. We are in need of deliverance from your enemies and our infirmities. For this reason, we flee for refuge to your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through Jesus Christ our Lord, Amen.
2023-10-01.Line 59: * Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!  Joel 2:12-13
2023-10-01.Line 61: " Now, therefore," says the Lord, "Turn to Me with all your heart, With fasting, with weeping, and with mourning." So rend your heart, and not your garments; Return to the Lord your God, For He is gracious and merciful, Slow to anger, and of great kindness .
2023-10-01.Line 65: [Your heavenly Father, in His great mercy, has given His only Son to die for us.  To all who confess their sin to God and seek His forgiveness, to those who rend their hearts and return to the Lord, He is gracious and merciful to you, slow to anger and of great kindness.  Beloved in the Lord, for Christ's sake - all your sins are forgiven!]

2023-10-01.Line 87: How Shall We Then Live?  Let us hear from God's Word.
2023-10-01.Line 107: 18 The word of the Lord came to me again, saying, 2  What do you mean when you use this proverb concerning the land of Israel, saying:
2023-10-01.Line 108: ‘The fathers have eaten sour grapes, And the children's teeth are set on edge'?
2023-10-01.Line 109: 3  As I live, says the Lord God,  you shall no longer use this proverb in Israel.
2023-10-01.Line 110: 4  Behold, all souls are Mine; The soul of the father As well as the soul of the son is Mine; The soul who sins shall die.
2023-10-01.Line 112: 25  Yet you say, ‘The way of the Lord is not fair.' Hear now, O house of Israel, is it not My way which is fair, and your ways which are not fair? 26 When a righteous man turns away from his righteousness, commits iniquity, and dies in it, it is because of the iniquity which he has done that he dies. 27 Again, when a wicked man turns away from the wickedness which he committed, and does what is lawful and right, he preserves himself alive. 28 Because he considers and turns away from all the transgressions which he committed, he shall surely live; he shall not die. 29 Yet the house of Israel says, ‘The way of the Lord is not fair.' O house of Israel, is it not My ways which are fair, and your ways which are not fair?
2023-10-01.Line 113: 30  Therefore I will judge you, O house of Israel, every one according to his ways, says the Lord God.  Repent, and turn from all your transgressions, so that iniquity will not be your ruin. 31 Cast away from you all the transgressions which you have committed, and get yourselves a new heart and a new spirit. For why should you die, O house of Israel? 32 For I have no pleasure in the death of one who dies, says the Lord God.  Therefore turn and live!
2023-10-01.Line 123: 18 For I consider that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us. 19 For the earnest expectation of the creation eagerly waits for the revealing of the sons of God. 20 For the creation was subjected to futility, not willingly, but because of Him who subjected it in hope; 21 because the creation itself also will be delivered from the bondage of [f]corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God. 22 For we know that the whole creation groans and labors with birth pangs together until now. 23 Not only that, but we also who have the firstfruits of the Spirit, even we ourselves groan within ourselves, eagerly waiting for the adoption, the redemption of our body. 24 For we were saved in this hope, but hope that is seen is not hope; for why does one still hope for what he sees? 25 But if we hope for what we do not see, we eagerly wait for it with perseverance.
2023-10-01.Line 124: 26 Likewise the Spirit also helps in our weaknesses. For we do not know what we should pray for as we ought, but the Spirit Himself makes intercession [g]for us with groanings which cannot be uttered. 27 Now He who searches the hearts knows what the mind of the Spirit is, because He makes intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
2023-10-01.Line 125: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to those who love God, to those who are the called according to His purpose. 29 For whom He foreknew, He also predestined to be conformed to the image of His Son, that He might be the firstborn among many brethren. 30 Moreover whom He predestined, these He also called; whom He called, these He also justified; and whom He justified, these He also glorified.
2023-10-01.Line 126: 31 What then shall we say to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us? 32 He who did not spare His own Son, but delivered Him up for us all, how shall He not with Him also freely give us all things? 33 Who shall bring a charge against God's elect? It is God who justifies. 34 Who is he who condemns? It is Christ who died, and furthermore is also risen, who is even at the right hand of God, who also makes intercession for us. 35 Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? Shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword? 36 As it is written:
2023-10-01.Line 127: For Your sake we are killed all day long; We are accounted as sheep for the slaughter.
2023-10-01.Line 128: 37 Yet in all these things we are more than conquerors through Him who loved us. 38 For I am persuaded that neither death nor life, nor angels nor principalities nor powers, nor things present nor things to come, 39 nor height nor depth, nor any other created thing, shall be able to separate us from the love of God which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
2023-10-01.Line 192: Praise be to the Lord Jesus Christ!
2023-10-01.Line 199: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2023-10-01.Line 200: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.
2023-10-01.Line 203: Our Father in Heaven, deliver us from vain repetitions, and from only thinking our own thoughts and hearing our own words.  Give us the light of Your Spirit now and bear fruit in us by Your Word.  For we ask in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-10-01.Line 208: Preaching of the Word                     Pastor Ben Rossell
2023-10-01.Line 280: -James 1:17-18 -- Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and comes down from the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shadow of turning.  Of His own will He brought us forth by the word of truth, that we might be a kind of first-fruits of His creatures.
2023-10-01.Line 282: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, We thank You for bringing us forth by the word of truth. We would not be Your people if it were not for Your initiative, Your love, Your calling, Your word and Spirit which have brought light to our darkness.  Every good and perfect gift does come down from above.  As we present our tithes and offerings to You at this point in our worship, we gratefully acknowledge how much we owe to You, and all You have done for us.  Give us responsive hearts that long to return gifts to You and glorify You by our giving.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-10-01.Line 288: Now rise! And let us pray for the Church and the world!
2023-10-01.Line 291: Make us faithful hearers and fruit bearing obeyers of Your Word.  Spare us, kind Lord, from being among those who deceive themselves; those who pay You lip service, but are turned far from You in their hearts.  Rid us of our selfishness and pride that we would be able to always give You thanks.  Grant us, Christ's mind of humility to learn to regard others as more important than ourselves.
2023-10-01.Line 293: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.
2023-10-01.Line 295: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.

2023-10-01.Line 298: Enlighten them and sanctify them by Your Word and Spirit; Bless them as they seek to minister especially to military families in our community - Strengthen them in their labors; give them courage to witness a good confession that they might increase in fruit and faithfulness.

2023-10-01.Line 304: Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your grace and mercy for our brothers and sisters in _____________.
2023-10-01.Line 305: Empower them, by Your Holy Spirit, to persevere.  Protect them and provide for them.  Overthrow the plans of the wicked who seek them harm.  Rise up, Oh Lord, and bring Your justice and judgment for the sake of Your Bride.
2023-10-01.Line 307: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.

2023-10-01.Line 350: Father, to these we add every unborn child in our land. Heavenly Father, we pray to you for them with confidence and firm trust knowing that it is your Holy Will to remove the scourge of abortion on demand from off the face of Your earth. Thank you for the many ways in which we have seen it diminished in recent years. Continue these victories by Your mercy. Change the minds and melt the hearts of all who promote this evil, or who seek abortion as a remedy for the troubles of their lives, which troubles are for many very great. Make us in our lives a testimony of sexual purity, cherishers of human life, lovers and helpers of our neighbors, guardians and adopters of the fatherless and unwanted, honorers of Your holy image wherever it is found in mankind, and willing sacrificers of ourselves, our comforts and possessions in service to Your Kingdom and Your righteousness.
2023-10-01.Line 352: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-10-01.Line 354: Now our Father as we come to Your table, once again, give us Your grace.  Hear and answer all our prayers according to Your wisdom, mercy, and goodness, for we pray in the name of Him in Whom justice and mercy have met, Jesus Christ our Lord.   Amen.

2023-10-01.Line 416: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #11
2023-10-01.Line 417: (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-10-01.Line 419: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we seek You at this table, and ask for the good gift that You send down from Heaven, the powerful and blessing of Your Holy Spirit as we receive your gifts, this meal of bread and wine, that these may become to us the sign and seal of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; by Your Holy Spirit, grant us to partake really and truly of His blessed life, for it is by Him alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give You thanksgiving from our hearts for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ.  In His blessed name.  Amen.

2023-10-08.Line 5: PSALM 100  Serve the Lord with gladness: come before His presence with singing.  Know that the Lord he is God: it is he that hath made us,  we've not made ourselves;   we are his people,  and the  sheep of  his pasture. So enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise:
2023-10-08.Line 7: Rise and let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.                                                                                                                                                     AMEN.
2023-10-08.Line 9: I was glad when they said to me,  Let us go to the House of the LORD!                                                                                                                                  OUR FEET ARE STANDING WITHIN YOUR GATES, O JERUSALEM!

2023-10-08.Line 29: Restore us, O God of hosts;
2023-10-08.Line 30: CAUSE YOUR FACE TO SHINE, AND WE SHALL BE SAVED!
2023-10-08.Line 32: You have brought a vine out of Egypt;
2023-10-08.Line 33: YOU HAVE CAST OUT THE NATIONS, AND PLANTED IT.
2023-10-08.Line 36: AND CAUSED IT TO TAKE DEEP ROOT, AND IT FILLED THE LAND.
2023-10-08.Line 38: The hills were covered with its shadow,
2023-10-08.Line 39: AND THE MIGHTY CEDARS WITH ITS BOUGHS.
2023-10-08.Line 41: She sent out her boughs to the Sea,
2023-10-08.Line 42: AND HER BRANCHES TO THE RIVER.
2023-10-08.Line 44: Why have You broken down her hedges,
2023-10-08.Line 45: SO THAT ALL WHO PASS BY THE WAY PLUCK HER FRUIT?
2023-10-08.Line 47: The boar out of the woods uproots it,
2023-10-08.Line 48: AND THE WILD BEAST OF THE FIELD DEVOURS IT.
2023-10-08.Line 50: Return, we beseech You, O God of hosts;
2023-10-08.Line 51: LOOK DOWN FROM HEAVEN AND SEE, AND VISIT THIS VINE
2023-10-08.Line 53: And the vineyard which Your right hand has planted,
2023-10-08.Line 54: AND THE BRANCH THAT YOU MADE STRONG FOR YOURSELF.
2023-10-08.Line 56: It is burned with fire, it is cut down;
2023-10-08.Line 57: THEY PERISH AT THE REBUKE OF YOUR COUNTENANCE.
2023-10-08.Line 59: Let Your hand be upon the man of Your right hand,
2023-10-08.Line 60: UPON THE SON OF MAN WHOM YOU MADE STRONG FOR YOURSELF.
2023-10-08.Line 62: Then we will not turn back from You;
2023-10-08.Line 63: REVIVE US, AND WE WILL CALL UPON YOUR NAME.
2023-10-08.Line 65: Restore us, O LORD God of hosts;
2023-10-08.Line 66: CAUSE YOUR FACE TO SHINE, AND WE SHALL BE SAVED!
2023-10-08.Line 75: Great God and Heavenly Father, we have come into Your holy presence, at Your call in order to bring our praises and offerings, and to present ourselves to You, the One in Whom is all strength and beauty.  All the gods of the peoples are worthless idols and vain pursuits.  You alone are to be feared.  You alone are worthy to receive the worship of the nations of the earth.  Before You they will bow and every tongue confess Your glory in Christ Jesus.  Hear Your people's cry and hasten the coming of that day as we sing the prayer Your Son has graciously given us
2023-10-08.Line 79: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-10-08.Line 82: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-10-08.Line 83: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-10-08.Line 84: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-10-08.Line 85: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-10-08.Line 86: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-10-08.Line 90: Saints of God, once more, we stand in need of our Father's cleansing and renewal.  So, as Scripture calls us in many places to bow before our God in our worship, I invite all who are able to kneel together with me (giving thanks that we now have kneelers) and confess your sins.  We'll pray first silently, and then join together for our corporate prayer of confession, printed in your bulletins.
2023-10-08.Line 96: Most merciful God, we confess that we have sinned against You in thought, word, and deed, by what we have done and by what we have left undone.  We have not loved You with our whole heart; we have not loved our neighbor as ourselves.  For the sake of Your Son, Jesus Christ, have mercy on us.  Forgive us, renew us, and lead us, so that we may delight in Your will and walk in Your ways, to the glory of Your holy name.  Amen.
2023-10-08.Line 99: Arise and hear the good news of God's  forgiveness! Micah 7:18-20
2023-10-08.Line 101: [The prophet Micah asked]: Who is a God like You, Pardoning iniquity And passing over the transgression of the remnant of His heritage? He does not retain His anger forever, Because He delights in mercy. He will again have compassion on us, And will subdue our iniquities. You will cast all our sins Into the depths of the sea. You will give truth to Jacob And mercy to Abraham, Which You have sworn to our fathers From days of old.
2023-10-08.Line 103: [Our heavenly Father, in His great mercy, has given His only Son to die for us, and for His sake forgives all our sins.  To all who confess their sin to God and seek His forgiveness, He passes over your transgression and has compassion on you; He casts all your sins into the depths of the sea].
2023-10-08.Line 106: We lift them up to the Lord!

2023-10-08.Line 134: Now let me sing to my Well-beloved A song of my Beloved regarding His vineyard:
2023-10-08.Line 135: My Well-beloved has a vineyard On a very fruitful hill. 2 He dug it up and cleared out its stones, And planted it with the choicest vine. He built a tower in its midst, And also made a winepress in it; So He expected it to bring forth good grapes, But it brought forth wild grapes.
2023-10-08.Line 136: 3  And now, O inhabitants of Jerusalem and men of Judah, Judge, please, between Me and My vineyard. 4 What more could have been done to My vineyard That I have not done in it? Why then, when I expected it to bring forth good grapes, Did it bring forth wild grapes? 5 And now, please let Me tell you what I will do to My vineyard: I will take away its hedge, and it shall be burned; And break down its wall, and it shall be trampled down. 6 I will lay it waste; It shall not be pruned or dug, But there shall come up briers and thorns. I will also command the clouds That they rain no rain on it.
2023-10-08.Line 137: 7 For the vineyard of the Lord of hosts is the house of Israel, And the men of Judah are His pleasant plant. He looked for justice, but behold, oppression; For righteousness, but behold, a cry for help.

2023-10-08.Line 150: Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.
2023-10-08.Line 151: 3 I thank God, whom I serve with a pure conscience, as my forefathers did, as without ceasing I remember you in my prayers night and day, 4 greatly desiring to see you, being mindful of your tears, that I may be filled with joy, 5 when I call to remembrance the genuine faith that is in you, which dwelt first in your grandmother Lois and your mother Eunice, and I am persuaded is in you also. 6 Therefore I remind you to stir up the gift of God which is in you through the laying on of my hands. 7 For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.

2023-10-08.Line 313: -James 2:14-17 -- What does it profit, my brethren, if someone says he has faith but does not have works? Can faith save him?  If a brother or sister is naked and destitute of daily food, and one of you says to them, "Depart in peace, be warmed and filled," but you do not give them the things which are needed for the body, what does it profit?  Thus also faith by itself, if it does not have works, is dead.
2023-10-08.Line 315: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, We thank You for the bounty of Your kind provision to us and pray for those in the world and in our community, especially our brothers and sisters in Christ, who are in poverty.  Deliver us from the kind of dead faith that ignores or fails to provide help to our brothers and sisters in their distress.  Make us conscious as a congregation of human need around us and throughout the world.  As we dress in fine clothes for worship, and enjoy large meals together on this day, and as we offer our gifts to You now, we confess that we have nothing which we have not received from Your hand, and stand ready to give necessary help to others as You have given to us.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-10-08.Line 328: Now rise! And let us pray for the Church and the world!
2023-10-08.Line 335: Thank You for the gift of Your Word.  And Your Word made flesh Christ, Who was FOUND in the form of an obedient servant; obedient even to the point of death on the cross.
2023-10-08.Line 336: Give us the grace of Your Spirit to truly make His mind our mind to esteem the needs of others more important than our own; humble, even joyful, submission and support to the authorities You have placed above us, and joyful trust in You above all.
2023-10-08.Line 338: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.
2023-10-08.Line 340: In our own community, we lift up to You Niceville Church on Bayshore pastors Ross and Van Sant and Wyatt.
2023-10-08.Line 341: We ask that You would enlighten and sanctify them by Your Word and Spirit; grant them wisdom and discretion, Strengthen them in their labors; give them courage to witness a good confession that they might increase in fruit and faithfulness.  Guide and provide for them as they begin massive renovations to their property this month bless them in this work and help them in it and increase their fruit for it.
2023-10-08.Line 343: Also, pour out Your holy blessings and power upon Ernest & Tiffany Clark especially on Ch Alldredge and his ministry together with each of the churches in our county who participate strengthen those bonds of ministry over time bless all the coordination of the upcoming special holiday services and events and esp grant comfort and the strength that You alone can grant to Officer Huskin and his family at this time of their daughter's long and heart-wrenching illness bless and empower Ch. Alldredge with wisdom and grace as he ministers both to inmates and officers and this situation in particular.
2023-10-08.Line 345: Outside of our community, we lift up to You our brothers and sisters in INDIA.  Where many have suffered real persecution for the name of Christ and His gospel.  Endow them with all strength and perseverance and provide for their needs
2023-10-08.Line 346: Bless Your gospel and turn that land because of the testimony of Your people's love and devotion.   Bring forth great fruit from the labors of Your ministers there, and o these things for the glory of Your great name and for your mercy to us.
2023-10-08.Line 348: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.

2023-10-08.Line 492: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #13 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-10-08.Line 493: Be pleased now, O most merciful Father, to graciously receive at our hands this memorial of the blessed sacrifice of Your Son.  In union with Christ and His one sacrifice, we offer to You, O Lord, the reasonable sacrifices of ourselves, consecrating ourselves on the altar of the gospel, in soul and body, property and life, to Your most blessed service and praise. We thank You for Christ, the Bread of Life, and we thank You for this bread that is now before us.  In partaking of this bread, may we truly partake of Christ.  In His name.  Amen.
2023-10-08.Line 499: Holy Scripture teaches: that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2023-10-08.Line 503: Bread                   Christ Jesus Lay in Death's Strong Bands
2023-10-08.Line 525: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-10-08.Line 527: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-10-08.Line 533: Look upon us through the mediation of our great High Priest, Heavenly Father, and make us accepted in the Beloved.  Let His name be as pure and holy incense, through which all our worship may come up before You, as the odor of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, well pleasing to God.  We thank You now for this table which You have set before us.  We thank You that the ears of sinners such as we would ever, even once hear the words:  the blood of Jesus Christ shed for the remission of your sins; that lips such as ours would ever partake of His cup.  In partaking of it, may we truly partake of Christ and His sacrifice for us.

2023-10-15.Line 259: James 5:1-5 -- Come now, you rich, weep and howl for your miseries that are coming upon you!  Your riches are corrupted, and your garments are moth-eaten.  Your gold and silver are corroded, and their corrosion will be a witness against you and will eat your flesh like fire. You have heaped up treasure in the last days.  Indeed the wages of the laborers who mowed your fields, which you kept back by fraud, cry out; and the cries of the reapers have reached the ears of the Lord of Sabaoth.  You have lived on the earth in pleasure and luxury; you have fattened your hearts as in a day of slaughter.
2023-10-15.Line 262: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, You have blessed us materially with great abundance so that luxuries of all kinds surround us every day and make our living pleasant and easy.  Keep us from being rich fools, and laying up treasure for ourselves, while not being rich toward God (Luke 6:19-20).  Grant us the grace and wisdom of Your Holy Spirit to think Your Own thoughts about money and material possessions.  Deliver us from making idols of personal peace and affluence while ignoring the needs of those You have sent to us.  Receive these gifts we present to You now.  Give the elders and deacons of Your church wisdom as we seek to use this money to spread the gospel and meet physical needs.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-10-15.Line 275: Now rise! And let us pray for the Church and the world!
2023-10-15.Line 279: We thank You for Your tender kindness to us not only for delivering us from the fear of death, but for Your lavish gifts and comforts in our daily lives.  Grant us Your grace to be strengthened and bettered by these, rather than spoiled and led by a desire for comforts and riches.  Establish us in Godly contentment, that we never be guilty of idolatry before You.
2023-10-15.Line 282: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-10-15.Line 284: In our own community, we lift up to You Forest Lake Bible Church and elders Tidwell and Alldredge.    Fill them with all wisdom and grace and use that congregation in this community and in its ministry throughout the world. And give us a true and Biblical unity with this church and the other churches of the community.
2023-10-15.Line 286: We lift up to You the work of Your gospel ministers all over the world especially the ministry of GNJ&PM
2023-10-15.Line 288: We praise YOU for the increased participation and resources from Crossway bless them for that ministry and thank You for the stability of the chapel time alotted to the ministry
2023-10-15.Line 290: Continue to grant good workers and volunteers for that ministry and rich access to Your word among the inmates and staff!
2023-10-15.Line 294: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in ERITREA
2023-10-15.Line 296: Where many are jailed and persecuted for their Christian witness and Gospel outreach.   Bless and uphold them and those who advocate for them through the legal process.  Especially those young people who remain in prison.  And  bless Your Church there that She might flourish with peace in all devotion and reverence.    Grant them Your peace, even in the midst of their distress.  Rise up, O Father, and deliver Your children from their oppressors, from the plans and actions of wicked men who have set themselves against You and Your children.  Grant wisdom, justice, and effectiveness to every leader and authority involved.
2023-10-15.Line 300: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.

2023-10-15.Line 449: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #12 (Adapted from An Order of Worship from the Reformed Church, 1899)
2023-10-15.Line 451: Almighty God, our heavenly Father, we pray that You will send down the powerful benediction of Your Holy Spirit upon these elements of bread and wine, that they may become to us the sign and seal of  the body and blood of Your Son Jesus Christ; so that in this use of them we may be made, through the power of the Holy Spirit, to partake really and truly of His blessed life, by which alone we can be saved from death, and raised to immortality at the last day.  We give you heartfelt thanks for the Bread of Life and for this bread by which we now partake of Christ.  In His blessed name.  Amen.

2023-10-22.Line 123: Saints of God, we are in need of cleansing and renewal. Let us call upon the mercy of our heavenly Father.  Let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently, then together.
2023-10-22.Line 128: Most merciful God, we confess that we have sinned against You in thought, word, and deed, by what we have done and by what we have left undone.  We have not loved You with our whole heart; we have not loved our neighbor as ourselves.  For the sake of Your Son, Jesus Christ, have mercy on us.  Forgive us, renew us, and lead us, so that we may delight in Your will and walk in Your ways, to the glory of Your holy name.  Amen.
2023-10-22.Line 130: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!
2023-10-22.Line 132: Hear now the comforting assurance of the grace of God, promised in the Gospel to all who believe.  Holy Scripture says:  For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in Him might not perish, but have everlasting life.
2023-10-22.Line 135: All who continue to love their sin and shame, and persist in them, even against the conviction of their own conscience, I must declare to you, by God's command, that His wrath and judgment abides upon you, and that your sins are retained in heaven, and you will not be delivered from eternal judgment, unless you repent.
2023-10-22.Line 138: But, to every one of you beloved brothers and sisters, who hate your sins, and seek pardon through the merits of Jesus Christ alone, and who resolve each day to turn from your sins and to the Lord, to serve Him in true holiness and righteousness:
2023-10-22.Line 140: I declare, according to God's command, that from heaven you are released from all your sins (as Christ has promised in His Gospel), through the perfect satisfaction of the most holy passion and death of our Lord Jesus Christ.
2023-10-22.Line 142: And since we do not doubt that our prayers and worship are sanctified by the sufferings of Jesus Christ, and therefore acceptable and well-pleasing to God, I call upon you now, to

2023-10-22.Line 361: MATTHEW 6:19-20  Do not lay up for yourselves treasures on earth, where moth and rust destroy and where thieves break in and steal; but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust destroys and where thieves do not break in and steal.  For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
2023-10-22.Line 363: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, Guard us from living for the kinds of things that must be lost or destroyed.  Instead, grant us to live so as to gain great treasures in Heaven which can never be lost or destroyed.  Teach us, by Your Spirit, to seek first Your kingdom and Your righteousness.   Bless these, our gifts, through Jesus Christ our Lord we pray.  AMEN.

2023-10-29.Line 147: The Christian ministers who wrote our Westminster statement of faith -  understood baptismal water to represent the blood of Christ that washes away our sins and the virtue of the Holy Spirit that strengthens us to live holy lives, battling sin and temptation.
2023-10-29.Line 148: Today, we add into the membership of this church, the Drennans but as we prepared to do this, the Drennans were good and honest enough to tell us they don't believe they've ever been baptized.
2023-10-29.Line 149: So here they are today to see it done.
2023-10-29.Line 150: Now, each of them has been a believer for years, and it would have been an easy thing for them to just fudge on this detail and squeak on through
2023-10-29.Line 151: But this is what REAL living faith looks like and does
2023-10-29.Line 152: Real, living faith says I trust God and I'm going to obey Him   even when I have to humble myself.  Even when I don't understand it completely, I'm going to obey.
2023-10-29.Line 153: As we saw last Lord's Day baptism is not nothing, nor is baptism everything.  But baptism is something and something very important.
2023-10-29.Line 154: By baptism we God officially places us into the bosom of the visible church, separated from the world, and all outsiders, and united with believers  to join with us in their common baptismal duty, for all of us who are baptized in the name of Christ, by our baptism are bound to fight against the devil, the world, and the flesh.
2023-10-29.Line 155: Today, the Drennans testify to this.
2023-10-29.Line 156: Do you renounce the Devil with all his works, the vanity of the world, and the sinful desires of your flesh?
2023-10-29.Line 158: Do you believe in the truths of the Christian faith as we confess them each week in the Nicene Creed?
2023-10-29.Line 160: Do you want to be baptized?
2023-10-29.Line 162: And to you, congregation, God calls you to receive this family into the household of faith, to build them up in Christ, and strengthen them on their way to follow Him through this life.  Will you affirm with a hearty AMEN that you understand your part in their Christian discipleship as baptized members of this church?
2023-10-29.Line 165: We thank you Father, that You have not left us as strangers without the covenant of promise, but called us to the privileges of adoption.  Join the inward blessing of Your Holy Spirit to this outward washing of water and seal to these three all the promises of the covenant of grace so that, planted into the likeness of Christ's death and resurrection; the body of sin being destroyed in them, they may serve God in newness of life all his days.
2023-10-29.Line 167: Billy, I baptize you in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.
2023-10-29.Line 168: Angalee, I baptize you in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.
2023-10-29.Line 170: Noah, I baptize you in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.
2023-10-29.Line 172: These three saints, being thus baptized, are members of the household of faith; committed to the care and instruction of this congregation, to the end that they may grow strong as disciples of the Lord Jesus Christ, and serve in the royal priesthood of God's elect from every tribe and tongue and nation. Jesus said,  Whoever receives one such little child in My name, receives Me.
2023-10-29.Line 173: As you have had to look back for this baptism, look back also to your own.
2023-10-29.Line 174: Improve it and make the right use of it.  Stir up your faith; nurture and feed it; exercise and strengthen it.  And always be repenting of any sin against your covenant God.  For there is a coenant sealed by your baptism betwixt God and your soul.  Never forget it.  Live so as to honor the gift all your days.
2023-10-29.Line 176: Heavenly Father, we thank You for being true and faithful in keeping covenant and mercy:  And for Your grace to number us among Your saints and to bestow upon us the singular token and badge of Your love in Christ, purchased with His own blood.
2023-10-29.Line 177: Daily confirm more and more Your unspeakable favour to each of these three we have today received into the household of faith.
2023-10-29.Line 178: Provide for and defend them as their heavenly father, and make their baptism effectual, so that in Your power, each may prevail against the devil, the world, and the flesh, till in the end they obtain a full and final victory, each one kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation,
2023-10-29.Line 180: Now hear us as we sing together the prayer our Lord has taught us
2023-10-29.Line 182: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-10-29.Line 185: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-10-29.Line 186: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-10-29.Line 187: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-10-29.Line 188: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-10-29.Line 189: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-10-29.Line 195: Saints of God, today we remember the work of God to reform His Church a work of reforming that God works always first and foremost in and from our own hearts   we are in need of cleansing and renewal. Let us call upon the mercy of our heavenly Father.  Let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently, then together.
2023-10-29.Line 197: Let us pray together  Most merciful God, we confess that we have sinned against You in thought, word, and deed, by what we have done and by what we have left undone.  We have not loved You with our whole heart; we have not loved our neighbor as ourselves.  For the sake of Your Son, Jesus Christ, have mercy on us.  Forgive us, renew us, and lead us, so that we may delight in Your will and walk in Your ways, to the glory of Your holy name.  Amen.
2023-10-29.Line 201: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!                Romans 3:19-22
2023-10-29.Line 203: Now we know that whatever the law says, it says to those who are under the law, that every mouth may be stopped, and all the world may become guilty before God.  Therefore by the deeds of the law no flesh will be justified in His sight, for by the law is the knowledge of sin.  But now the righteousness of God apart from the law is revealed, being witnessed by the Law and the Prophets, even the righteousness of God which is through faith in Jesus Christ to all and on all who believe.
2023-10-29.Line 207: [ To you who confess your sin to God and seek His forgiveness through Jesus,  to you who have stopped your mouth from excuse-making and self justification, and have confessed that with all the world you stand guilty before God    God declares that you are righteous in His sight together with all who believe in Jesus.  Beloved in the Lord, for Christ's sake, all your sins are forgiven. Therefore   ]

Send us the light of the Spirit and give us grace that we may cling to Christ, Who is our Life, and by Your own preserving power, remain members of His Body forever.
2023-10-29.Line 334: Preaching of the Word                         Pastor Ben Rossell
2023-10-29.Line 338: Offertory        I Greet Thee, Who My Sure Redeemer Art
2023-10-29.Line 388: -MATTHEW 5:23-24 Therefore if you bring your gift to the altar, and there remember that your brother has something against you, leave your gift there before the altar, and go your way.  First be reconciled to your brother, and then come and offer your gift.
2023-10-29.Line 390: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, You are the Creator and Sustainer of all.  You have no need of our money or gifts as if we could bribe the almighty with full hands and empty hearts.  When we are at odds with our brethren, our offerings are vain and meaningless.  As we present our tithes and offerings to You today, we do so from hearts longing for peace with You and all Your people.  Bless and use them to that end and bless our meal together now for the same purpose, for we offer You our gifts only in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-10-29.Line 453: Now rise! And let us pray for the Church and the world!
2023-10-29.Line 457: We ask Lord, that You would teach us the many lessons of our Lord that we may become Your mature people.
2023-10-29.Line 458: Fill us with all Grace and peace.  Make us fruitful in works of faith and labors of love and steadfastness of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ. Grant us to live as Your faithful people in this nation and at this time in the power of Your Spirit and with full conviction. For we ask in the name of our resurrected Lord Jesus by Whom we are delivered from the wrath to come.
2023-10-29.Line 460: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-10-29.Line 462: In our own community, we lift up to You St Paul Lutheran Church, Pastor David Charlton, Good Shepherd Lutheran in Crestview and Shalimar pastor Angerman and their search.  Guide them into faithfulness; Many are in a larger denomination pressured socially in many directions that would compromise faithfulness to Your standard of righteousness. Fill them with all wisdom and grace and fidelity to You.  Empower them both as stewards of a past rich Reformational heritage and also called to walk faithfully today and into Your future.
2023-10-29.Line 464: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world,
2023-10-29.Line 466: Remembering HOPE RUSSIA Especially the Russia thank you for the safe relocation of Lewis and his family bless and provide for them as they train for further ministry and we pray the same for each of the church planters who are now preparing for their work
2023-10-29.Line 467: bless each of the new believers who have entered these churches and bless the ongoing evangelistic efforts.  Finally, grant wisdom, integrity, and Godliness to each of the pastors and elders in these regions, especially in a time of great trial.
2023-10-29.Line 469: We also lift up to You Your persecuted people, all over the world - especially today asking Your mercy for our brothers and sisters in
2023-10-29.Line 470: Mexico  for Aurelio, Ruth, Gabriel, and Maria bless and protect them despite all the persecution they face.  Bless Your Word as it goes forth in teaching and action and continue to build Your Church in these regions just to our south.
2023-10-29.Line 473: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions and also Israel and Palestine.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2023-10-29.Line 475: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-10-29.Line 477: We humbly pray that you would heal the sick in our midst, that You would show favor to Your children.
2023-10-29.Line 479: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.

2023-10-29.Line 505: Laura Dalton and Erika Dahl and Beth Pierce - together with their unborn children.
2023-10-29.Line 507: We thank you for the safe delivery of David to Nathanial and Sarah Mosley
2023-10-29.Line 508: Grant continued health and recovery to mother and child.
2023-10-29.Line 510: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and Your greater glory.
2023-10-29.Line 513: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-10-29.Line 515: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.

To that end, bless the churches of our community and especially of our regional Athanasius Presbytery.  Bless especially our sister congregations in Pace, Pensacola, Tallahasee, Live Oak, the plants in Jacksonville and Winter Springs bless Your people and Church officers. So that Your Word would dwell in each one richly and fruitfully!
2023-10-29.Line 520: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-10-29.Line 522: Now our Father as we come to Your table, we thank You for these palpable expressions of Your grace Your gifts to Your children.  Help us now in and by them, for we ask it and give You thanks in the strong and holy name of Your Son, Jesus Christ our Lord.  Amen.
2023-10-29.Line 525: Christians, in Whom do you trust?
2023-10-29.Line 528: I believe in one God: the Father Almighty,
2023-10-29.Line 530: and of all things visible and invisible;
2023-10-29.Line 532: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,
2023-10-29.Line 533: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2023-10-29.Line 534: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2023-10-29.Line 536: being of one substance with the Father;
2023-10-29.Line 537: by Whom all things were made;
2023-10-29.Line 538: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2023-10-29.Line 540: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2023-10-29.Line 542: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2023-10-29.Line 545: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2023-10-29.Line 547: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2023-10-29.Line 548: and He shall come again with glory
2023-10-29.Line 549: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2023-10-29.Line 550: Whose kingdom shall have no end.
2023-10-29.Line 552: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,
2023-10-29.Line 553: Who proceedeth from the Father and the Son;
2023-10-29.Line 554: Who with the Father and the Son
2023-10-29.Line 558: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;
2023-10-29.Line 559: I acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins;
2023-10-29.Line 560: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,
2023-10-29.Line 561: and the life of the world to come.
2023-10-29.Line 607: in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.  Amen.  Let us pray:
2023-10-29.Line 610: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #8 (Adapted from Calvin's prayer at Geneva)
2023-10-29.Line 611: Most gracious God!  As Your Son once offered up His body and blood on the cross for the remission of our sins, and has given his body and blood to us as our food and drink unto life eternal: So give us grace, with sincere hearts and fervent desires, to receive this great blessing from His hands.  May we by lively faith partake of his body and blood, yes of Himself, true God and man, the only bread from heaven, Who gives life to our souls.  Allow us no longer to live for ourselves, according to a corrupt and sinful nature; but may Christ live in us, and lead us to the life that is holy, blessed, and unchangeable for ever.  Amen.
2023-10-29.Line 617: Holy Scripture says: that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2023-10-29.Line 629: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-10-29.Line 631: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-10-29.Line 637: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #8: (Adapted from Calvin's prayer at Geneva):
2023-10-29.Line 639: O Lord, make us true partakers of the new and everlasting covenant, the covenant of grace.  And thus assure us of Your willingness to always be our gracious Father; not imputing to us our sins, but that we may magnify Your name by our words and works, providing us as Your beloved children and heirs, with all things necessary for our good.  Fit us, O heavenly Father! so to celebrate at this time the blessed remembrance of Your Son.  Enable us to profitably contemplate His love, and show forth the benefits of His death; that receiving fresh increase of strength in Your faith and in all good works, we may with greater confidence call You our Father, and evermore rejoice in You; Through Jesus Christ, our Redeemer, Who shed His blood that we might live.  Amen.
2023-10-29.Line 642: In the same manner He also took the cup also after supper
2023-10-29.Line 645: Cup             Psalm 118, O Come with Thanks
2023-10-29.Line 660: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, as the remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you do show forth Your Lord's death until His return.
2023-10-29.Line 662: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2023-10-29.Line 669: O Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good!

2023-10-29.Line 674: Praise Him above ye heavenly host,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen!
2023-10-29.Line 680: ...you shall receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you;
2023-10-29.Line 681: and you shall be witnesses to Me in Jerusalem,

2023-11-05.Line 39: You have sent us Your Spirit and so confirmed our adoption as Your own children to join the family of God.

2023-11-05.Line 42: Grant that we, encouraged by the examples of Your servants and mindful of Your faithfulness in and through them, may persevere in the course that is set before us.

2023-11-05.Line 64: O God our heavenly Father, we confess to you that we have grievously sinned against you in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that we are unable to fully understand, but which are all known to you. We are in need of deliverance from your enemies and our infirmities. For this reason, we flee for refuge to your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through Jesus Christ our Lord, Amen.
2023-11-05.Line 67: Arise and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!
2023-11-05.Line 71: [Jesus said]: "Whoever drinks of the water that I shall give him will never thirst  and it will become in him a fountain of water springing up into everlasting life." "If anyone thirsts, let him come to Me and drink. He who believes in Me, as the Scripture has said, out of his heart will flow rivers of living water."
2023-11-05.Line 73: Anyone who turns in thirst to any other source or spring than Christ is doomed to fail and fall under the just judgment of God   apart from Jesus Christ, all other promises are broken cisterns and polluted wells
2023-11-05.Line 75: But to you who have acknowledged that your thirst can be quenched ONLY by the living water of the Holy Spirit whom Jesus gives, the water that flows mingled with blood from His very heart - you have confessed your sin to God and sought His forgiveness, your Father in Heaven has had mercy upon you, and for the sake of the sufferings, death, and resurrection of His dear Son forgives all your sins.  Therefore
