2023-11-05.Line 260: November 7th -MATTHEW 6:2-4  When...you give alms, do not sound a trumpet before you, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may be honored by men.  Truly I say to you, they have their reward in full.  But when you give alms, do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing, that your alms may be in secret; and your Father who sees in secret will repay you.
2023-11-05.Line 262: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, As we offer our gifts to You, deliver us from forfeiting Your reward by displays of false piety or sinful attitudes of vainglory.  Instead, give us Your Spirit so that we may serve You with humility and sincerity; eager to work behind the scenes and perform the kinds of secret, charitable deeds which are known, recognized, and rewarded by no one except You. Teach us what it means, not to let our left hand know what our right hand is doing, and bless our offerings in Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-11-05.Line 289: Rise now, as we pray together for THE CHURCH AND THE WORLD
2023-11-05.Line 294: Give us Your grace never to leave the light of the glory of Your gospel.  Guard and keep us from the temptations to stray that we would be vigilant against corruptions from within and without.  Thank you for the legacy of Your faithfulness to the world through Your people to purify and keep us- that You are the God Who was, and is, and will be at work among Your people.
2023-11-05.Line 296: We pray these things not only for ourselves but for all your Church in all the world.
2023-11-05.Line 298: In our own community, we lift up to You  the Catholic churches in our community Holy Name of Jesus, Christ our Redeemer, and St Mary's and Fathers Voyt and Johnson, Seb, Halsema.  Despite the doctrinal differences that separate us, we thank You for the areas where their testimony has shown brightly in this corrupt and sinful world.  Bless them and continue the work of Your Spirit to Reform all of Your Church, as you mature and unite us.  That all who bear the name of Christ Jesus would do so faithfully and with a growing purity of devotion to Your Holy Word.

2023-11-05.Line 302: . Especially their work among the churches in Gaza where there is so much danger and fighting and in Iraq, the Nineveh plains after this devastating fire. We pray for their persecutors - that You will turn them from their wickedness to the light of the Gospel.  Bless them with good rulers who will govern in wisdom and true justice in ways that protect Your people and allow them to live quiet peaceable lives there in all devotion and reverence!

2023-11-05.Line 351: We thank You for the authorities You have placed over us in the executive, legislative and judicial branches; especially praying today for our Federal Judges  Justices Roberts, Thomas, Alito, Sotomayor, Kagan, Gorsuch, Kavanaugh, Barrett, and Jackson
2023-11-05.Line 352: As well as our FL state justices Muniz, Canady, Labarga, Couriel, Grosshans, Francis and Sasso -
2023-11-05.Line 353: Bless each one with Your true wisdom and strength in all their judgments that they would know with clarity how to administer justice, to rule honestly and weigh the grave matters before them accurately despite immense pressure from many directions.
2023-11-05.Line 354: Help them to fulfill their duties and vows, to fear You rightly, and rightly balancing the heritage of the past with the needs of the present, especially honoring You and Your image on earth, by protecting innocent human life as it is found in the unborn, infirm, and aged.
2023-11-05.Line 357: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.

2023-11-05.Line 445: Prayer giving thanks for the bread #1: (BCW) Gracious God, pour out Your Holy Spirit upon us and upon these Your gifts of bread and wine, that the bread we break and the cup we bless may be the communion of the body and blood of Christ.  By Your Spirit unite us with the living Christ and with all who are baptized in His name, that we may be one in ministry in every place. As this bread is Christ's body for us, send us out to be the body of Christ in the world.

2023-11-05.Line 489: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-11-05.Line 494: Prayer giving thanks for the cup #1 -- Remembering Your gracious acts in Christ, we take from Your creation this bread and wine and joyfully celebrate His dying and rising, as we wait the day of His coming.  With thanksgiving, we offer our very selves to You to be a living and holy sacrifice, dedicated to Your service.  We give You thanks and praise for the blood of Christ, shed for our salvation.

2023-11-05.Line 596: who brought again from the dead, our Lord Jesus,

2023-11-05.Line 599: make you perfect to do His will,

2023-11-12.Line 5: Hebrews 13 - 10 We have an altar from which those who serve the tabernacle have no right to eat. 11 For the animal bodies, whose blood was brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, were burned outside the camp.
2023-11-12.Line 7: 12 Therefore Jesus also, that He might sanctify the people with His own blood, suffered outside the gate.
2023-11-12.Line 8: 13 Therefore let us go forth to Him, outside the camp, bearing His reproach. 14 For here we have no continuing city, but we seek the one to come.
2023-11-12.Line 10: 15 Therefore by Him let us continually offer the sacrifice of praise to God, that is, the fruit of our lips, confessing His name   and not forgetting to do good and give generously, for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.
2023-11-12.Line 13: Rise and let us worship God!  For we are gathered together this morning in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit!
2023-11-12.Line 15: And Our Mouth Shall Proclaim Your Praise!
2023-11-12.Line 16: Glory To The Father, And To The Son, And To The Holy Spirit.
2023-11-12.Line 112: Make haste, O God, to deliver me!     O Lord, make haste to help me!
2023-11-12.Line 113: Let them be put to shame and confusion     who seek my life!
2023-11-12.Line 114: Let them be turned back and brought to dishonor     who delight in my hurt!
2023-11-12.Line 115: Let them turn back because of their shame     who say,  Aha, Aha!
2023-11-12.Line 116: May all who seek you     rejoice and be glad in you!
2023-11-12.Line 117: May those who love your salvation     say evermore,  God is great!
2023-11-12.Line 118: But I am poor and needy;     hasten to me, O God!
2023-11-12.Line 119: You are my help and my deliverer;     O Lord, do not delay!
2023-11-12.Line 123: We Praise You our God, for Your goodness, mercy, and wisdom.
2023-11-12.Line 124: You reject the evil and cut them off,
2023-11-12.Line 125: But turn Your eyes and ears to the righteous,
2023-11-12.Line 126: and save them out of all their troubles.
2023-11-12.Line 127: You condemn the wicked, but always redeem the souls of Your servants.
2023-11-12.Line 128: Yes, You turn and come near to the humble-hearted and repentant,
2023-11-12.Line 129: Just as You did Your Righteous Son, in all His afflictions,
2023-11-12.Line 130: While His very flesh was being torn,
2023-11-12.Line 131: You guarded each of His bones so that not one was broken.
2023-11-12.Line 133: So guard and be with us and hear us now as we sing together the prayer our Lord has given us
2023-11-12.Line 134: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-11-12.Line 137: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-11-12.Line 138: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-11-12.Line 139: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-11-12.Line 140: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-11-12.Line 141: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-11-12.Line 146: Saints of God, we are in need of cleansing and renewal. Let us call upon the mercy of our heavenly Father.  Let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently for a moment, and then aloud together with our corporate prayer of confession printed in your bulletin
2023-11-12.Line 150: O God our heavenly Father, we confess to you that we have grievously sinned against you in thought, word, and deed; not only in outward transgressions, but also in secret thoughts and desires that we are unable to fully understand, but which are all known to you. We are in need of deliverance from your enemies and our infirmities. For this reason, we flee for refuge to your infinite mercy, seeking and imploring your forgiveness and deliverance, through Jesus Christ our Lord, Amen.
2023-11-12.Line 154: Arise!   and hear the good news of God's forgiveness from  Psalm 130
2023-11-12.Line 157: Out of the depths have I cried to You, O Lord; Lord hear my voice!  Let Your ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.  If You, Lord, should mark iniquities, O Lord, who could stand?  But there is forgiveness with You, that You may be feared.  I wait for the Lord, my soul waits, and in His word do I hope.  My soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning--more than watchmen for the morning.  O Israel, hope in the Lord; for with the Lord is steadfast love, and with Him is plenteous redemption.  And He shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
2023-11-12.Line 159: [To you who have confessed your sin to God, seeking His forgiveness, to you who have cried to the Lord out of the depths, who wait for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning, God declares His steadfast love and plenteous redemption.  There is forgiveness with God, that He may be feared.  For Christ's sake, our merciful God forgives all our sin]. Therefore, Lift up your hearts!
2023-11-12.Line 161: We lift them up to the Lord!
2023-11-12.Line 187: (Please remain standing for our Gospel Reading and song)
2023-11-12.Line 193: Praise be to the Lord Jesus Christ!
2023-11-12.Line 198: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2023-11-12.Line 199: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.
2023-11-12.Line 206: Our Gracious Father in Heaven, grant us now the blessing of Your Holy Spirit that our hearts may be open to hear and receive Your holy Word with all diligence and faith, to understand, cherish, and obey; through our Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
2023-11-12.Line 218: Preaching of the Word    Pastor Ben Rossell
2023-11-12.Line 271: -DEUTERONOMY 8:7,9-10 -- "For the Lord your God is bringing you into a good land,... a land in which you will eat bread without scarcity, in which you will lack nothing; a land whose stones are iron and out of whose hills you can dig copper. When you have eaten and are full, then you shall bless the Lord your God for the good land which He has given you.
2023-11-12.Line 274: Like Israel of old, You have blessed us with a land of abundance.  Grant us the grace of Your Holy Spirit so that even after we have eaten and are full, we may bless the Lord our God, for all the gifts You have given.   Make us faithful stewards of all that You have entrusted to us and generous to share with others, especially those who are in need.  Bless these tithes and offerings we bring today to give glory to Your name.  In the name of Your Son Jesus, Who gave Himself for us.  AMEN.
2023-11-12.Line 287: Rise now and let us pray for the Church and the World!
2023-11-12.Line 291: You are the Giver of all good things; we thank You for all Your mercies and for Your loving care over all Your creatures.  For life, protection, friendship and duty; the countless joys we've known, just this morning, and even for the trials that teach us to trust in You. Most of all we thank You for Your Son our Savior; for the presence of Your Spirit, our Comforter, and for the ministry of worship, Word and Sacrament in Your Church.
2023-11-12.Line 292: In our own Presbytery, we lift up to You our neighbors New Hope Full Gospel Korean Church and Pastor Kim -    .  We pray that they along with us would abound in love more and more with knowledge and all discernment, so that they might approve what is excellent, and so be pure and blameless before Christ.
2023-11-12.Line 294: and the missionary efforts of Peru Mission
2023-11-12.Line 296: We thank You for the growth of the churches in Trujillo and Cajamarca and ask You to provide for and bless the churchplant in Chimbote as well as the seminary student interviews.
2023-11-12.Line 297: Grant Health and strength to Esther Ramirez.  And bless each of the new church members and officers wisdom, steadfastness, and faithfulness.
2023-11-12.Line 298: Finally, grant open ears and receptive hearts to each of their neighbors as they hear the gospel and receive ministries of charity and mercy from Your people there.
2023-11-12.Line 300: Outside our community, we lift up to You Your persecuted people all over the world, ,
2023-11-12.Line 303: Especially authorities like Parliament Member Tumi who openly confesses faith in Christ and works with a sense of Christ's calling.  Protect and bless him and grant all Your church there protection from harm,  peace and devotion to You.
2023-11-12.Line 305: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions, along with Israel and Palestine.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2023-11-12.Line 308: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-11-12.Line 311: How kind You are, Dear Father, to be especially present with Your people in our sufferings, sanctifying them for our good and Your glory.
2023-11-12.Line 312: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2023-11-12.Line 338: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2023-11-12.Line 340: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expecting mothers
2023-11-12.Line 341: Laura Dalton and Erika Dahl and Beth Pierce - together with their unborn children.
2023-11-12.Line 343: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and
2023-11-12.Line 347: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-11-12.Line 349: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-11-12.Line 352: Gracious Father, to the end that Your Name may magnified on the earth and Your Kingdom Come here, and Your will be done here
2023-11-12.Line 353: bless Your holy, Apostolic, worldwide Church;
2023-11-12.Line 354: fill Her with all truth, in all peace.
2023-11-12.Line 355: Where She is corrupt, purify Her;
2023-11-12.Line 356: where She is in error, correct Her;
2023-11-12.Line 357: where in anything She is amiss, reform Her.
2023-11-12.Line 358: Where She is right, establish Her;
2023-11-12.Line 359: where She is in need, provide for Her;
2023-11-12.Line 360: where She is divided, reunite Her;
2023-11-12.Line 361: where She is in danger, protect and deliver Her;
2023-11-12.Line 362: send down to Her Your Wisdom from above liberally and without reproach;
2023-11-12.Line 364: That we, the Bride of Your Beloved Son, the one Seed of Abraham, may be faithful.
2023-11-12.Line 366: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-11-12.Line 369: All these things and whatever else You see that we need, grant us, O God, for the sake of Christ, who died and rose again, and now lives and reigns with You and the Holy Spirit, One God, age after age. Amen.

2023-11-12.Line 464: We humbly beseech You, O merciful Father, to hear us; and because of Your almighty goodness bless and sanctify, with Your word and Spirit, these Your gifts and creations of bread and wine; that we, receiving them according to Your Son our Savior Jesus Christ's holy institution, in remembrance of His death and passion, may be partakers of His most blessed Body and Blood. And we ask that in Your fatherly goodness, You will mercifully accept this our sacrifice of praise and thanksgiving; most humbly beseeching You to grant
2023-11-12.Line 465: that, by the merits of death of your son Jesus Christ, and through faith in His blood, we and all Your whole Church, may obtain remission of our sins, and all other benefits of His passion. And here we offer to You, O Lord, ourselves, our souls and bodies, to be a reasonable, holy , and living sacrifice to you. Through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
2023-11-12.Line 469: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus on the same night in which He was betrayed took bread
2023-11-12.Line 581: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-11-12.Line 583: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-11-12.Line 586: All glory be to You, Almighty God, our heavenly Father. Because of Your tender mercy, You gave Your only Son Jesus Christ to suffer death on the cross for our redemption; and did institute, and in His holy gospel command us to continue, a perpetual memory of His precious death and sacrifice, until His coming again. Therefore we Your humble servants, celebrate before Your Divine Majesty, with these Your holy gifts, which we now offer to You: the memorial Your Son has commanded us to make, remembering His blessed passion and precious death, His mighty resurrection and glorious ascension; giving to You most hearty thanks for the innumerable benefits procured to us by those sufferings, death, resurrection, and ascension, Who, together with You and the Holy Spirit, are worship and glorified as one God, now and forevermore. Amen.

2023-11-19.Line 5: PSALM 149 - Praise the Lord! Sing unto the Lord a new song! Sing His praise in the congregation of the Saints!  For the Lord takes pleasure in His people. He will beautify the meek with salvation!
2023-11-19.Line 7: Rise and let us worship God! We are gathered in the name of God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit.                                                                                                                                                               AMEN.                                                                                                                                                                             The LORD has made known His salvation!
2023-11-19.Line 8: HIS RIGHTEOUSNESS HE HAS REVEALED IN THE SIGHT OF THE NATIONS.  He has remembered His mercy and His faithfulness to the house of Israel;
2023-11-19.Line 9: ALL THE ENDS OF THE EARTH HAVE SEEN THE SALVATION OF OUR GOD!
2023-11-19.Line 55: Lord, You have been our dwelling place
2023-11-19.Line 58: Before the mountains were brought forth,
2023-11-19.Line 59: OR EVER YOU HAD FORMED THE EARTH AND THE WORLD,
2023-11-19.Line 65: AND SAY, "RETURN, O CHILDREN OF MEN."
2023-11-19.Line 67: For a thousand years in Your sight Are like yesterday when it is past,
2023-11-19.Line 68: AND LIKE A WATCH IN THE NIGHT.
2023-11-19.Line 70: You carry them away like a flood; They are like a sleep.
2023-11-19.Line 71: IN THE MORNING THEY ARE LIKE GRASS WHICH GROWS UP:
2023-11-19.Line 73: In the morning it flourishes and grows up;
2023-11-19.Line 74: IN THE EVENING IT IS CUT DOWN AND WITHERS.
2023-11-19.Line 76: For we have been consumed by Your anger,
2023-11-19.Line 77: AND BY YOUR WRATH WE ARE TERRIFIED.
2023-11-19.Line 79: You have set our iniquities before You,
2023-11-19.Line 80: OUR SECRET SINS IN THE LIGHT OF YOUR COUNTENANCE.
2023-11-19.Line 82: For all our days have passed away in Your wrath;
2023-11-19.Line 83: WE FINISH OUR YEARS LIKE A SIGH.
2023-11-19.Line 85: The days of our lives are seventy years;
2023-11-19.Line 86: AND IF BY REASON OF STRENGTH THEY ARE EIGHTY YEARS,
2023-11-19.Line 88: Yet their boast is only labor and sorrow;
2023-11-19.Line 89: FOR IT IS SOON CUT OFF, AND WE FLY AWAY.
2023-11-19.Line 91: Who knows the power of Your anger?
2023-11-19.Line 92: FOR AS THE FEAR OF YOU, SO IS YOUR WRATH.
2023-11-19.Line 94: So teach us to number our days,
2023-11-19.Line 95: THAT WE MAY GAIN A HEART OF WISDOM.
2023-11-19.Line 98: Praise waits for You among Your people, Heavenly Father, and we are glad to bring it along with our offerings and ourselves.  We rejoice to gather before You together with all Your people throughout all the world.  Truly to You all flesh shall come.  How blessed is anyone You choose and cause to approach Yourself.  We praise You for calling us to dwell in Your courts that we might be satisfied with the goodness of Your Son, Jesus our Lord, Who is the confidence of all the ends of the earth.  Now hear us as we sing the prayer He has taught us:..
2023-11-19.Line 101: Our Father, who art in Heaven,
2023-11-19.Line 104: Thy will be done, on earth as it is in Heaven.
2023-11-19.Line 105: Give us this day our daily bread,
2023-11-19.Line 106: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive, our debtors.
2023-11-19.Line 107: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
2023-11-19.Line 108: For Thine is the Kingdom, and the Power, and the Glory.
2023-11-19.Line 112: Saints of God, we are in need of cleansing and renewal. Let us call upon the mercy of our heavenly Father.  Let us kneel and confess our sins together, in humble reliance upon the grace of God, first silently, then together.
2023-11-19.Line 118: Arise!   and hear the good news of God's forgiveness!  Exodus 12
2023-11-19.Line 120: [The Lord said to Israel]:   I will pass through the land of Egypt on that night, and will strike all the firstborn in the land of Egypt, both man and beast; and against all the gods of Egypt I will execute judgment: I am the Lord.  Now the blood shall be a sign for you on the houses where you are. And when I see the blood, I will pass over you; and the plague shall not be on you to destroy you when I strike the land of Egypt .
2023-11-19.Line 122: [To you, covenant people, whose homes are marked by the blood of the Lamb, and whose very bodies are marked by the water of baptism, God declares that in Christ - your sins are forgiven and that the righteous judgment which falls on the wicked will not fall on you].

2023-11-19.Line 202: Praise be to the Lord Jesus Christ!
2023-11-19.Line 206: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost!
2023-11-19.Line 207: As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be.
2023-11-19.Line 211: I Peter 2:7-8 Gracious Father, help us to; to put away all bitterness, filthiness, and the perversion so prevalent among the world around us. Grant us the powerful grace of Your Holy Spirit to hear and obey Your Word; to receive it with meekness as it is planted in our hearts. In Jesus' name.  Amen.
2023-11-19.Line 272: DEUTERONOMY 8:3 -- "And you shall remember that the Lord your God ... humbled you, allowed you to hunger, and fed you with manna which you did not know nor did your fathers know, that He might make you know that man shall not live by bread alone; but man lives by every word that proceeds from the mouth of the Lord.
2023-11-19.Line 274: Our Gracious Heavenly Father, Thank You for You are gracious as You father Your people.  You guide and teach us, as You did our fathers in the wilderness, so that we may know from our hearts that we do not  live by bread alone, but by every word that comes forth from Your mouth.  Thank You for Your abundant gifts that meet our daily needs and grant us life eternal.  Accept our offerings, and with them accept our hearts and lives.  Bless each for Your work in the world.  In Jesus' name.  AMEN.
2023-11-19.Line 296: Rise now, as we pray together for THE CHURCH AND THE WORLD
2023-11-19.Line 299: We praise You, O God, from the simple longing of our hearts. We acknowledge You to be the LORD.  All the earth worships You, Everlasting Father, with the Angels of Heaven and all the Powers therein, the Cherubim and Seraphim in their continual crying the glorified band of Your Apostles and Prophets and the noble army of Martyrs together with Your holy Church throughout all the world.  The Father, infinite in majesty; the Son, adored as the only begotten of the Father; The Holy Ghost, our Comforter.
2023-11-19.Line 301: Teach us to worship You well, Father, Son, and Spirit Give us a never dying love for it and grow us up in it.
2023-11-19.Line 302: We pray this not only for ourselves but for all Your Church in all the world.
2023-11-19.Line 304: In our own community, we lift up to You Church at Bayshore and pastors Ross and Van Sant and Wyatt.
2023-11-19.Line 305: We ask that You would enlighten and sanctify them by Your Word and Spirit; grant them wisdom and discretion, Strengthen them in their labors; give them courage to witness a good confession that they might increase in fruit and faithfulness.
2023-11-19.Line 307: Outside of our community, we lift up to You
2023-11-19.Line 308: The good work of ROCKY BAYOU CHRISTIAN SCHOOL
2023-11-19.Line 311: We also ask Yovur protection for our persecuted brothers and sisters, especially those in NEPAL for Christians like Pastor Acharya who was imprisoned for evangelism.  Bless and sustain him there and provide for his wife Junu as they are separated.  Lord, defend Your Bride, Your chosen people in that land, in whom You delight.  guard them under the shadow of Your mighty wing deliver them from the snare of the fowler  Grant them security and strength.
2023-11-19.Line 312: Rise up Oh God, and grant stable and righteous governments with just rulers so that this and all nations may be baptized and disciple under the good yoke of King Jesus.
2023-11-19.Line 314: Father, also bless Your churches, ministers, refugees, and those caring for them in Russia, Ukraine, and border regions as well as Israel and Palestine.  Bring a swift end to all hostilities and grant Your people across that region true unity in the Holy Spirit.
2023-11-19.Line 317: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-11-19.Line 320: How kind You are, Dear Father, to be especially present with Your people in our sufferings, sanctifying them for our good and Your glory.
2023-11-19.Line 321: We lift up to You those who are afflicted by all manner of suffering.
2023-11-19.Line 345: As well as each one we name before You now in our silent prayers
2023-11-19.Line 347: We give You thanks and ask Your protection for of our expecting mothers
2023-11-19.Line 348: (Laura Dalton) and Erika Dahl and Beth Pierce - together with their unborn children.
2023-11-19.Line 350: Hear also the prayers of those who desire children for the blessing of their homes and
2023-11-19.Line 353: Good Shepherd, heal Your sheep and tend Your Lambs.
2023-11-19.Line 355: OH LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-11-19.Line 357: Father, we lift up to You our own nation in this generation.  Look upon us in mercy and deliver us from our own sin and rebellion and especially the sins and temptations that ensnare nations.  Deliver us from the lies of our flesh, or our enemy Satan, or the version of these that are standardized culturally in the unbelieving world around us. Turn us to the fear of God and the love of His righteous law.   According to Your word, we thank You for the blessings and protections of government authority we pray for our national judges, law makers, and the executors of the laws for President Biden, his cabinet and advisors, and for the heads of our military and other institutions -   Mercifully grant them Your wisdom and counsel that as they discharge their duties to lead us as Your appointed minsters over us. In particular, bless and help our state authorities, Gov DeSantis, Surgeon General Lapado, our County Cmmrs Mixon, Ketchel, Goodwin, Ponder, and Boyles and DOH Dr Smith together w/ our City Cmmrs, Administrators, Sheriff Aden and his deputies, and our local law enforcement officers, and emergency responders.
2023-11-19.Line 359: LORD, HEAR OUR PRAYERS.  For You are gracious.
2023-11-19.Line 361: And now, our Heavenly Father, as we approach Your Table, The voice of our beloved Lord, Who was meek and lowly and now is highly exalted calls us to Himself.  So help us by Your Spirit to come to Him once more, for we pray in His strong and holy name.  Amen.
2023-11-19.Line 364: Christians, in Whom do you trust?
2023-11-19.Line 367: I believe in one God: the Father Almighty,
2023-11-19.Line 369: and of all things visible and invisible;
2023-11-19.Line 371: And in one Lord, Jesus Christ, the only-begotten Son of God,
2023-11-19.Line 372: begotten of His Father before all worlds,
2023-11-19.Line 373: God of God, Light of Light, very God of very God,
2023-11-19.Line 375: being of one substance with the Father;
2023-11-19.Line 376: by Whom all things were made;
2023-11-19.Line 377: Who for us men, and for our salvation,
2023-11-19.Line 379: and was incarnate by the Holy Ghost of the virgin, Mary,
2023-11-19.Line 381: and was crucified also for us under Pontius Pilate;
2023-11-19.Line 384: He rose again according to the Scriptures;
2023-11-19.Line 386: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father;
2023-11-19.Line 387: and He shall come again with glory
2023-11-19.Line 388: to judge both the quick and the dead;
2023-11-19.Line 389: Whose kingdom shall have no end.
2023-11-19.Line 391: And I believe in the Holy Ghost, the Lord and Giver of life,
2023-11-19.Line 392: Who proceedeth from the Father and the Son;
2023-11-19.Line 393: Who with the Father and the Son
2023-11-19.Line 397: And I believe one, holy, catholic, and apostolic Church;
2023-11-19.Line 398: I acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins;
2023-11-19.Line 399: and I look for the resurrection of the dead,
2023-11-19.Line 400: and the life of the world to come.
2023-11-19.Line 442: in the name of the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.  Amen.  Let us pray:
2023-11-19.Line 444: Prayer giving thanks for the bread
2023-11-19.Line 447: Bless us, O heavenly Father, that the remembrance of our redemption may never leave our hearts, but that we may walk in Christ, the Light of the world, far removed from our foolish reason and blind wills, which are vain and injurious darkness; through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
2023-11-19.Line 453: Holy Scripture says that our Lord Jesus, on the same night in which He was betrayed, took bread
2023-11-19.Line 456: Praise to the Lord, the Almighty
2023-11-19.Line 483: And when He had blessed the bread, He broke it and gave it to His disciples saying: "Take, eat; this is My body which is broken for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
2023-11-19.Line 485: The body of Christ given for you!
2023-11-19.Line 490: Prayer giving thanks for the cup:
2023-11-19.Line 493: Almighty God, heavenly Father, we give You eternal praise and thanks that You have been so gracious unto us poor sinners, having drawn us to Your Son our Lord Jesus, whom You have delivered to death for us and given to be our nourishment and our dwelling unto eternal life. Grant that we may never relinquish these things from our hearts, but ever grow and increase in faith to You, which, through love, is effective of all good works. And so may our whole life be devoted to Your praise and the edification of our neighbor; through the same Jesus Christ, our Lord. Amen.
2023-11-19.Line 496: In the same manner our Lord also took the cup also after supper
2023-11-19.Line 542: Jesus said, "This cup is the new covenant in My blood. This do, as often as you drink it, in remembrance of Me."  For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you proclaim the Lord's death till He comes.
2023-11-19.Line 544: The blood of Christ shed for you!
2023-11-19.Line 548: O give thanks to the Lord, for He is good.
2023-11-19.Line 551: Praise God from whom all blessing flow,
2023-11-19.Line 552: Praise Him all creatures here below,
2023-11-19.Line 553: Praise Him above ye heavenly host,
2023-11-19.Line 554: Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen!
2023-11-19.Line 556: THE LORD COMMISSIONS US COMMISSIONS & BENEDICTION
2023-11-19.Line 560: MARK 16:15-19 "Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature. He who believes and is baptized will be saved; but he who does not believe will be condemned.
2023-11-19.Line 565: II Thessalonians 2:16-17 Now our Lord Jesus Christ Himself,  and our God and Father, who has loved us and given us everlasting  consolation and good hope by grace, comfort  your hearts and establish you in every good word and work.
2023-11-19.Line 572: Hymn of Response          Lord Keep Us Steadfast
2023-11-19.Line 606: God bless you; Go in peace, and the God of peace be with you!
